original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] And I actually need your help.
translation: Tyrion: Ага...[p/] И мне нужна твоя помощь.

original: Celeste: ...Really?
translation: Celeste: ...Правда?

original: You tell her about your plan.
translation: Ты объясняешь ей своей план.

original: Celeste: Really?[p/] I feel like you're making some big assumptions there.
translation: Celeste: Серьёзно?[p/] Мне кажется, ты делаешь слишком большое предположение.

original: Celeste: Wouldn't the Inquisition check for something like that?
translation: Celeste: Разве Инквизиция не проверила бы что-то подобное?

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] It's the best play we have.
translation: Tyrion: Знаю...[p/] Но это лучшая идея на данный момент.

original: Tyrion: Do you remember what Steelwind said yesterday?
translation: Tyrion: Ты помнишь, что Стилвинд сказала вчера?

original: Aria: But the moment the guards saw the body,[p/] one of them cast [b]Detect Magic[/b].
translation: Aria: Но когда охрана увидела тело,[p/] один из них использовал [b]Обнаружение Магии[/b].

original: Aria: With that spell,[p/] they would have seen any invisible people hiding in this room.
translation: Aria: С помощью этого заклинания,[p/] они смогли бы увидеть невидимых людей, прячущихся в этой комнате.

original: Celeste: Wait, you can use [b]Detect Magic[/b] like that?
translation: Celeste: Погоди, можно использовать [b]Обнаружение Магии[/b] подобным образом?

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] It's standard procedure.
translation: Aria: Разумеется.[p/] Это стандартная процедура.

original: Aria: Like all spells,[p/] [b]Invisibility[/b] leaves traces of magic on the person it's cast on.
translation: Aria: Как и прочие заклинания,[p/] [b]Невидимость[/b] оставляет следы магии на человек во время использования.

original: Aria: So mages can use [b]Detect Magic[/b] as a way to see through invisibility.
translation: Aria: Так что маги могу использовать [b]Обнаружение Магии[/b], дабы видеть невидимое.

original: Tyrion: If everything goes the way I think it will,[p/] you'll be able to confirm its location.
translation: Tyrion: Если всё пойдёт так, как я думаю,[p/] ты сможешь найти его местоположение.

original: Tyrion: Once you do that,[p/] you just need to reveal it to everyone.
translation: Tyrion: И когда ты это сделаешь,[p/] просто прояви его для всех.

original: Celeste: Alright...[p/] I'll follow your lead then.
translation: Celeste: Хорошо...[p/] Я последую твоей зацепке.

original: Judge: So, Mr. Cuthbert?[p/] How do we proceed?
translation: Judge: И что теперь, мистер Катберт?[p/] Как мы продолжим процесс?

original: Judge: Your [i]previous[/i] witness brought about more revelations than I could have ever guessed.
translation: Judge: Ваш [i]прошлый[/i] свидетель привнёс множество откровений, которые я даже не мог предположить.

original: Judge: However,[p/] you still haven't given a substantial explanation about [i]how[/i] the murder occurred or [i]who[/i] actually did it.
translation: Judge: Однако,[p/] вы всё ещё не дели разумного объяснения тому, [i]как[/i] произошло убийство и [i]кто[/i] это сделал.

original: Tyrion: I understand that, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: Я понимаю, Ваша Честь.

original: Tyrion: But it will all make sense after I call my next witness.
translation: Tyrion: Но всё заимеет смысл после того, как я вызову следующего свидетеля.

original: Judge: ...[i]Another[/i] witness?
translation: Judge: ...[i]Ещё один[/i] свидетель?

original: Tyrion: I understand your hesitance, Your Honor.[p/] But everything that we've learned throughout these trials is finally coming together.
translation: Tyrion: Я понимаю ваше недовольство, Ваша Честь.[p/] Но всё, что мы выяснили через эти заседания, наконец-то сходятся в одну реку.

original: Tyrion: And this final witness will tie it all together in a perfect knot.
translation: Tyrion: И последний свидетель свяжет всё вместе в идеальный узел.

original: Tyrion: Your Honor.[p/] The prosecution calls Beatrice Frega to the stand.
translation: Tyrion: Ваша Честь.[p/] Обвинение вызывает Беатрис Фрегу к стойке.

original: Ruby: Seriously, Cuthbert?[p/] You went to [i]all[/i] that trouble just to end up calling my client to the stand?
translation: Ruby: Серьёзно, Катберт?[p/] Вы прошли через [i]все[/i] эти трудности просто ради того, чтобы вызвать моего клиента к стойке?

original: Tyrion: You and your client have the right to refuse, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: Вы и ваш клиент имеют право отказаться, мисс Тимора.

original: Tyrion: But I wonder how that will reflect on your client's character.
translation: Tyrion: Но мне интересно, как это отразиться на вашем клиенте.

original: It doesn't really matter.[p/] She's already standing here with Ms. Tymora.
translation: Это не важно.[p/] Она уже стоит рядом с мисс Тиморой.

original: You can carry out your plan regardless of what she decides to do.
translation: Ты можешь привести свой план в исполнение без учета из решения.

original: ...But it will have much more impact if you can bait her into lying on the stand.
translation: ...Но будет куда более внушительнее, если ты сможешь заставить её солгать за стойкой.

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ...

original: Ruby: My client says that she's willing to testify.
translation: Ruby: Мой клиент согласен дать показания.

original: Ruby: However,[p/] we would like to propose a short recess.
translation: Ruby: Однако,[p/] мы требуем небольшой перерыв.

original: Ruby: With these new developments,[p/] I'm sure you can understand that we have much to discuss.
translation: Ruby: Учитывая новые открытия,[p/] я уверена, вы понимаете, что нам следует многое обсудить.

original: Judge: Hm...[p/] I see no reason not to grant the defense's request.
translation: Judge: Хм...[p/] Я не вижу причин отвергать запрос защиты.

original: Celeste: Is this really okay?
translation: Celeste: Всё точно в порядке?

original: Celeste: If we give them time to prep,[p/] they might realize what we're doing.
translation: Celeste: Если мы дадим им время на подготовку,[p/] они могут догадаться, что мы задумали.

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] But I don't think we have anything to worry about.
translation: Tyrion: Я знаю...[p/] Но я не думаю, что нам есть, о чём волноваться.

original: You've been building a psychological profile of Beatrice since this case began.
translation: Ты составлял психологический профиль Беатрис с самого начала дела.

original: It's hard to read her expression and emotions,[p/] even [i]with[/i] the Eye of Horus.
translation: Её мысли эмоции сложно прочесть,[p/] даже [i]с помощью[/i] Глаза Горо.

original: She keeps herself guarded and keeps her true intentions unknown.
translation: Она держится настороже и скрывает свои настоящие помыслы.

original: She's powerful.[p/] More powerful than her father ever cared to admit.
translation: Она могущественна.[p/] Более могущественна, чем её отец мог бы признать.

original: Despite this,[p/] he tried to control her and put her inside a cage.
translation: Несмотря на это,[p/] он пытался контролировать её и закинуть в клетку.

original: ...But Beatrice Frega would never live in a cage.
translation: ...Но Беатрис Фрега никогда бы не пожелала жить взаперти.

original: She wanted freedom and control.[p/] And she would do whatever it took to get it.
translation: Она желала свободы и контроля.[p/] И она бы сделал что угодно во имя этого.

original: You're sure the accident that blinded her didn't help things.
translation: Ты уверен, что случайная потеря зрения ничего не изменила.

original: When everything was said and done,[p/] she abandoned everything.[p/] Her wealth,[p/] her status,[p/] her family.
translation: Когда всё было сказано и сделано,[p/] она всё бросила.[p/] Её состояние,[p/] её статус,[p/] её семью.

original: She could have waited.[p/] She could have gritted her teeth until it was her turn to lead House Frega.
translation: Она могла бы ждать.[p/] Она могла бы спрятать клыки, пока не настанет очередь возглавить Дом Фрега.

original: If she was willing,[p/] she could have even secretly pushed her father past the gates of death herself.
translation: Если она того пожелала,[p/] она могла бы сама тайно провести её отца к вратам смерти.

original: But she couldn't bear to live like that,[p/] even temporarily.
translation: Но она не могла вынести такой жизни,[p/] даже временно.

original: You have no idea why [i]this[/i] is how she chose to do that.
translation: Ты без понятия, почему [i]это[/i] стало тем, что она выбрала.

original: Perhaps it had something to do with their meeting...
translation: Возможно это как-то связано с их встречей...

original: But you do know one thing.
translation: Но в одном ты уверен точно.

original: Beatrice Frega will never put herself in a position of vulnerability.
translation: Беатрис Фрега никогда не позволит поставить себя в уязвимое положение.

original: If you endanger her freedom,[p/] she will make sure that she can "see" who she's up against.
translation: Если ты поставишь её свободу под угрозу,[p/] она убедится, что "увидит", с кем имеет дело.

original: Judge: In the interest of giving the defense time to deliberate,[p/] we will be taking an extended recess.
translation: Judge: В интересах дать защите время для подготовки,[p/] мы берём длительный перерыв.

original: Judge: Court is adjourned.
translation: Judge: Суд отклоняется.

original: As you were exiting the courtroom,[p/] you sent Celeste to do some reconnaissance.
translation: Как только ты вышел из зала суда,[p/] ты послал Селест на разведку.

original: It should be similar to when she scanned Valentina during the Nightgrave trial.
translation: Это должно быть также просто, как проверка Валентины во время суда Найтгрейва.

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: ...Тирион.

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] Were you able to see it?
translation: Tyrion: Селест.[p/] Ты смогла его увидеть?

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] It's definitely there.[p/] And it sits on her shoulder most of the time.
translation: Celeste: Да.[p/] Он точно там.[p/] И он сидит на её плече большую часть времени.

original: Tyrion: So she keeps it close to her...[p/] That's good to know.
translation: Tyrion: Значит, она держит его вблизи...[p/] Это хорошо знать.

original: Celeste: It looks kind of weird, though...[p/] But I've never used [b]Detect Magic[/b] like this before.
translation: Celeste: Хотя он выглядит довольно странным...[p/] Я никогда не использовала [b]Обнаружение Магии[/b] таким образом.

original: Well, you doubt that someone like her would choose a conventional animal,[p/] especially for something like this.
translation: Ну, ты сомневаешься, что кто-то, вроде неё, выбрал бы обычное животное,[p/] особенно для чего-то такого.

original: Ruby: ...Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ...Катберт.

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora...
translation: Tyrion: М-[p/][s/]Мисс Тимора...

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ...

original: Ruby: There's...[p/] something I need to show you.
translation: Ruby: Мне...[p/] нужно кое-что тебе показать.

original: Ruby: ... Preferably, alone.
translation: Ruby: ...Желательно, одному.

original: Celeste gives you a concerned look.[p/] But you nod to show her it's okay.
translation: Селест смотрит на тебя с волнением.[p/] Но ты киваешь ей, показывая, что всё нормально.

original: She moves to sit on the bench where she can keep an eye on Beatrice.
translation: Она отходит и садится на скамейку, откуда она следит за Беатрис.

original: Tyrion: ...Okay.[p/] Lead the way.
translation: Tyrion: ...Ладно.[p/] Веди.

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ...

original: Judge: Court is now resumed for the trial of Beatrice Frega.
translation: Judge: 现Judge: Суд возобновляет слушанье по делу Беатрис Фреги.

original: Tyrion: Is the defendant prepared to take the stand?
translation: Tyrion: Подсудимая готова занять стойку?

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ...

original: Tyrion: Tymora.[p/] I asked you a question.
translation: Tyrion: Тимора.[p/] Отвечайте на вопрос.

original: Tyrion: Is the defendant prepped or not?
translation: Tyrion: Подсудимая готова или нет?

original: Ruby: ...She is.[p/] If the prosecution still wants to move forward with-.
translation: Ruby:  ...Она готова.[p/] Если обвинение всё ещё желает перейти к-.

original: Tyrion: The prosecution [i]will[/i] be moving forward with this.[p/] Please bring in the witness.
translation: Tyrion: Обвинение [i]желает[/i] перейти к этому.[p/] Пожалуйста, приведите свидетеля.

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ...

original: Tyrion: Do you still see it, Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: Ты видишь его, Селест?

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] It's still there.[p/] Should I reveal it now?
translation: Celeste: Ага...[p/] Он всё ещё тут.[p/] Я должна показать его сейчас?

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] Let's really make a point of it.[p/] Wait for my signal.
translation: Tyrion: Нет...[p/] Стоит полностью обратить на это внимание.[p/] Жди моего сигнала.

original: Tyrion: Thank you for agreeing to take the stand, Ms. Frega.
translation: Tyrion: Спасибо, что согласились занять стойку, мисс Фрега.

original: Beatrice: ...Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Beatrice: ...Мистер Катберт.

original: Tyrion: It's my understanding that you were with the two princes for most of the night.
translation: Tyrion: Насколько я знаю, вы были с двумя принцами большую часть ночи.

original: Beatrice: Yes, I was.
translation: Beatrice: Да, это так.

original: Beatrice: Which is why I'm [i]still[/i] quite confused as to why I'm being charged for this crime.
translation: Beatrice: Из-за чего я [i]всё ещё[/i] не понимаю, почему меня обвиняют в убийстве.

original: Beatrice: Out of everyone there that night,[p/] I'd have thought my alibi was the most solid.
translation: Beatrice: Помимо всех других присутствующих той ночью,[p/] у меня было наиболее крепкое алиби.

original: Tyrion: ...That remains to be seen.
translation: Tyrion: ...Это ещё требуется рассмотреть.

original: Beatrice: Clearly.
translation: Beatrice: Определённо.

original: Tyrion: Anyways...[p/] Since you still maintain your innocence,[p/] you'll have no problem going into detail about your supposed alibi.
translation: Tyrion: Так или иначе...[p/] Раз уж вы настаиваете на своей невиновности,[p/] у нас не будет проблем уточнить детали вашего предполагаемого алиби.

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ...

original: Beatrice: As you know,[p/] I was with Crown Prince Aster and Prince Alaric for most of the Ball.
translation: Beatrice: Как вы знаете,[p/] я была с наследным принцем Астером и принцем Алариком большую часть Бала.

original: Beatrice: I went there after my meeting with my father.[p/] And I remained with them until I was arrested for his murder.
translation: Beatrice: Я пришла туда после встречи с моим отцом.[p/] И я была с ними, пока меня не арестовали из-за его убийства.

original: Beatrice: Lord Steelwind and the Kingsguard kept watch over me for the entire night as well.
translation: Beatrice: Лорд Стилвинд и Королевская Гвардия также следили за мной всю ночь.

original: Beatrice: I neither had the means nor the opportunity to steal the Sword of Spell Eating [i]and[/i] break into my father's study to murder him.
translation: Beatrice: И у меня не было мотива и возможности украсть Меч-Поглотитель Заклятий [i]и[/i] вломиться в кабинет моего отца, дабы убить его.

original: Tyrion: And [i]that[/i],[p/] Ms. Frega,[p/] is where you're mistaken.
translation: Tyrion: И [i]это[/i],[p/] мисс Фрега,[p/] ваша ошибка.

original: Tyrion: You definitely had the [i]means[/i] to commit both crimes while under the eye of everyone there that night.
translation: Tyrion: У вас точно был [i]мотив[/i] для совершения обоих преступлений, будучи на виду у всех.

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ...

original: The most effective tool an attorney has is revealing a contradiction in a witness's testimony.
translation: Наиболее эффективный инструмент, которым располагает адвокат - это выявление противоречия в показаниях свидетеля.

original: It not only completely shatters your opponent's argument.[p/] It also makes the court doubt whether the witness is acting in good faith.
translation: Это не только полностью опровергнет аргументы твоего оппонента.[p/] Это также заставит суд усомниться в том, что свидетель действует в благих намереньях.

original: Usually,[p/] you've used evidence to reveal contradictions like this.
translation: Обычно,[p/] тебе нужны доказательства для раскрытия подобного противоречия.

original: Tyrion: Now, Celeste!
translation: Tyrion: Сейчас, Селест!

original: Celeste: [b]Aburio[/b]!
translation: Celeste: [b]Aburio[/b]!

original: Beatrice: Wait...[p/] What are you doing?
translation: Beatrice: Постойте...[p/] Что вы делаете?

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] The witness's testimony is clearly-!
translation: Tyrion: Ваша Честь![p/][s/] Тут явное противоречие-!

original: Ruby: Oh my god![p/][s/] What the hell [i]is[/i] that thing?
translation: Ruby: Во имя бога![p/][s/] Что это, чёрт возьми, [i]такое[/i]?

original: Tyrion: U-[p/][s/]Um...
translation: Tyrion: Э-[p/][s/]Эм...

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/][s/] Get behind me!
translation: Celeste: Тирион![p/][s/] Стой позади!

original: Gallery: A-[p/][s/]A monster![p/][s/] It's a monster!
translation: Gallery: М-[p/][s/]Монстр![p/][s/] Это монстр!

original: Gallery: Someone call the Inquisition,[p/][s/] t-[p/][s/]the Kingsguard,[p/][s/] a-[p/][s/]anyone!
translation: Gallery: Кто-нибудь, вызовите Инквизицию,[p/][s/] К-[p/][s/] Королевскую Гвардию,[p/][s/] к-[p/][s/]кого-нибудь!

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] Can you [i]please[/i] restore order!
translation: Tyrion: Ваша Честь![p/][s/] [i]Прошу вас[/i], затребовать порядок!

original: Tyrion: ...Your Honor?
translation: Tyrion: ...Ваша Честь?

original: MBeatrice: Yeah...[p/] He fled out the back door the moment he saw me.
translation: MBeatrice: Ха...[p/] Он сбежал в дверь, как только увидел меня.

original: Ruby: I-[p/][s/]It can talk?!
translation: Ruby: О-[p/][s/]Оно говорит?!

original: Gallery: I-[p/][s/]It's a demon![p/][s/] It must be!
translation: Gallery: Э-[p/][s/]Это демон![p/][s/] Это точно он!

original: Gallery: It's just like the legends say!
translation: Gallery: Прямо, как гласили легенды!

original: Tyrion: Can we [i]all[/i] just calm down?!
translation: Tyrion: Мы можем [i]все[/i] просто успокоиться?!

original: It takes a while before you can get everyone in the room to settle down.
translation: Заняло некоторое время, чтобы вернуть всех в зал и вернутся на свои места.

original: Eventually,[p/] it was clear that the "demon" wasn't intent on harming anyone...[p/] At least not yet.
translation: Оказалось,[p/] что этот "демон" не желал причинять вреда...[p/] По крайней мере сейчас.

original: The court ordered extra guards just in case.[p/] And you're eventually able to bring everyone back to the courtroom.
translation: Суд приказал усилить охрану, на всякий случай.[p/] И вы наконец-то смогли вернуть зал суда к порядку.

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert![p/][s/] What is the meaning of this?!
translation: Judge: Мистер Катберт![p/][s/] Что всё это значит?!

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] I didn't know it was a-...
translation: Tyrion: П-[p/][s/]Простите...[p/] Я не знал, что это-...

original: Tyrion: Actually...[p/] What [i]are[/i] you?
translation: Tyrion: Вообще...[p/] Что вы [i]такое[/i]?

original: Judge: Are you a d-[p/][s/]d-[p/][s/]d-[p/][s/]demon?!
translation: Judge: Вы правда д-[p/][s/]д-[p/][s/]д-[p/][s/]демон?!

original: MBeatrice: Why, yes.[p/] *laugh*[p/] I [i]am[/i] a d-[p/]d-[p/]d-[p/]demon.
translation: MBeatrice: Ну, конечно.[p/] *смех*[p/] Я [i]настоящий[/i] д-[p/]д-[p/]д-[p/]демон.

original: Gallery: Demons actually exist?!
translation: Gallery: Демоны и в правду существуют?!

original: Gallery: I thought they were only a legend...!
translation: Gallery: Я думал, это лишь легенды...!

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/] Not only [i]do[/i] demons exist,[p/] the defendant has made one into her familiar.
translation: Tyrion: Ваша Честь![p/] Демоны не только [i]существуют[/i],[p/] но подсудимая также сделал его своим фамильяром.

original: Tyrion: She's only blind in the literal sense![p/][s/] She's constantly looking through the eyes of her familiar to see!
translation: Tyrion: Она слепая только в буквальном смысле![p/][s/] Она постоянно смотрит через глаза своего фамильяра, чтобывидеть!

original: Ruby: ...And?
translation: Ruby: ...И?

original: Tyrion: What do you mean "and"?!
translation: Tyrion: Что значит ваше "и"?!

original: Tyrion: It's pretty obvious that making a pact with a [i]demon[/i] is incriminating by itself.
translation: Tyrion: Довольно очевидно, что заключение договора с [i]демоном[/i] само по себе подозрительно.

original: Ruby: Tell me, Your Honor.[p/] Do the laws of Wyverngarde prohibit entering an accord with a demon?
translation: Ruby: Расскажите мне, Ваша Честь.[p/] Законы Вивернгарда запрещают вступать в контакт с демоном?

original: Judge: T-[p/][s/]They don't,[p/] but-.
translation: Judge: Н-[p/][s/]Нет,[p/] но-.

original: Ruby: Then my client has committed no crime.
translation: Ruby: Тогда мой клиент не совершал преступления.

original: MBeatrice: Even so,[p/] I really would have preferred [i]not[/i] revealing Marrunath like that.
translation: MBeatrice: Даже так,[p/] я желала [i]избежать[/i] раскрытия Марруната таким образом.

original: Tyrion: "Marrunath".[p/] Is [i]that[/i] your name?
translation: Tyrion: "Маррунат".[p/] [i]Это[/i] твоё имя?

original: MBeatrice: ...It is what most people call me.
translation: MBeatrice: ...Это то, как меня зовут люди.

original: Tyrion: I suppose you have a point, Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: Думаю, тут вы правы, Тимора.

original: Tyrion: Having a demon as your familiar isn't technically illegal.
translation: Tyrion: Заиметь демона в качестве фамильяра, формально, законно.

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] this [i]does[/i] prove that the defendant had a way to commit the murder,[p/] all while under the eye of everyone in the Ballroom.
translation: Tyrion: Однако,[p/] это [i]точно[/i] доказывает, что у подсудимой был способ совершить убийство,[p/] будучи на виду у всех в бальном зале.

original: Tyrion: She could have sent Marrunath upstairs to the Gallery and then had him steal the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Tyrion: Она могла послать Марруната наверх - на выставку - и заставить его украсть Меч-Поглотитель Заклятий.

original: Tyrion: After that,[p/] they would just need to traverse the vents into William's Study,[p/] just like Eugene did that night.
translation: Tyrion: Затем,[p/] они могли бы просто пробраться через вентиляцию в кабинет Уильяма,[p/] как это сделал Юджин.

original: Ruby: The fact that her familiar is a demon [i]proves[/i] that she couldn't have done that.
translation: Ruby: Факт того, что её фамильяр - демон, [i]доказывает[/i], что она не смогла бы этого сделать.

original: Tyrion: ...What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: ...О чём вы говорите?

original: Ruby: You saw how everyone reacted when they saw Marrunath's form.
translation: Ruby: Вы видели реакцию всех на форму Марруната.

original: Ruby: A monkey may have raised some eyebrows.[p/] But someone [i]surely[/i] would have reported Marrunath if they saw him.
translation: Ruby: Обезьянка может и вызвало небольшое удивление.[p/] Но кто-то бы [i]точно[/i] сообщил о Маррунате, если бы увидел его.

original: Tyrion: Tymora.[p/] Your client is a master of [b]illusion[/b] magic.[p/] Can I assume that we'll find [b]Invisibility[/b] in her [b]Spell Compendium[/b]?
translation: Tyrion: Тимора.[p/] Ваш клиент - мастер магии [b]иллюзии[/b].[p/] Могу я предположить, что мы найдём [b]Невидимость[/b] в её [b]Компендиуме[/b]?

original: Ruby: ...You might.
translation: Ruby: ...Можете.

original: Tyrion: And with the connection granted by [b]Familial Bond[/b],[p/] she could have cast this spell on him [i]regardless[/i] of where each of them was.
translation: Tyrion: И учитывая связью, полученной от [b]Родственных Уз[/b],[p/] она могла бы использовать это заклинание на нём [i]вне зависимости[/i] от того, где он был.

original: Ruby: ...I'll admit that my client [i]does[/i] know how to cast [b]Invisibility[/b].
translation: Ruby: ...Я признаю, что мой клиент [i]действительно[/i] способен использовать [b]Невидимость[/b].

original: Ruby: But your theory raises another question.[p/] Could my client [i]continue[/i] casting it unnoticed?
translation: Ruby: Но ваша теория производит ещё один вопрос.[p/] Как мой клиент могу [i]продолжать[/i] использовать это заклинание незаметно?

original: Tyrion: "[i]Continue[/i] casting it"?
translation: Tyrion: "[i]Продолжать[/i] использовать"?

original: Ruby: You'll understand once I go over the order of events that night.
translation: Ruby: Вы всё поймёте, когда я пройдусь о событиях той ночи.

original: Ruby: At an unknown time,[p/] someone stole the Sword of Spell Eating from the Haroldson Gallery.
translation: Ruby: В неизвестное время,[p/] кто-то украл Меч-Поглотитель Заклятий из выставки Харольдсона.

original: Ruby: Due to the timing of this,[p/] I'll admit that it [i]would[/i] be logically consistent [i]if[/i] my client was the thief.
translation: Ruby: Учитывая временной промежуток,[p/] я признаю, что [i]было бы[/i] логически непротиворечиво, что мой клиент [i]может быть[/i] вором.

original: Ruby: However,[p/] sometime later,[p/] my client met with the Crown Prince and was watched closely by the Kingsguard.
translation: Ruby: Однако,[p/] некоторое время позже,[p/] мой клиент встретил наследного принца и внимательно наблюдалась Королевской Гвардией.

original: Ruby: From witness accounts,[p/] [i]including[/i] yours,[p/] we know that this happened at 12:45 AM.
translation: Ruby: По словам свидетелей,[p/] [i]включая[/i] ваши,[p/] мы знаем, что это случилось в 0:45.

original: Ruby: And since this time,[p/] my client didn't leave the Kingsguards' sight.
translation: Ruby: И с того момента мой клиент не пропадал из виду Королевской Гвардии.

original: Ruby: It was around this time that William Frega retreated into his study and locked the door.
translation: Ruby: Примерно в это же время Уильям Фрега удалился в свой кабинет и закрыл дверь.

original: Ruby: He made a point of telling everyone that he didn't want to be disturbed.
translation: Ruby: Он ясно дал знать всем, что не хочет, чтобы его беспокоили.

original: Ruby: Then at 1:03 AM,[p/] Lord Haroldson finally discovered that the Sword was stolen.
translation: Ruby: Затем, в 1:03,[p/] лорд Харольдсон наконец-то обнаружил, что Меч был украден.

original: Ruby: He reported the theft to the Kingsguard and they activated the lockdown system.
translation: Ruby: Он сообщил о краже Королевской Гвардии и они активировала систему изоляции.

original: Ruby: Shortly after the report,[p/] Laefe Frega tried to speak with her father about the theft.
translation: Ruby: Незадолго после сообщения,[p/] Лаеф Фрега попыталась поговорить со своим отцом о воре.

original: Ruby: William Frega reiterated that he did not want to be disturbed.
translation: Ruby: Уильям Фрега повторил, что не хочет, чтобы его беспокоили.

original: Ruby: Laefe saw his face.[p/] And there weren't any traces of [b]illusion[/b] directly on his body.
translation: Ruby: Лаеф видела его лицо.[p/] И на его теле не было найдено прямых следов [b]иллюзии[/b].

original: Ruby: This means that William Frega was still alive at this time.
translation: Ruby: Это значит, что Уильям Фрега всё ещё был жив в тот момент.

original: Ruby: Unbeknownst to everyone at the time,[p/] William Frega was attacked by the murderer at 3:12 AM.
translation: Ruby: Без ведома для всех в то время,[p/] Уильям Фрега был атакован убийцей в 3:12.

original: Ruby: This is confirmed not only by Jan Hughes's testimony.[p/] But also by the Autopsy Report.
translation: Ruby: Это подтверждается не только показаниями Яна Хьюза.[p/] Но также и протоколом вскрытия.

original: Ruby: Then at 3:26 AM,[p/] the Kingsguard found the Sword of Spell Eating in my client's old room.
translation: Ruby: Затем, в 3:26,[p/] Королевская Гвардия находит Меч-Поглотитель Заклятий в старой комнате моего клиента.

original: Ruby: The Kingsguard tried to arrest my client for this.[p/] But the Crown Prince told them to stand down.
translation: Ruby: Королевская Гвардия попыталась арестовать моего клиента.[p/] Но наследный принц приказал им остановится.

original: Ruby: Finally at 3:36 AM,[p/] the lockdown was lifted.
translation: Ruby: И, наконец, в 3:36,[p/] изоляция была отключена.

original: Ruby: Jan Hughes reported what he heard.[p/] And that's when the Inquisition and the Kingsguard discovered the body.
translation: Ruby: Ян Хьюз доложил о случившемся.[p/] И именно тогда Инквизиция и Королевская Гвардия обнаружила тело.

original: Ruby: The theft must have happened before 1:23 AM:[p/] when it was actually reported.
translation: Ruby: Вероятно, кража произошло до 1:23:[p/] время, когда о ней сообщили.

original: Ruby: In order to keep Marrunath concealed at every step,[p/] my client would have needed to keep him invisible from 1:03 AM to 3:12 AM.
translation: Ruby: И чтобы Маррунат смог совершить каждый шаг,[p/] моему клиенту было необходимо держать его в невидимости с 1:03 до 3:12.

original: Ruby: Not only that,[p/] she needed Marrunath to wield the Sword of Spell Eating to ignore the effects of the [b]Anti-Magic Fields[/b].
translation: Ruby: И не только это,[p/] ей также было нужно, чтобы Маррунат носил Меч-Поглотитель Заклятий при себе, дабы избежать эффекта [b]Анти-Магических Полей[/b].

original: Ruby: This means he would need to be invisible for more than an hour.
translation: Ruby: Это значит, что ему нужно было бы невидимым более часа.

original: Tyrion: What's your point?
translation: Tyrion: К чему вы ведёте?

original: Ruby: My point is that [b]Invisibility[/b] has a duration of one hour.
translation: Ruby: 我的论点是，[b]隐形术[/b]只能持续一个小时。

original: Ruby: I'll admit that my client [i]could[/i] have cast [b]Invisibility[/b] before she met with the Crown Prince.
translation: Ruby: 我承认，我的委托人<u>有可能</u>在遇见王储殿下之前施展[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Ruby: But if she wanted to [i]keep[/i] Marrunath invisible,[p/] she would have needed to recast the spell at some point that night.
translation: Ruby: 但如果她要让马鲁纳斯<u>保持</u>隐形状态，[p/]就必须在某个时间点重新施展法术。

original: Ruby: And as you know,[p/] my client couldn't have done so during that night without the Kingsguard noticing it.
translation: Ruby: 你也知道，[p/]我的委托人不可能在国王卫队的眼皮子底下这么做。

original: Tyrion: Your logic makes sense...
translation: Tyrion: 你的逻辑合理……

original: Tyrion: But that can only mean that the defendant refreshed the [b]Invisibility[/b] [i]right[/i] in front of everyone watching.
translation: Tyrion: 但这只能意味着，被告在<u>被监视</u>的情况下，依然得以重新施展[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Judge: In front of the entire Kingsguard,[p/] the two princes,[p/] [i]and[/i] Lucio Steelwind?
translation: Judge: 在国王卫队，[p/]两名王子，[p/]<u>还有</u>卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德面前？

original: Tyrion: As unlikely as it is,[p/] it's the only conclusion I can come to.
translation: Tyrion: 听起来很不可能，[p/]但这是我能得出的唯一结论。

original: Ruby: I had a feeling you'd say that,[p/] which is why we have a witness who can confirm that Beatrice didn't perform any magic that night.
translation: Ruby: 我早就觉得你会这么说，[p/]所以辩方准备了一名证人，可以证明比亚特丽丝当晚没有使用任何法术。

original: Tyrion: ...A witness?
translation: Tyrion: ……一名证人？

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] The defense would like to call Prince Alaric to the stand.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]辩方希望传唤阿拉里克王子作证。

original: Judge: I-[p/][s/]I...[p/] see.
translation: Judge: 我、[p/][s/]我……[p/]明白了。

original: Judge: ...He would have certainly been close enough to notice the defendant casting magic.
translation: Judge: ……他肯定与被告距离很近，可以立刻发现她是否在施展法术。

original: Judge: But wouldn't the [i]Crown[/i] Prince's testimony be more suitable?
translation: Judge: 但找<u>王储殿下</u>作证不是更合适吗？

original: Ruby: Are you trying to say that Prince Alaric is unqualified to give proper testimony, Your Honor?
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，你是在说阿拉里克王子不够格给出证言吗？

original: Of course, he's saying that![p/][s/] The kid is seven years old!
translation: 他当然是这个意思！[p/][s/]那孩子只有七岁！

original: Judge: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] Of course not!
translation: Judge: 不、[p/][s/]不！[p/][s/]当然不是！

original: Judge: I-[p/][s/]Is the prince ready to testify?
translation: Judge: 王、[p/][s/]王子殿下准备好作证了吗？

original: Grow a spine, for Lord's sake!
translation: 巨龙在上，有点骨气吧！

original: Tyrion: Thank you for coming in, Prince Alaric.[p/] Could you please-?
translation: Tyrion: 感谢您的到来，阿拉里克王子。[p/]能否请您——？

original: Alaric: Hold your tongue, knave!
translation: Alaric: 闭嘴，坏蛋！

original: Alaric: You will speak when you are spoken to.
translation: Alaric: 我让你说话了才能说话。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: Oh, god...[p/] He sounds exactly like Miriam when we first met her...
translation: Celeste: 天啊……[p/]他和米莉亚姆第一次见我们时一模一样……

original: Honestly...[p/] he behaves exactly how you'd expect a prince of this rotten kingdom to act.
translation: 老实说……[p/]你也没指望一个腐败国度的王子能好到哪儿去。

original: Aster's the odd one out in this situation.[p/] It makes you wonder what made [i]him[/i] so down to earth.
translation: 阿斯特才算是异类，[p/]你反而好奇<u>他</u>为什么会这么平易近人。

original: Judge: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] Your Highness.
translation: Judge: 呃、[p/][s/]呃……[p/]王子殿下。

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert believes that the defendant used her magic while she was with you and the Crown Prince.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生认为，被告与你和王储殿下在一起时使用过魔法。

original: Alaric: I already gave my statement to the instigators.
translation: Alaric: 我已经对雕茶员给出过证词了。

original: Alaric: This man [i]dares[/i] to question my testimony?!
translation: Alaric: 这个男的<u>胆敢</u>质疑我的证言？！

original: Judge: Yes.[p/] He said it.[p/] Not me.
translation: Judge: 是的。[p/]他说的。[p/]不是我。

original: Wow...[p/] The judge didn't even think twice about throwing you under.
translation: 我天……[p/]法官眼睛都不眨就把你给卖了。

original: Alaric: But very well.[p/] If my testimony is required to strike down these redundant accusations,[p/] I will bestow it upon you.
translation: Alaric: 但很好。[p/]如果需要我的证言来摧毁这些黄糖的指控，[p/]那我就大发慈悲再说一遍。

original: Tyrion: "Redundant"...?[p/] Don't you mean "ridiculous"?
translation: Tyrion: “黄糖”……？[p/]你想说“荒唐”？

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Do [i]not[/i] dare to suppose what His Highness really means!
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]你<u>不准</u>揣测王子殿下的潜台词！

original: Tyrion: ...His boots must be shining from all that licking you're doing.
translation: Tyrion: ……这么喜欢拍马屁，王子都要被你拍上天了。

original: Judge: What was that?
translation: Judge: 你说什么？

original: Tyrion: Nothing.
translation: Tyrion: 没什么。

original: Alaric: You think Lady Frega cast magic right in front of me?[p/] Don't be a serf!
translation: Alaric: 你觉得弗雷加小姐在我面前用过魔法？[p/]真是凰诞！

original: Alaric: She was under the careful watch of the Kingsguard,[p/] my brother,[p/] [i]and[/i] Lord Steelwind!
translation: Alaric: 她当时被国王卫队，[p/]我的哥哥，[p/]<u>还有</u>斯蒂尔文德勋爵看着！

original: Alaric: We conversed for the whole night and I didn't see her cast [i]any[/i] magic.
translation: Alaric: 我们昨晚一直在交谈，我根本没看见她施展<u>任何</u>魔法。

original: Alaric: She's been through so much over the last few years...[p/] All because of her horrid father...
translation: Alaric: 她过去几年经历了很多事……[p/]都怪她那个可恶的父亲……

original: Alaric: She'd never do something like this![p/][s/] You [i]and[/i] Lady Steelwind are just jealous!
translation: Alaric: 她绝对不会做这种事！[p/][s/]你<u>和</u>斯蒂尔文德小姐只是嫉妒她！

original: He seems really convinced that he didn't see anything.[p/] You doubt that he's [i]intentionally[/i] lying.
translation: 他看起来确信自己什么都没看见。[p/]你不觉得他是<u>有意</u>在撒谎。

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] Usually when you cast [b]Detect Magic[/b],[p/] I can see magical energies overlaying your eyes.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]一般你在使用[b]法术探测[/b]时，[p/]我都能看见你眼睛里的魔法能量。

original: Celeste: Yeah,[p/] there's always a visible magical effect on the target when I cast a spell.
translation: Celeste: 是的，[p/]被施法的目标上一定会有明显的魔法效果。

original: Tyrion: But Marrunath was probably in another room.[p/] The Kingsguard wouldn't see the initial magical effect of [b]Invisibility[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 但马鲁纳斯当时大概在别的房间里。[p/]国王卫队是看不见[b]隐形术[/b]施展时的魔法效果的。

original: Celeste: Even if there wasn't a visible effect in that room,[p/] she would have still needed to say the incantation and perform the gesture with her hands.
translation: Celeste: 即使房间内没有明显的魔法效果，[p/]她也还是需要吟唱咒语，摆出正确手势。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] Like how you shout [b]Reperio Arcanum[/b] every time you scan a crime scene...
translation: Tyrion: 对……[p/]就像你每次扫描现场时都会大喊 [b]Reperio Arcanum[/b] 一样……

original: Celeste: I don't [i]shout[/i] it.
translation: Celeste: 我没有<u>大喊</u>。

original: Anyways,[p/] she must have done the incantation and gesture at [i]some[/i] point during the night.
translation: 总之，[p/]她那天晚上一定在<u>某个时刻</u>吟唱了咒语，并摆出正确手势。

original: Did she ever get an opportunity to conceal herself to do so?
translation: 她有没有机会神不知鬼不觉地这么做？

original: He probably meant "Don't be absurd"...[p/] But there's not much to gain from correcting him.
translation: 他应该是想说“荒诞”……[p/]但揪他的错字也没什么用。

original: Tyrion: You may think the idea is absurd, Your Highness.[p/] But the defendant was clearly good at keeping secrets.
translation: Tyrion: 王子殿下，也许你会觉得这个想法很荒诞。[p/]但被告在隐藏秘密方面可以说是专家。

original: Tyrion: She could have easily concealed her actions at some point during the night.
translation: Tyrion: 她可能在那晚神不知鬼不觉地完成了施法。

original: Tyrion: A brief moment to say the incantation and perform the gesture would have been all she needed.
translation: Tyrion: 只需要迅速完成吟唱，再摆出手势，施法就完成了。

original: Alaric: But I wasn't the only one watching her!
translation: Alaric: 但我不是唯一一个看着她的人！

original: Tyrion: But would they have really noticed her casting one spell?
translation: Tyrion: 这些人真能察觉她施展了一个法术吗？

original: Alaric: The Kingsguard are the most vigilant knights in the kingdom.
translation: Alaric: 国王卫队是全王国最优秀的骑士。

original: Alaric: They are [i]trained[/i] to watch and counter a mage's spell.
translation: Alaric: 他们专门接受过发现并反制法师施法的<u>训练</u>。

original: Tyrion: But the defendant needed to target someone who was in another area.
translation: Tyrion: 但被告当时的施法目标身处其他区域。

original: Tyrion: There would be no visual indication that she was using magic.
translation: Tyrion: 用肉眼是看不出她是否在施法的。

original: Alaric: But she would have still needed to perform the incantation and complete the gesture with her hands.
translation: Alaric: 但她依然需要吟唱咒语，摆出正确手势。

original: He's pretty knowledgeable about the Arcane Arts.[p/] But as a prince of Wyverngarde,[p/] you suppose that's to be expected.
translation: 关于奥术他还挺了解的。[p/]也许维文加德的王子都会接受相关教育。

original: Tyrion: If I recall correctly,[p/] you and your brother were with her until she was arrested for the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我没记错，[p/]她在因谋杀被逮捕之前，都一直与你和你哥哥待在一起。

original: Tyrion: What did you speak about?
translation: Tyrion: 你们都聊了什么？

original: Alaric: She told us stories about what she did while she was away.
translation: Alaric: 她给我们讲了自己离家期间的故事。

original: Alaric: She was researching something...[p/] I forgot what she said.[p/] Something about "the old cult".
translation: Alaric: 她在研究什么……[p/]我忘了具体名字。[p/]但是个和“玄乎学”有关的东西。

original: Tyrion: Do you mean "the occult"?
translation: Tyrion: 你是想说“玄学”？

original: Alaric: Yes.[p/] That's it.
translation: Alaric: 啊对。[p/]就这个。

original: Alaric: She was researching ghosts and demons.
translation: Alaric: 她在研究幽灵与恶魔。

original: Considering who her familiar is,[p/] her research must have paid off.
translation: 考虑到她的使魔，[p/]研究应该是成果卓著。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] Your Highness,[p/] could you please add this to your testimony?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]王子殿下，[p/]能不能把这补充到证言里？

original: Alaric: If I must.
translation: Alaric: 行吧。

original: Tyrion: Wouldn't saying "the occult [i]is[/i] a fascinating phenomenon" be more grammatically correct?
translation: Tyrion: “非常极度”是不是语义重复了？

original: Celeste: Come on, Tyrion...[p/] Don't be one of those guys that corrects other people's grammar.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，别这样……[p/]不要天天出警别人的语法。

original: Alaric: Yeah...[p/] We all say things incongruently sometimes.
translation: Alaric: 就是的……[p/]谁偶尔都会说点格格不入的东西嘛。

original: You feel like he [i]might[/i] be projecting a little.
translation: 感觉他是在推卸责任……

original: Tyrion: You're clearly sympathetic to her situation.
translation: Tyrion: 你显然很同情她的处境。

original: Tyrion: But you must have only been a toddler when she left five years ago.
translation: Tyrion: 但她五年前离开的时候，你还是个小婴儿吧。

original: Alaric: My brother spoke of her a lot.[p/] He told me all about her.
translation: Alaric: 我哥哥经常提起她，[p/]给我说了很多关于她的事。

original: Alaric: I could tell from his face.[p/] He was really sad that she ran away.
translation: Alaric: 从他的表情就能看出来，[p/]哥哥对她离开一事感到很伤心。

original: Even if it's not romantic,[p/] Aster clearly cares about her a lot.
translation: 即使不是恋爱情感，[p/]阿斯特也明显很关心她。

original: The prosecutor must have complicated feelings about that.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德检察官对这一点大概感到五味杂陈。

original: Tyrion: ...Well, I can't speak for Ms. Steelwind,[p/] but [i]I'm[/i] just trying to get to the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 哎，我不能代表斯蒂尔文德女士。[p/]但<u>我个人</u>只是想找出真相。

original: Alaric: Liar![p/][s/] You just hate her because she's a noble, don't you!
translation: Alaric: 撒谎！[p/][s/]你因为她是个贵族就讨厌她！

original: Alaric: Lord von Sanctus told me all about you![p/][s/] You just want to lock nobles up because you're jealous of how much gold we have!
translation: Alaric: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵全告诉我了！[p/][s/]你嫉妒我们富有，就想把贵族全关进监狱！

original: So he speaks with von Sanctus frequently.
translation: 所以说他经常和冯·桑克图斯交谈。

original: That actually explains a lot about his personality...
translation: 也能解释他怎么会是这种性格……

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] What do you usually need to do to cast a spell?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特。[p/]你施法通常都需要什么？

original: Celeste: There are a lot of factors involved honestly...[p/] Stamina and focus are a big part of it.
translation: Celeste: 老实说要考虑很多东西……[p/]精力与专注是很大一部分。

original: Tyrion: Assuming that she's in perfect condition,[p/] what's the bare minimum that she would need to do?
translation: Tyrion: 假设她当时万事俱备，[p/]最低限度需要做什么？

original: Celeste: Well she would have to focus her magic,[p/] say the incantation,[p/] and perform the gesture with her hands.[p/] All at the same time.
translation: Celeste: 那她得专注于自己的魔力，[p/]吟唱咒语，[p/]用手摆出手势。[p/]三项都需要在同一时间完成。

original: That [i]does[/i] sound pretty conspicuous...[p/] But she must have hidden it somehow.
translation: <u>确实</u>听起来非常复杂……[p/]但她肯定有瞒天过海的方法。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: To cast a spell a mage needs to speak an incantation.[p/] But there's nothing that says you can't say anything before or after it.
translation: 法师施法时需要吟唱咒语。[p/]但没有规定说这之前或之后不能说其他东西。

original: Tyrion: Your Highness.[p/] According to your testimony,[p/] the defendant told you that "The occult are a fascinating phenomena".
translation: Tyrion: 王子殿下。[p/]根据你的证言，[p/]被告对你说“玄学是一门非常极度引人入胜的学问”。

original: Tyrion: Is that exactly what she said?[p/] Word for word?
translation: Tyrion: 她就是这么说的吗？[p/]一个字不差？

original: Alaric: Yes.[p/] The stories she told us were quite interesting.
translation: Alaric: 是的。[p/]她给我们讲的故事很有趣。

original: Alaric: They really stuck a court with me.
translation: Alaric: 让我心驰神往。

original: Tyrion: I see...
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了……

original: Tyrion: Well, even [i]if[/i] they were interesting,[p/] your testimony proves that she [i]did[/i] cast the [b]Invisibility[/b] spell that night.
translation: Tyrion: 哎，<u>就算</u>这些故事很有趣。[p/]但你的证言恰恰证明，她那晚<u>确实</u>施展了[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Alaric: Are you deaf?![p/][s/] I already told you!
translation: Alaric: 你是聋子吗？！[p/][s/]我都说了！

original: Alaric: No one heard her say any incantations![p/][s/] Nor did they see her perform any gestures!
translation: Alaric: 没人听到过她吟唱任何咒语！[p/][s/]她也没有做出任何手势！

original: Tyrion: Unfortunately,[p/] your testimony proves the contrary.
translation: Tyrion: 很遗憾，[p/]你的证言不是这么表明的。

original: Tyrion: Beatrice Frega said an incantation and performed a gesture right in front of you,[p/] all without anyone even knowing it.
translation: Tyrion: 在其他人完全没发现的情况下，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加就在你眼前吟唱了咒语，摆出了手势。

original: Alaric: ...What?
translation: Alaric: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Your Highness.[p/] There are two components required to cast [b]Invisibility[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 王子殿下。[p/]施展[b]隐形术[/b]有两个要求。

original: Tyrion: First,[p/] the caster must speak the incantation "[b]O-kult-arr-ae[/b]" and clap both of their hands together.
translation: Tyrion: 首先，[p/]施法者必须吟唱“[b]Chi-ang-gee[/b]”，同时还需拍击双手。

original: Tyrion: As I'm sure you noticed,[p/] the defendant has a habit of clapping both of her hands to calm herself.
translation: Tyrion: 我想你肯定也注意到了，[p/]被告有拍击双手让自己冷静的习惯。

original: Tyrion: Now that I think about it,[p/] that habit must have come from constantly casting the spell.
translation: Tyrion: 现在想想，[p/]产生这一习惯的原因，可能就是常年施展[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: The defendant requires Marrunath to see.[p/] So she must constantly cast [b]Invisibility[/b] to keep him invisible.
translation: Tyrion: 证人需要通过马鲁纳斯观察外界，[p/]所以她一定在持续施展[b]隐形术[/b]使之隐身。

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] You may have an explanation for how she hid the gesture.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特。[p/]你也许能解释她是怎么隐藏手势的。

original: Ruby: But she would've still needed to speak the incantation.
translation: Ruby: 但她依然需要吟唱咒语。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] she [i]did[/i] speak the incantation.[p/] The witness's testimony proves it.
translation: Tyrion: 没错，[p/]她<u>确实</u>说出了咒语。[p/]证人的证词就是根据。

original: Alaric: What are you talking about?![p/][s/] I never said that she spoke [i]any[/i] incantation!
translation: Alaric: 你在说什么呢？！[p/][s/]我根本没听她吟唱过任何咒语！

original: Tyrion: Your Highness.[p/] The incantation for [b]Invisibility[/b] is "[b]O-kult-arr-ae[/b]".
translation: Tyrion: 王子殿下。[p/][b]隐形术[/b]的咒语是“[b]Chi-ang-gee[/b]”。

original: Tyrion: Now recall what you said in your testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 请您回忆一下自己作证时说了什么。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Tyrion: She said,[p/] "The [b]occult are a[/b] fascinating phenomena".[p/] The pronunciation of that one phrase is identical to the incantation!
translation: Tyrion: 她说，[p/]“玄学是一门[b]非常极度[/b]引人入胜的学问”。[p/]“非常极度”中“常极”的发音与咒语完全一致！

original: Judge: I see...[p/] So she hid the incantation in her conversation.
translation: Judge: 我明白了……[p/]她在说话时偷偷吟唱了咒语。

original: Tyrion: And because her target was a creature that was [i]outside[/i] of the Ballroom,[p/][s/] no one saw the magical effects.
translation: Tyrion: 由于目标是舞厅<u>之外的</u>生物，也没人能看见魔法的效果。

original: Tyrion: This means that Marrunath had the means to murder William Frega,[p/][s/] just as Eugene did!
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着和尤金一样，马鲁纳斯也有可能杀害威廉·弗雷加！

original: Ruby: Having the means is completely different from actually having done it, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 有可能和实际做了是两码事，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: Very few people had the ability to shatter the display case to steal the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Tyrion: 只有几个人有能力打破展柜，偷走噬法之剑。

original: Tyrion: And even fewer people had a familiar small enough to traverse the vents.
translation: Tyrion: 有个体型小到可以钻进通风管道的使魔的人就更少了。

original: Ruby: Which also makes Haroldson's familiar an equally likely suspect.
translation: Ruby: 那哈罗德森的使魔也同样可疑。

original: Ruby: And unlike my [i]client's[/i] familiar,[p/] he admitted to breaking into William's Study that night.
translation: Ruby: 与我的<u>委托人的</u>使魔不同，[p/]他也承认自己那晚闯入了威廉的书房。

original: Tyrion: If your client's familiar is truly innocent,[p/] then why not have him testify before the court?
translation: Tyrion: 如果你的委托人的使魔是无辜的，[p/]为什么不让他来作证？

original: Judge: I see...[p/][s/] Well, it's not as if he's the [i]first[/i] unprecedented witness we've had today.
translation: Judge: 我明白了……[p/][s/]哎，反正他也不是今天<u>第一个</u>史无前例的证人。

original: Judge: Is...[p/] Marrunath willing to testify, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Judge: 那么……[p/]马鲁纳斯准备好作证了吗，泰摩拉女士？

original: You see Tymora deliberating with Beatrice and Marrunath.
translation: 你看到泰摩拉与比亚特丽丝和马鲁纳斯在商量什么。

original: You can't hear what they're saying,[p/] but they're clearly in disagreement with each other.
translation: 你听不清她们在说什么，[p/]但双方明显产生了分歧。

original: Marrunath in particular,[p/] seems to be the most vocal about his displeasure.
translation: 尤其是马鲁纳斯，[p/]他看起来正在表达强烈不满。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] Unfortunately,[p/] Marrunath is unwilling to testify.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]很遗憾，[p/]但马鲁纳斯不愿意作证。

original: Tyrion: ...Why the change of heart?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么改主意了？

original: Ruby: My client's familiar may be a demon.[p/] But he's afforded the same rights as any other person.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人的使魔可能是个恶魔。[p/]但他和其他人类有着相同的权利。

original: Ruby: He is not obligated to testify.
translation: Ruby: 他并没有作证的义务。

original: You look at Marrunath and he's grinding his very sharp teeth together.
translation: 你看向马鲁纳斯，他正咬着自己锐利的牙齿。

original: For some reason,[p/] he appears to be looking at you with intense hatred.
translation: 不知怎么的，[p/]他看向你的目光似乎充满了恨意。

original: Why are they being so secretive all of a sudden, anyway?
translation: 为什么她们要突然这么遮遮掩掩？

original: A witness can refuse to testify to avoid incriminating themselves.[p/] But a refusal to testify is suspicious in and of itself.
translation: 如果可能获罪，证人确实可以拒绝作证。[p/]但拒绝作证本身也非常可疑。

original: Tymora had no issues with Beatrice taking the stand earlier.[p/] So why would she change her tune when it comes to Marrunath?
translation: 之前让比亚特丽丝作证时，泰摩拉没有什么意见。[p/]轮到马鲁纳斯时怎么态度就变了？

original: And despite what she said,[p/] Marrunath seems like he disagrees with their decision the most...
translation: 而且虽然她是这么解释的，[p/]但马鲁纳斯看起来才是最有意见的一个……

original: Is it possible that [i]he's[/i] the weakest link of the three of them?
translation: 有没有可能<u>他</u>是那边最薄弱的环节？

original: If so,[p/] he might be the key to implicating them.
translation: 如果是这样，[p/]也许他就是指认对手罪行的关键。

original: Harold: And according to the legends,[p/] demons take great pride in their ability to deceive and corrupt people.
translation: Harold: 根据传说，[p/]恶魔也对自己欺骗、堕落人类的能力引以为荣。

original: You wonder...
translation: 你在想……

original: Tyrion: I see.[p/] Marrunath is well within his right to refuse...[p/] if [i]that's[/i] what he truly wants.
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了。[p/]马鲁纳斯有权利拒绝……[p/]如果他真是<u>这么</u>想的。

original: Ruby: It is...
translation: Ruby: 他是……

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] I suppose it's for the best.[p/] I doubt he'd be able to corroborate your story at all.
translation: Tyrion: 那么……[p/]这样也对你们有利。[p/]我可不觉得他有能力证实你们的故事。

original: Marrunath grinds his teeth together.[p/] It sounds like metal grinding on metal.
translation: 马鲁纳斯狠狠地咬着牙。[p/]听起来仿佛是金属互相摩擦。

original: Tyrion: Considering his diminutive figure,[p/] I don't blame him for being a coward.
translation: Tyrion: 这个使魔体格那么袖珍，[p/]也不怪他胆量一样袖珍了。

original: Judge: M-[p/][s/]Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] could you please refrain from provoking the [i]literal[/i] demon?
translation: Judge: 卡、[p/][s/]卡斯伯特先生，[p/]你能不能不要挑衅<u>恶魔</u>？

original: Tyrion: Oh, it's fine, Your Honor.[p/] He can't do anything without his master's word.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，没事的，法官阁下。[p/]没有主人的命令，他什么都干不了。

original: Tyrion: And between him and the defendant,[p/] it's clear that [i]Beatrice[/i] is the brains of the operation.
translation: Tyrion: 他和被告之间，[p/]<u>比亚特丽丝</u>明显才是智囊。

original: Marrunath: You shut your [i]filthy[/i] celestial mouth!
translation: Marrunath: 给我闭上你那张天界的<u>臭嘴</u>！

original: Ruby: ...Marrunath?[p/] What are you doing...?
translation: Ruby: ……马鲁纳斯？[p/]你要干什么……？

original: Marrunath: I will not stand here and be insulted by a bloody [i]heavensborn[/i]!
translation: Marrunath: 我可不会在这儿呆坐着被该死的<u>天诞之物</u>侮辱！

original: ..."Heavensborn"?
translation: ……“天诞之物”？

original: Marrunath: I am still within my contract.[p/][s/] And I will not flee from the likes of [i]him[/i]!
translation: Marrunath: 我的行为没有违反契约。[p/][s/]我也不会从<u>他</u>这种东西面前逃开！

original: Marrunath: You want my testimony?![p/][s/] I'll give you my god-damned testimony!
translation: Marrunath: 想要我的证言？！[p/][s/]那我就给你这小兔崽子证言！

original: Ruby: Y-[p/][s/]Your Honor![p/] My client does [i]not[/i] consent to having her familiar testify.
translation: Ruby: 法、[p/][s/]法官阁下！[p/]我的委托人<u>没有</u>同意让她的使魔作证。

original: Tyrion: Tymora.[p/] Didn't you say earlier that Marrunath is "afforded the same rights as any other person"?
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉。[p/]你之前不是说马鲁纳斯“和其他人类有着相同的权利”？

original: Tyrion: He has a right to refuse to testify.[p/] But only [i]he[/i] can decide if he wants to exercise it.
translation: Tyrion: 他有权拒绝作证。[p/]但只有<u>他</u>能决定是否行使这一权利。

original: Tyrion: ...And he's clearly intent on giving it.
translation: Tyrion: ……他看起来很想作证。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: So, Marrunath.[p/] Why don't you testify about what [i]you[/i] were doing on the night of the murder?
translation: Tyrion: 那么，马鲁纳斯。[p/]要不要就谋杀当晚<u>你</u>在干什么作证？

original: Marrunath: ...Gladly.
translation: Marrunath: ……正合我意。

original: Marrunath: I provided sight to my keeper while she spoke with the princes.
translation: Marrunath: 我的管理人与王子交谈时，我会为她提供视觉。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]I'll admit that she [i]did[/i] cast [b]Invisibility[/b] on me during their conversation.[p/] She needed to keep me hidden after all.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我也承认对话期间，她<u>确实</u>对我用了[b]隐形术[/b]。[p/]毕竟她得把我的存在隐藏起来。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]But I never left the room where my master was.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]但我从没离开过主人所在的房间。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]Nor did I steal the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我也没有偷噬法之剑。

original: Marrunath: You have nothing on me, heavensborn![p/][s/] ...[p/][p/]You don't even have proof that I entered William Frega's Study!
translation: Marrunath: 你没有能证明我有罪的证据，天诞之物！[p/][s/]……[p/][p/]你甚至都没有我进过威廉·弗雷加的书房的证据！

original: Tyrion: Do you honestly expect us to take your word for it?
translation: Tyrion: 你真觉得我会相信你的说词？

original: Tyrion: Or do you have any evidence to support your alibi?
translation: Tyrion: 还是说你有证据支持自己的不在场证明？

original: Marrunath: I only speak the truth, heavensborn.
translation: Marrunath: 我只说真话，天诞之物。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]There were mages other than my keeper that could have stolen the Sword.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]除了我的管理人，还有别的法师能够偷走噬法之剑。

original: Marrunath: And by your own admission,[p/] none of your witnesses [i]saw[/i] me on the night of the murder.
translation: Marrunath: 你自己也承认了，[p/]那些目击证人谋杀当晚都没<u>看到过</u>我。

original: Marrunath: The one lacking evidence is you.
translation: Marrunath: 缺乏证据的是你。

original: He has a point...[p/] You still need definitive proof that ties him to the murder.
translation: 他说得有道理……[p/]你依然需要决定性的证据，才能把他和谋杀联系起来。

original: PRESENTING contradicting evidence might not be possible.
translation: 也许没办法 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 有矛盾的证据。

original: However,[p/] he's clearly lying in his testimony.[p/] And there's something...[p/] strange about the way he's speaking.
translation: 但是，[p/]他在证词里明显说了谎。[p/]而且……[p/]他说话的方式也有点奇怪。

original: Why is he pausing so much?
translation: 为什么要如此频繁停顿？

original: You're not seeing any thoughts through the Eye.[p/] But perhaps you can try to INTERPRET the meaning of his words.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼看不到任何想法。[p/]但也许你可以尝试 <size=1.5em>解读</size> 他证词的含义。

original: Tyrion: Is this something that you frequently do?
translation: Tyrion: 你经常这么做吗？

original: Marrunath: Yes.[p/] My keeper's accident left her completely blind.
translation: Marrunath: 是的。[p/]我的管理人因意外完全失明。

original: Marrunath: She looks through my eyes to see her surroundings.
translation: Marrunath: 她要通过我的眼睛才能看见周围环境。

original: Tyrion: And did she look through your eyes while she was with the princes?
translation: Tyrion: 她和王子们在一起的时候，也是通过你的眼睛察看附近？

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]Yes, she did.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]是的。

original: He took a bit of a pause before answering your question.
translation: 他在回答问题前停顿了一下。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Does that mean she [i]normally[/i] casts [b]Invisibility[/b] every hour?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]也就是说她<u>一般</u>每过一个小时就要用一次[b]隐形术[/b]？

original: Marrunath: My keeper is a powerful mage.[p/] And my pact with her has only made her stronger.
translation: Marrunath: 我的管理人法力浑厚。[p/]我和她的契约也让她更加强大。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] That's actually really impressive.
translation: Celeste: 哇噢……[p/]还挺惊人的。

original: Tyrion: Really?
translation: Tyrion: 真的？

original: Celeste: Casting spells may look effortless.[p/] But continuously casting spells takes a lot of stamina out of the caster.
translation: Celeste: 施法本身可能看起来很轻松。[p/]但持续施法会消耗施法者的大量精力。

original: Celeste: She must have a lot of stamina if she can cast a high-level [b]illusion[/b] every hour.
translation: Celeste: 如果能每小时都施展一次高等级[b]幻象术[/b]，她的精力一定十分可观。

original: Tyrion: And did your master leave the room while she was with the princes?
translation: Tyrion: 与王子在一起的时候，你的主人离开过房间吗？

original: Marrunath: No.[p/] ...[p/][p/]I'm sure you remember.[p/] My keeper was under the careful watch of the Kingsguard [i]and[/i] Lucio Steelwind.
translation: Marrunath: 没有。[p/]……[p/][p/]你肯定也记得。[p/]我的管理人被国王卫队<u>和</u>卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德严密看管。

original: Tyrion: And you're maintaining that [i]you[/i] never left the Ballroom.
translation: Tyrion: 你也坚称<u>自己</u>没有离开过舞厅。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]As I said,[p/] I never left the room where my master was.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我说过了，[p/]我从没离开过主人所在的房间。

original: He has a habit of pausing before he responds to you...[p/] But it only happens sometimes...
translation: 他在回答你的问题之前经常会停顿一下……[p/]但不是每次都这样……

original: Is it some strange demon accent?[p/] ...Or is it something else?
translation: 是什么恶魔口癖吗？[p/]……还是另有原因？

original: Tyrion: Beatrice was one of the few mages present that could shatter the glass.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝是在场少数有能力打破玻璃的法师。

original: Marrunath: Yes.[p/] But being able to do something and [i]actually[/i] doing it are two different things.
translation: Marrunath: 是的。[p/]但有能力做和<u>真的</u>做了是两回事。

original: Ugh...[p/] He's right.[p/] You won't be able to convict Beatrice until you can connect Marrunath to the murder.
translation: 呜呃……[p/]他说得对。[p/]只有把马鲁纳斯与谋杀联系起来，你才有可能指控比亚特丽丝。

original: But you have a feeling...[p/] [i]He's[/i] the one that's going to give it to you.
translation: 但你有种感觉……[p/]<u>他</u>会把关键线索拱手交出。

original: Tyrion: ...Why do you keep calling me that?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么一直这么叫我？

original: Marrunath: Oh...[p/] Does the heavensborn not know the nature of his blood?
translation: Marrunath: 哦哟……[p/]这个天诞之物不了解自己的血统？

original: Your "blood"?[p/] Could he be referring to your mother?
translation: 你的“血统”？[p/]他指的是你的母亲？

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Do you [i]know[/i] where my abilities come from?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你<u>知道</u>我的能力源自何处？！

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Marrunath: Oh,[p/] how marvelous![p/][s/] You [i]don't[/i] know, do you?!
translation: Marrunath: 哎呀，[p/]太美妙了！[p/][s/]你<u>不知道</u>，是吧？！

original: Marrunath: If you make a pact with me,[p/] child.[p/] I can tell you the nature of your blood...[p/] and much[p/] much more.
translation: Marrunath: 小屁孩，[p/]不如你跟我签个契约。[p/]这样我就可以给你解释你的血统……[p/]以及很多[p/]很多事。

original: Judge: M-[p/][s/]Mr. Cuthbert![p/][s/] Please don't make deals with the devil in [i]my[/i] courtroom.
translation: Judge: 卡、[p/][s/]卡斯伯特先生！[p/][s/]请不要在<u>我的</u>法庭里和恶魔做交易。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I wasn't planning to, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我没有这个打算，法官阁下。

original: He clearly knows [i]something[/i]...[p/] But making a deal with a demon is just asking for trouble.
translation: 他明显知道<u>什么</u>……[p/]但与恶魔签约只是自找麻烦。

original: He could also just be trying to distract you.[p/] You should stay on task.
translation: 他也可能是在让你分心。[p/]你得保持专注。

original: Celeste: He's definitely more direct than most witnesses.
translation: Celeste: 他比起大多数证人都要直白。

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] But he's still clearly lying.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊。[p/]但他明显在说谎。

original: Tyrion: And there's something [i]off[/i] about the way he's speaking.
translation: Tyrion: 他说话的方式也有些<u>奇怪</u>的地方。

original: He pauses before saying certain statements...
translation: 他在做出特定陈述前会停顿……

original: You need to INTERPRET the statement that seems the most suspicious.
translation: 你需要仔细 <size=1.5em>解读</size> 看起来最为可疑的证词。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] The witness's thoughts contradict the evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的想法与证据存在矛盾。

original: Judge: ...Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] The "witness's" statement was many things.[p/] But it was not contradictory.
translation: Judge: ……卡斯伯特先生。[p/]“证人的”发言可以有很多东西，[p/]但并没有存在矛盾。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...[p/] I suppose I see what you mean.
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/][s/]对的……[p/]我明白你的意思了……

original: He keeps taking pauses before certain statements,[p/] but not all of them.
translation: 他在做出特定陈述前会停顿，[p/]但这不是普遍现象。

original: And more importantly,[p/] his word choice was different.[p/] Did he slip up?
translation: 更重要的是，[p/]他的用词会有不同。[p/]是单纯的口误吗？

original: Tyrion: Marrunath.[p/] It looks like you misspoke and used the wrong word.
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯。[p/]看起来你不小心用了错误的词语。

original: Marrunath: ...What?
translation: Marrunath: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Through most of your testimony,[p/] you referred to Beatrice Frega as your "keeper".
translation: Tyrion: 大部分证言里，[p/]你都用“管理人”指代比亚特丽丝·弗雷加。

original: Tyrion: But you referred to her as your "master" during one statement.[p/] Why is that?
translation: Tyrion: 但你只在一句证词里用了“主人”这个词。[p/]为什么呢？

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: For the first time,[p/] he doesn't have a response.
translation: 他第一次沉默不答了。

original: Tyrion: So I'll ask you again.[p/] Did you leave the Ballroom that night?
translation: Tyrion: 那我再问你一次。[p/]你那天晚上离开过舞厅吗？

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]I-[p/][s/] didn't leave the room where my master was.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我、[p/][s/]没有离开过主人所在的房间。

original: He's using the word "master" again.[p/] Even though you pointed it out.
translation: 即使被你指出以后，[p/]他还是在用“主人”这个词。

original: Why isn't he correcting it...?
translation: 为什么没有更正……？

original: Does that mean he's intentionally using that term?[p/]
translation: 是否意味着他是故意在用这个词？[p/]

original: ...If so,[p/] why?
translation: ……如果是的话，[p/]为什么？

original: There [i]has[/i] to be a reason why...
translation: <u>肯定</u>得有理由……

original: No...[p/] Throughout his entire testimony,[p/] he referred to Beatrice as his "keeper".
translation: 不对……[p/]他的大部分证言里，[p/]都是用“管理人”指代比亚特丽丝。

original: He only referred to his "master" in that one statement.[p/] Why would he do that?
translation: 他只在一句证词里用了“主人”这个词。[p/]为什么他会这么做？

original: Okay...[p/] If you take his words at face value,[p/] the "master" he is referring to [i]isn't[/i] Beatrice.
translation: 好了……[p/]如果你按字面意思理解他的话，[p/]这个“主人”就<u>不是</u>在说比亚特丽丝。

original: And if Beatrice isn't his "master",[p/] then his statement "I never left the room where my master was." would technically be true.
translation: 如果比亚特丽丝不是他的“主人”，[p/]那他的证词“我从没离开过主人所在的房间”就有可能说得通。

original: But why even bother making that distinction?[p/] He clearly has no moral hangups about committing murder.
translation: 但为什么要特地区分这一点？[p/]他可不是会受道德约束的类型。

original: He could have just lied.
translation: 他本可以说谎。

original: Demons apparently pride themselves on tricking and corrupting humans.
translation: 恶魔对自己欺骗、堕落人类的能力引以为荣。

original: So why wouldn't he just lie in his testimony?
translation: 那他为什么不在作证时说谎？

original: No...[p/] He clearly has every incentive to lie.
translation: 不对……[p/]说谎对他好处多多。

original: It would protect Beatrice [i]and[/i] let him win over the so-called "heavensborn".
translation: 能保护比亚特丽丝，<u>也能</u>让他赢过所谓的“天诞之物”。

original: So wouldn't he just do that?
translation: 为什么他没有这么做？

original: No...[p/] It can't be.
translation: 不……[p/]这不可能。

original: Demons are clearly different from humans,[p/] but would they seriously have a limitation like that?
translation: 恶魔与人类明显不同，[p/]但为什么他们会愿意被这样限制？

original: It [i]would[/i] explain why Tymora and Beatrice were so opposed to having him testify...
translation: 这确实<u>能</u>解释泰摩拉和比亚特丽丝会反对让他作证……

original: There's only one way to know for sure.
translation: 只有一种方法可以确认。

original: Tyrion: Witness.[p/] Can you repeat the following statement for me?
translation: Tyrion: 证人。[p/]能否请你重复我接下来要说的话？

original: Tyrion: "Tyrion Cuthbert's hair is green."
translation: Tyrion: “提利昂·卡斯伯特的头发是绿色的”。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]What kind of ridiculous request is that?
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]这什么搞笑要求？

original: [i]Another[/i] pause...
translation: <u>又一次</u>停顿……

original: Judge: I'm afraid I must agree, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Judge: 我不得不同意，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Judge: Please don't waste our time.
translation: Judge: 请不要浪费我们的时间。

original: Tyrion: I'm just conducting a little experiment, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是在做一个小实验，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: So I'll ask you again, Marrunath.
translation: Tyrion: 我再问你一次，马鲁纳斯。

original: Tyrion: Say the following phrase:[p/] "Tyrion Cuthbert's hair is green."
translation: Tyrion: 重复这句话：[p/]“提利昂·卡斯伯特的头发是绿色的”。

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: Ruby: ...Your Honor.[p/] Cuthbert is clearly making trivial requests to stall for time.
translation: Ruby: ……法官阁下。[p/]卡斯伯特只是在用琐事拖延时间。

original: Ruby: His request is not worth a response from the witness.
translation: Ruby: 他的要求不值得证人回应。

original: Tyrion: That's not what I'm doing, Tymora,[p/] and I think you [i]know[/i] that.
translation: Tyrion: 我没有拖延时间，泰摩拉，[p/]我觉得你也<u>清楚</u>这一点。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: Marrunath.[p/] We truly don't know much about demons aside from the stories told in myths.
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯。[p/]除了神话故事，我们没听说过多少恶魔的事。

original: Tyrion: So is it possible...
translation: Tyrion: 有没有可能……

original: Tyrion: ...that demons are physically unable to lie?!
translation: Tyrion: ……恶魔生理上不能撒谎？！

original: Marrunath: ...!
translation: Marrunath: ……！

original: Ruby: Damn it...
translation: Ruby: 该死……

original: Judge: I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] but that seems quite ridiculous.
translation: Judge: 很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生，[p/]但这有点太荒谬了。

original: Judge: Why [i]wouldn't[/i] the witness be capable of lying?
translation: Judge: 为什么证人会<u>无法说谎</u>？

original: Tyrion: I genuinely don't know, Your Honor,[p/] but his testimony speaks for itself.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不清楚，法官阁下，[p/]但他的证言说明了一切。

original: Tyrion: He can [i]easily[/i] refute it by granting my request.
translation: Tyrion: 只要答应我的要求，他就能<u>轻易</u>驳斥这一点。

original: Tyrion: Say "Tyrion Cuthbert's hair is green", witness!
translation: Tyrion: 证人！说“提利昂·卡斯伯特的头发是绿色的”！

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: Marrunath: You said it yourself.[p/] "Tyrion Cuthbert's hair is green".
translation: Marrunath: 你自己说了，[p/]“提利昂·卡斯伯特的头发是绿色的”。

original: Tyrion: That's [i]not[/i] what I asked for, witness!
translation: Tyrion: 这<u>不是</u>我的要求，证人！

original: Tyrion: Repeat the statement I told you,[p/] word for word![p/][s/] Nothing after [i]or[/i] before it!
translation: Tyrion: 重复我刚才说的那句话，[p/]要一字不差！[p/][s/]之前<u>与</u>之后都不能添加内容！

original: Ruby: Your Honor![p/][s/] The prosecution's argument is absurd!
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]检方的争论属实荒唐！

original: Ruby: The witness is not obligated to fulfill such an outrageous request.
translation: Ruby: 证人没有义务满足这么离奇的要求。

original: Judge: I might be compelled to agree with you, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Judge: 也许我会同意你，泰摩拉女士。

original: Judge: ...If the witness wasn't [i]clearly[/i] avoiding fulfilling that request.
translation: Judge: ……但证人<u>明显</u>是在回避问题。

original: Tyrion: Well?[p/][s/] We're all waiting, Marrunath!
translation: Tyrion: 那么？[p/][s/]我们都等着呢，马鲁纳斯！

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: Tyrion: You can easily prove me wrong by repeating my statement plainly!
translation: Tyrion: 只要重复我说的话，你就可以证明我是错的！

original: Marrunath: Agh![p/][s/] You filthy heavensborn!
translation: Marrunath: 啊！[p/][s/]你这肮脏的天诞之物！

original: Tyrion: Say it, Marrunath!
translation: Tyrion: 说啊，马鲁纳斯！

original: Marrunath: "Tyrion...[p/] Cuthbert's"
translation: Marrunath: “提利昂……[p/]卡斯伯特的”

original: Marrunath: "Tyrion Cuthbert's hair is..."
translation: Marrunath: “提利昂·卡斯伯特的头发是……”

original: Marrunath: "TYRION[p/][s/] CUTHBERT'S[p/][s/] HAIR[p/][s/] IS"
translation: Marrunath: <size=1.5em>“提利昂·[p/][s/]卡斯伯特的[p/][s/]头发[p/][s/]是”</size>

original: Marrunath: ...blond.
translation: Marrunath: ……金色的。

original: Tyrion: [i]Technically[/i], it's a dirty blond.
translation: Tyrion: <u>准确地说</u>，是深金色。

original: Marrunath: Oh, [i]shut[/i] up!
translation: Marrunath: 干，<u>闭嘴</u>！

original: Judge: Is Mr. Cuthbert correct, Marrunath?
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生说得没错吗，马鲁纳斯？

original: Judge: Are you [i]actually[/i] unable to lie?
translation: Judge: 你<u>真的</u>不能撒谎？

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: Tyrion: I think his silence speaks for itself, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 他的沉默不言自明，法官阁下。

original: Judge: Remarkable...[p/] I would have never imagined.
translation: Judge: 太神奇了……[p/]我根本不会这么想。

original: Tyrion: And with [i]that[/i],[p/] proving my case becomes a [i]much[/i] simpler matter.
translation: Tyrion: 既然<u>如此</u>，[p/]证明我的推论就<u>更加</u>简单了。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: Marrunath.[p/] Did you murder William Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯。[p/]是你杀害了威廉·弗雷加吗？

original: Marrunath: ...
translation: Marrunath: ……

original: Tyrion: I'm sure you understand, witness.[p/] Under [i]these[/i] circumstances,[p/] staying silent is basically an admission of guilt.
translation: Tyrion: 证人，你肯定能理解。[p/]<u>现在</u>的情况下，[p/]保持沉默相当于承认有罪。

original: MBeatrice: You have no reason to stay quiet, Marrunath.
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯，你没有理由保持沉默。

original: MBeatrice: Tell him the truth.
translation: MBeatrice: 告诉他真相。

original: MBeatrice: Lady Beatrice,[p/] what are you-?
translation: MBeatrice: 比亚特丽丝小姐，[p/]你这是——？

original: MBeatrice: I believe it's time to come clean,[p/] don't you Marrunath?
translation: MBeatrice: 是时候坦白一切了，[p/]不是吗，马鲁纳斯？

original: MBeatrice: ...!
translation: MBeatrice: ……！

original: MBeatrice: I see...[p/] So [i]that's[/i] your play.
translation: MBeatrice: 我明白了……[p/]<u>这</u>就是你的打算。

original: Tyrion: Don't think you can just stall for time, Ms. Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 可别想着拖延时间，弗雷加女士。

original: Tyrion: Marrunath has no choice but to answer the question.
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯必须回答问题，没有其他选择。

original: MBeatrice: Do it, Marrunath.[p/] Tell the court the truth.
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯，[p/]告诉法庭真相吧。

original: MBeatrice: ...To answer your question,[p/] yes.
translation: MBeatrice: ……来回答你的问题，[p/]是的。

original: MBeatrice: I [i]did[/i] murder William Frega.
translation: MBeatrice: 我<u>确实</u>杀害了威廉·弗雷加。

original: Ruby: W-[p/][s/]What are you doing?!
translation: Ruby: 你、[p/][s/]你说什么？！

original: Judge: Ms. Frega...[p/] Does this mean you are confessing to the murder?
translation: Judge: 弗雷加女士……[p/]这是否意味着你承认了谋杀？

original: MBeatrice: Oh, Your Honor.[p/] [i]I'm[/i] not admitting to anything.
translation: MBeatrice: 噢，法官阁下，[p/]<u>我</u>没有承认任何事。

original: MBeatrice: This confession comes from Marrunath, himself.
translation: MBeatrice: 是马鲁纳斯自己坦白了他的罪行。

original: Tyrion: But your [i]own[/i] familiar just-!
translation: Tyrion: 但<u>你的</u>使魔刚刚——！

original: MBeatrice: Let me ask you a question, Marrunath.
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯，我问你一个问题。

original: MBeatrice: Did I [i]order[/i] you to murder my father?
translation: MBeatrice: 我<u>命令</u>你去谋杀我的父亲了吗？

original: MBeatrice: ...[p/][p/]No.[p/] You did not, Lady Beatrice.
translation: MBeatrice: ……[p/][p/]没有。[p/]你没有命令我，比亚特丽丝小姐。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What are you talking about?!
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你在说些什么？！

original: Tyrion: You're lying, aren't you?!
translation: Tyrion: 你在撒谎，是不是？！

original: MBeatrice: Demons are [i]physically[/i] unable to lie, Mr. Cuthbert!
translation: MBeatrice: 恶魔<u>生理层面上</u>就不能说谎，卡斯伯特先生！

original: Damn it...[p/] She's right.
translation: 可恶……[p/]她说得对。

original: She must have done something...
translation: 她肯定做了什么……

original: Did she plan for this?[p/] She must have arranged things so that statement would be technically true.
translation: 这也在她的计划之中吗？[p/]为了能让这句话正确，她一定提前安排好了一切。

original: She could have asked [i]someone else[/i] to give the order,[p/] or she could have just implied it...
translation: 她可能是让<u>别人</u>下了这个命令，[p/]或者她可以简单暗示一下……

original: Either way,[p/] she can just plead ignorance and blame everything on Marrunath.
translation: 无论如何，[p/]她都可以声称自己并不知情，然后把一切都归咎于马鲁纳斯。

original: Tyrion: Still...[p/][s/] This isn't over.
translation: Tyrion: 尽管如此……[p/][s/]庭审还没有结束。

original: MBeatrice: Oh?[p/] Is that so?
translation: MBeatrice: 哦？[p/]是吗？

original: MBeatrice: Let me tell you.[p/] This trial was over the moment Aria turned her blade against me.
translation: MBeatrice: 让我告诉你，[p/]这场庭审在阿莉亚对我拔剑相向的那一刻就结束了。

original: Tyrion: I don't care [i]who[/i] you are.[p/] Man, king, or demon,[p/][s/] you're [i]not[/i] going to get away with this!
translation: Tyrion: 我不在乎你是<u>谁</u>。[p/]无论是人、王亦或恶魔，[p/][s/]你都<u>别想</u>逃脱惩罚！

original: MBeatrice: Oh,[p/] I do love the gravitas behind that.[p/] But I wonder how long it will last.
translation: MBeatrice: 哦，[p/]我很喜欢这句话背后的庄严，[p/]但我很好奇它能持续多久。

original: MBeatrice: Hit me with your best shot, heavensborn.
translation: MBeatrice: 放马过来吧，天诞之物。

original: Damn it...[p/] Is she really too much for you?
translation: 可恶……[p/]她对你来说还是太难应付了吗？

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Tyrion: Beatrice Frega![p/][s/] You may not have [i]technically[/i] ordered your father's murder![p/][s/] But you were clearly acting with malice!
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加！[p/][s/]<u>严格意义上</u>，你可能并没有下令谋杀你的父亲！[p/][s/]但你的行为明显是恶意的！

original: Tyrion: You brought something dangerous into the manor.[p/][s/] Something that you [i]knew[/i] would harm your father!
translation: Tyrion: 你把危险的东西带进了庄园。[p/][s/]一件你<u>明知</u>会伤害你父亲的东西！

original: MBeatrice: Oh, really?[p/] And what would that be?
translation: MBeatrice: 哦，真的？[p/]是什么危险的东西呢？

original: MBeatrice: What was [i]so[/i] dangerous that it implies lethal intent?
translation: MBeatrice: 是什么东西<u>如此</u>危险，甚至能置人于死地？

original: Tyrion: You brought Marrunath into Frega Manor that night!
translation: Tyrion: 那天晚上你把马鲁纳斯带进了弗雷加庄园！

original: Tyrion: You were clearly planning to murder your father from the start!
translation: Tyrion: 你显然从一开始就计划谋杀你的父亲！

original: MBeatrice: Ha![p/] I require Marrunath to [i]see[/i].[p/] That does [i]not[/i] imply lethal intent.
translation: MBeatrice: 哈！[p/]我是需要马鲁纳斯来<u>看</u>外界。[p/]这并<u>不</u>意味着我有杀人的意图。

original: Tyrion: But you brought a [i]demon[/i] into that house![p/][s/] And as a result your father was killed!
translation: Tyrion: 但你把一个<u>恶魔</u>带进了庄园！[p/][s/]结果就是你的父亲遭到杀害！

original: Tyrion: That's hardly an innocent mistake!
translation: Tyrion: 这可不是一个无心之错！

original: Ruby: My client specifically asked her father if familiars were allowed.[p/] We even received a written legal confirmation beforehand.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人特意询问了她的父亲是否可以携带使魔。[p/]我们甚至还提前收到了合法的书面许可。

original: Tyrion: But he couldn't have possibly expected her to bring in a [i]demon[/i]!
translation: Tyrion: 但他绝无可能想到她会带一个<u>恶魔</u>进来！

original: Ruby: He didn't specify [i]not[/i] to do this.[p/] The presence of Marrunath did not break [i]any[/i] of his rules,[p/] nor [i]any[/i] laws made by the kingdom.
translation: Ruby: 他没有特别指出<u>不得</u>如此。[p/]马鲁纳斯的出席并未违反他的<u>任何</u>规定，[p/]也未违反王国制定的<u>任何</u>法律。

original: MBeatrice: Right you are, Tymora.[p/] I can hardly be blamed if my familiar acts without my knowledge.
translation: MBeatrice: 说得很对，泰摩拉。[p/]总不能因使魔在我不知情的情况下行动而指责我。

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: She clearly entered that manor assuming that she might have to murder her father.
translation: 她显然是在打算杀害父亲的情况下进入了庄园。

original: And she brought something into the manor to make sure that she could do that.
translation: 为了保证自己能做到这一点，她还将某个东西带进了庄园。

original: Tyrion: How can you be blameless in Marrunath's actions?![p/][s/] He's [i]your[/i] familiar.
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能不因马鲁纳斯的行为遭受指责？！[p/][s/]他是<u>你的</u>使魔。

original: MBeatrice: By that same logic,[p/] shouldn't we also blame Lord Haroldson for the actions of his pet monkey?
translation: MBeatrice: 按照同样的逻辑，[p/]哈罗德森勋爵也要为宠物猴的行为负责了吗？

original: MBeatrice: If I recall,[p/] he broke into the study,[p/] tampered with the crime scene,[p/] and then left my father's body without reporting it.
translation: MBeatrice: 如果我没记错，[p/]他闯入了书房，[p/]破坏了犯罪现场，[p/]并且也没有报告情况就弃我父亲的尸体而去。

original: Tyrion: That's-!
translation: Tyrion: 那是——！

original: MBeatrice: Marrunath and Eugene are intelligent and sentient creatures.[p/] They have their own autonomy.
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯和尤金都是拥有智力和感知能力的生物。[p/]他们有自主能力。

original: MBeatrice: Their keepers aren't legally responsible for their actions.
translation: MBeatrice: 管理人并不在法律上对他们的行为负有责任。

original: Damn it...[p/] She's playing Devil's Advocate...[p/] But you suppose that's fitting for her.
translation: 该死的……[p/]她这是“见鬼说鬼话”……[p/]而且还是字面意思上的。

original: Tyrion: But you still cast [b]Invisibility[/b] to keep Marrunath hidden that night.
translation: Tyrion: 但当晚你仍然是施放了[b]隐形术[/b]来保持马鲁纳斯隐身。

original: MBeatrice: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] I [i]always[/i] cast [b]Invisibility[/b] on Marrunath.[p/] I can't very well let people see him.
translation: MBeatrice: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]我<u>向来</u>都会对马鲁纳斯使用[b]隐形术[/b]。[p/]我当然不能让大家都看到他。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: MBeatrice: Face it, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] You have nothing on me.
translation: MBeatrice: 面对现实吧，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]你已经不能把我怎么样了。

original: MBeatrice: Every crime related to the murder was committed by Marrunath.
translation: MBeatrice: 所有与谋杀相关的犯罪行为都是马鲁纳斯犯下的。

original: Tyrion: Beatrice.[p/] Marrunath [i]required[/i] your magic to break the wards guarding the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝。[p/]马鲁纳斯<u>需要</u>你的魔法才能打破保护噬法之剑的结界。

original: Tyrion: You may be able to explain why you cast [b]Invisibility[/b] that night.
translation: Tyrion: 你或许能解释当晚你为什么施放了[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: But you [s/][i]can't[/i] explain why you cast an [b]evocation[/b] spell powerful enough to shatter that display case.
translation: Tyrion: 但是你[s/]<u>无法</u>解释，为什么你施放了一个足够将展示橱窗粉碎的[b]塑能术[/b]。

original: MBeatrice: Oh, that.[p/] I'd almost forgotten.
translation: MBeatrice: 哦，那个啊。[p/]我差点都忘记了。

original: MBeatrice: I plead guilty.
translation: MBeatrice: 我认罪。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: MBeatrice: To the charge of Grand Theft,[p/] I mean.
translation: MBeatrice: 我指的是关于重大盗窃罪的指控。

original: MBeatrice: I ordered Marrunath to help me steal that artifact so I could sell it on the black market.
translation: MBeatrice: 我命令马鲁纳斯帮我偷盗那件遗物，这样我就能在黑市上卖掉它。

original: MBeatrice: I would have never [i]imagined[/i] that he'd use it to murder my father...
translation: MBeatrice: 我从来没有<u>想象过</u>他会利用它杀死我的父亲……

original: No…[p/] She said that she "didn't commit any crimes that night".
translation: 不对……[p/]她说过她“当晚没有犯任何罪”。

original: More specifically,[p/] she meant that there's nothing Marrunath did that was her fault.
translation: 更具体地说，[p/]她在说马鲁纳斯的所有行为都不是她的过错。

original: But wasn't there something else that required her magic?
translation: 但没有其他的事情需要她使用魔法才能实现吗？

original: Right...[p/] It doesn't matter if she's found guilty of stealing the Sword.
translation: 对啊……[p/]她是否因盗窃噬法之剑而获罪并不重要。

original: The Slayer Rule only takes effect if she's found to be responsible for her father's death.
translation: “杀人者规则”只在她被认定导致她父亲死亡的情况下生效。
