original: Damn it...[p/] Is there seriously nothing you can do?
translation: 该死……[p/]你真的什么都做不了了吗？

original: Threaten [d="Marrunath. The sentence for first-degree murder is death! Are you really willing to [i]die[/i] for your keeper's crimes?"/]
translation: Threaten [d="马鲁纳斯。一级谋杀罪是要被判处死刑的！你真的愿意为了你的管理人的罪行<u>去死</u>吗？"/]

original: Tyrion: Marrunath.[p/] The sentence for first-degree murder is death!
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯。[p/]一级谋杀罪是要被判处死刑的！

original: Tyrion: Are you really willing to [i]die[/i] for your keeper's crimes?
translation: Tyrion: 你真的愿意为了你的管理人的罪行<u>去死</u>吗？

original: MBeatrice: Oh, you [i]stupid[/i] heavensborn.[p/] Demons never [i]truly[/i] die.
translation: MBeatrice: 哎呀，你这个<u>愚蠢</u>的天诞之物，[p/]恶魔们不会<u>真正</u>死亡的。

original: MBeatrice: When our bodies are destroyed,[p/] we return to the Abyssal Hells.
translation: MBeatrice: 当肉身遭到毁灭时，[p/]我们就会回到深渊地狱。

original: Judge: H-[p/][s/]Hell?!
translation: Judge: 地、[p/][s/]地狱？！

original: MBeatrice: If I were to "die" in accordance with your laws,[p/] I would only return to my plane unharmed.
translation: MBeatrice: 就算我依据你们的法律被“处死”了，[p/]我也只会毫发无损回到原本的位面。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: MBeatrice: ...Even if I [i]could[/i] die,[p/] a fate much worse than death awaits me if I fail...
translation: MBeatrice: ……即使我<u>会</u>死，[p/]在这里失败的话，也会有比死亡更可怕的命运等着我……

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: Appeal [d="Marrunath! It's not too late! You can still do the right thing and tell the truth!"/]
translation: Appeal [d="马鲁纳斯！还来得及！你依然可以说出真相来赎罪！"/]

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Marrunath![p/][s/] It's not too late!
translation: Tyrion: 马、[p/][s/]马鲁纳斯！[p/][s/]还来得及！

original: Tyrion: You can still do the right thing and tell the truth!
translation: Tyrion: 你依然可以说出真相来赎罪！

original: MBeatrice: Oh my god![p/] Are you serious?!
translation: MBeatrice: 我的个老天！[p/]你开玩笑呢？！

original: MBeatrice: Are you [i]that[/i] desperate?!
translation: MBeatrice: 你就<u>这么</u>急迫？！

original: MBeatrice: What on earth made you think you could appeal to the morals of a bloody [i]demon[/i]?
translation: MBeatrice: 你脑子撞到哪儿了才会觉得他一个<u>恶魔</u>会在乎赎罪？

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] That was a long shot.[p/] Even for you.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]就算对你来说，[p/]这也太勉强了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah, yeah...[p/] I don't need you to tell me twice.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧，好吧……[p/]也不用再打击我一遍。

original: Deflect [d="That still doesn't absolve you of bringing a [i]demon[/i] into the Lords' Ball."/]
translation: Deflect [d="但这无法为你带<u>恶魔</u>进入勋爵的舞会开脱。"/]

original: Tyrion: That still doesn't absolve you of bringing a [i]demon[/i] into the Lords' Ball.
translation: Tyrion: 但这无法为你带<u>恶魔</u>进入勋爵的舞会开脱。

original: MBeatrice: Do you think we'll just accept your flawed claim if you say it over and over again?
translation: MBeatrice: 难道你觉得只要多重复几遍，我们就会相信你的谬论？

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] If you recall,[p/] we have a written notice allowing her familiar into the manor.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特，[p/]好好回忆一下，[p/]我们获得了允许她带使魔进入庄园的书面许可。

original: Ruby: The law is on our side.[p/] There was nothing illegal about Marrunath's presence.
translation: Ruby: 法律站在我们这边。[p/]马鲁纳斯在场并不违反法律。

original: Damn it...[p/] They were prepared for this.
translation: 该死……[p/]他们是有备而来。

original: That document puts the burden of proof on you.
translation: 这些文件让举证的责任来到你身上。

original: Agh...[p/][s/] Those three are a pain to argue against when they're together.
translation: 呃啊……[p/][s/]这三人齐心协力时真的很难驳倒。

original: You can't break Beatrice's confidence at all!
translation: 你根本没法打击比亚特丽丝的自信！

original: MBeatrice: So...[p/] Do you have anything else, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: MBeatrice: 那么……[p/]卡斯伯特先生，还有别的事吗？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: MBeatrice: I didn't think so.
translation: MBeatrice: 我看没有。

original: MBeatrice: Your Honor.[p/] It appears we found the true culprit.
translation: MBeatrice: 法官阁下。[p/]看来我们已经找到真凶。

original: MBeatrice: I can't [i]believe[/i] you killed my father, Marrunath.[p/] I'm so cross with you.
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯，我真不敢<u>相信</u>你杀了我的父亲。[p/]我真是忍不了你。

original: MBeatrice: Ah.[p/] I should give my apologies.[p/] I won't do it again.
translation: MBeatrice: 哎呀，[p/]那我道歉好不好。[p/]我不会再犯了。

original: MBeatrice: Don't worry,[p/] I forgive you.
translation: MBeatrice: 不用担心。[p/]我原谅你了。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: MBeatrice: Now then.[p/] Is there any reason why this trial hasn't ended already, Your Honor?
translation: MBeatrice: 那么，[p/]法官阁下，还有其他理由继续审理吗？

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Celeste: Come on![p/][s/] Don't you have anything else?!
translation: Celeste: 拜托！[p/][s/]没有其他的方法了吗？！

original: There [i]is[/i] one thing.
translation: 还<u>有</u>一个方法。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Ruby: Damn it...[p/] Not again.
translation: Ruby: 该死……[p/]怎么又来。

original: MBeatrice: Oh?[p/] Is that all you can do now?[p/] Glare at me?
translation: MBeatrice: 哦哟？[p/]你只会这一招了？[p/]瞪我？

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: W-[p/][s/]What?!
MBeatrice: ...Marrunath.[p/] What did you just do?
translation: MBeatrice: ……马鲁纳斯。[p/]你刚才干了什么？

original: MBeatrice: I've been watching him.[p/] He's been using an old celestial trick.
translation: MBeatrice: 我一直在注意着他。[p/]他在用天界的一个常见把戏。

original: MBeatrice: But it's weak.[p/] Your divine gaze won't work here, heavensborn.
translation: MBeatrice: 但力量很弱。[p/]你的神圣瞪人对我不管用，天诞之物。

original: Tyrion: You...!
translation: Tyrion: 你……！

original: Ruby: ...It looks like [i]that[/i] was your last piece, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特，看来<u>这</u>就是你的最后一招了。

original: No...[p/][s/] This [i]can't[/i] be how it ends.[p/][s/] Not after you've come this far!
translation: 不……[p/][s/]<u>不可以</u>这样结束。[p/][s/]你都走到这一步了！

original: Ruby: What is it that you like to say in these situations...?
translation: Ruby: 你这种时候喜欢说什么来着……？

original: Ruby: ...Checkmate, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……将军，卡斯伯特。

original: Judge: Well...[p/] I have to say this was one of the more...[p/] eventful trials I've overseen.
translation: Judge: 那么……[p/]这次的审理确实……[p/]跌宕起伏。

original: Judge: It was many things,[p/] if not enlightening.
translation: Judge: 不管怎么形容，[p/]至少绝对不缺娱乐效果。

original: Judge: But I suppose it all ended the same.
translation: Judge: 但结局看来还是大同小异。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Come on, think of something...[p/] [i]anything[/i].
translation: 可恶，仔细想想……[p/]<u>任何事</u>都可以。

original: Judge: While I find the defendant's actions quite suspect,[p/] I must agree with their argument.
translation: Judge: 虽然被告的行为确实十分可疑，[p/]但我不得不同意辩方的论点。

original: Judge: Aside from the theft of Lord Haroldson's exhibit,[p/] none of Ms. Frega's actions that night are illegal under Wyverngarde law.
translation: Judge: 除开偷窃哈罗德森勋爵的展品一事，[p/]弗雷加小姐当晚没有其他触犯维文加德法律的行动。

original: Judge: And there's no proof that the [i]defendant[/i] is responsible for her familiar's actions.
translation: Judge: 也没有证据表明<u>被告</u>要对使魔的行为承担责任。

original: Judge: With these revelations,[p/] I see no room for debate.
translation: Judge: 有了这些事实，[p/]我认为已经没有辩论的余地了。

original: Judge: We will be taking a brief recess.[p/] I will announce my verdict once we resume.
translation: Judge: 我们将短暂休庭，[p/]之后我将宣布自己的判决。

original: Damn it...[p/][s/] Is this seriously how it's going to end?![p/][s/] After [i]everything[/i] you've gone through to get here?!
translation: 该死……[p/][s/]难道真的要这样结束？！[p/][s/]在你做出了<u>这么多</u>努力之后？！

original: Frey: This world is bleak,[p/] merciless,[p/] and unforgiving.
translation: Frey: 这个世界暗淡无光，[p/]冷漠，[p/]且无情。

original: Frey: But I've seen you.[p/] I know how bright the light within you is.
translation: Frey: 但我看着你成长。[p/]我知道你心中存在着光明。

original: Frey: Use my eyes.[p/] Peer beyond the Divine Gate as I once did.
translation: Frey: 用我的眼睛吧。[p/]仔细看那神圣之门外的世界，就像我之前做的那样。

original: Marrunath called you a "heavensborn".[p/] And your mother told you that there's a "light" within you.
translation: 马鲁纳斯管你叫“天诞之物”。[p/]你的母亲说你“心中存在着光明”。

original: You have no idea what that means...[p/][s/] What even [i]is[/i] the Divine Gate?!
translation: 你不知道这些意味着什么……[p/][s/]神圣之门<u>又是</u>什么？！

original: Why do you have the Eye of Horus?[p/][s/] Why are you able to read people's minds?!
translation: 为什么你会有荷鲁斯之眼？[p/][s/]为什么你能读取别人的意识？！

original: You've been so lost lately.[p/] But you thought you finally figured out who you're supposed to be.
translation: 你最近十分迷茫。[p/]但你本以为终于明白了自己的命运。

original: But all of this,[p/] everything you've been working towards.[p/] It was all a lie...
translation: 但这一切，[p/]你为之努力的这一切。[p/]都只不过是谎言……

original: You've spent your whole life trying to be like Ms. Tymora...[p/] But is [i]she[/i] even like her?
translation: 你一生都在尝试效仿泰摩拉女士……[p/]但<u>她</u>自己又是怎么想的？

original: No...[p/] She just wanted to raise you into a tool for the Eyetaker...[p/]
translation: 不……[p/]她只是想把你培养成夺眼者的工具……[p/]

original: She was never your guardian...[p/] She was never your mother...
translation: 她不是你的监护人……[p/]不是你的母亲……

original: Your [i]real[/i] mother died years ago.
translation: 你<u>真正的</u>母亲多年前已经去世了。

original: ...Was Eris right?[p/] Is everyone in your life just trying to [i]use[/i] you?
translation: ……难道厄莉斯是对的？[p/]你生命中的所有人都只是想<u>利用</u>你？

original: Looking back on it,[p/] you've had no idea what to do with yourself since your mother died.
translation: 回首过去，[p/]母亲死后你不知如何是好。

original: You've just been making mistake after mistake.[p/] Leaving Aurinax,[p/] trusting Tymora,[p/] becoming an attorney...
translation: 你犯了一个又一个错误。[p/]离开欧奥耐克斯，[p/]信任泰摩拉，[p/]成为律师……

original: You've always just done as you're told...[p/] You never once made a path for yourself.
translation: 你一直在听令行事……[p/]一次都没有走出自己的路。

original: Frey: But you saved Celeste.[p/] And Wallace.[p/] And Dracogen.[p/] All when no one else would stand up for them.
translation: Frey: 但你在别人不愿意伸出援手的情况下救了塞莱斯特，[p/]华莱士，[p/]还有德拉科根。

original: Frey: Was helping them a mistake?
translation: Frey: 帮助他们也是错误吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Frey: You fought for a dream that doesn't exist.[p/] But that doesn't mean that you can't make it real.
translation: Frey: 你曾为了一个不存在的梦想努力。[p/]但这不代表你不能让这个梦想成真。

original: Frey: It's true that you followed Tymora's lead.[p/] But you've [i]always[/i] done what you thought was right above anything else.
translation: Frey: 你确实一直被泰摩拉领着走。[p/]但你做的<u>一直</u>是自己认为正确的事。

original: Frey: You wouldn't have stood up to that criminal if you truly didn't know right from wrong.
translation: Frey: 如果你真的不分对错，也就不会去勇敢挑战罪犯。

original: Frey: And you wouldn't be standing here if you'd just done as you were told.
translation: Frey: 如果只是被人牵着鼻子走，你也不会站在这里。

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] What do I do?
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]我该怎么办？

original: Frey: I'm not going to tell you that.[p/] You already know the answer.
translation: Frey: 这我不会告诉你。[p/]你已经知道答案了。

original: Frey: You've [i]always[/i] known the answer.
translation: Frey: 你<u>一直</u>都知道答案。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You take a deep breath and relax your thoughts.
translation: 你深吸一口气，让自己放松。

original: Situations can seem hopeless sometimes,[p/] but there is [i]always[/i] a way to win in the end.
translation: 虽然有时会身处险境，[p/]但<u>总能</u>有一种方法取得最终胜利。

original: No...[p/] No matter what you do,[p/] it won't mean anything unless you prove one fact.
translation: 不……[p/]不论你做什么，[p/]都必须先证明一件事。

original: You need to prove that Beatrice [i]ordered[/i] Marrunath to kill her father.
translation: 你需要证明是比亚特丽丝<u>命令</u>马鲁纳斯杀害了威廉。

original: You would need something strong to prove that.[p/] Testimony wouldn't be enough.
translation: 你需要强而有力的证据。[p/]仅有证言是不够的。

original: Tyrion: In order to convict Beatrice,[p/] I need to prove that she was responsible for Marrunath's actions.
translation: Tyrion: 为了指控比亚特丽丝，[p/]我需要证明她要为马鲁纳斯的行为承担责任。

original: Tyrion: People leave trails...[p/] Even when they think they've committed the perfect crime,[p/] something always gets left behind.
translation: Tyrion: 人类会留下痕迹……[p/]即使他们自以为成就了完美犯罪，[p/]也总会留下蛛丝马迹。

original: Tyrion: There [i]has[/i] to be something that proves Beatrice gave Marrunath the order.
translation: Tyrion: <u>一定</u>有什么能证明比亚特丽丝对马鲁纳斯下了命令。

original: Tyrion: Beatrice's relationship with Marrunath is clearly different than a relationship between two humans.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝与马鲁纳斯的关系明显与普通的人际交往不同。

original: Tyrion: There's a specific way their relationship works.
translation: Tyrion: 他们之间的关系有一点很特殊。

original: No...[p/] Beatrice's relationship with Marrunath isn't the same as one between humans.
translation: 不对……[p/]比亚特丽丝与马鲁纳斯的关系和人类之间的交往不同。

original: It's not even the same as the one between a mage and their familiar.
translation: 甚至与法师和普通使魔的关系也不一样。

original: There is something special about a human's relationship with a demon.
translation: 人类与恶魔之间的关系有一点很特别。

original: Tyrion: There's a specific way their relationship works...[p/] Or their "pact",[p/] as Marrunath calls it.
translation: Tyrion: 人类与恶魔间的关系要靠特殊的方法维持……[p/]用马鲁纳斯的话说，[p/]要靠“契约”。

original: ...Wasn't there something that someone said?[p/] But what was it...?
translation: ……是不是有谁说过什么？[p/]说了什么来着……？

original: No…[p/] Marrunath wasn't the first demon you heard about.
translation: 不对……[p/]马鲁纳斯不是你听说的第一个恶魔。

original: You remember something someone said to you.
translation: 你记得有人对你说了什么。

original: Something about the history and legends of demons.
translation: 什么有关历史与恶魔传说的事。

original: Tyrion: Oh, right.[p/] The Sword of Spell Eating is said to have been forged using a pact between a demon and a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 噢，对了。[p/]噬法之剑传说是通过恶魔和法师的契约打造而成。

original: Celeste: Isn't making a pact with a demon just [i]asking[/i] for trouble?
translation: Celeste: 和恶魔签约不是<u>自找</u>麻烦？

original: Celeste: They'd definitely betray you the first chance they got.
translation: Celeste: 他们肯定会第一时间背叛你的。

original: Harold: Well legends say that demons often drafted Blood Contracts for this reason.
translation: Harold: 这个嘛，传说里也说恶魔会起草血契来消除后顾之忧。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Do you mean like a legally binding document?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你是说一份具有<u>法律约束力</u>的契约？

original: Harold: The concept is similar.[p/] But once you sign a Blood Contract,[p/] both you and the demon are magically compelled to fulfill its terms.
translation: Harold: 差不多的意思。[p/]但一旦签约血契，[p/]你和恶魔都会被魔力约束，必须服从其中条款。

original: Tyrion: That's right![p/][s/] Beatrice must have made a "Blood Contract" with him!
translation: Tyrion: 就是这个！[p/][s/]比亚特丽丝必须和他签约“血契”！

original: Tyrion: A legally binding document like that [i]must[/i] describe how their relationship works.
translation: Tyrion: 这种具有法律约束力的文件里，<u>肯定</u>会写明双方的关系如何运作。

original: Frey: Laefe [i]did[/i] tell you that Beatrice would never trust someone that she couldn't control...
translation: Frey: 拉菲<u>确实</u>告诉过你，比亚特丽丝不会相信任何不受自己控制的人……

original: Tyrion: So she would only put herself in a situation where [i]she[/i] had full control over Marrunath's actions.
translation: Tyrion: 所以<u>她</u>一定会确保自己能够完全控制马鲁纳斯的行动。

original: Tyrion: ...But it's not as if they'll ever show it to me.
translation: Tyrion: ……但对方也不可能把文件给我看啊。

original: Tyrion: It would be a tall order to even [i]prove[/i] that Blood Contracts even exist...
translation: Tyrion: 光是<u>证明</u>血契存在就任务艰巨了……

original: Frey: Hm...[p/] I guess you have a point.
translation: Frey: 嗯……[p/]你说得有道理。

original: Frey: But if you ask me...[p/] I think you've done a wonderful job so far.
translation: Frey: 但要我说的话……[p/]你至今为止做得很好了。

original: Frey: So just this once...[p/] Let me guide you the rest of the way.
translation: Frey: 就这一次……[p/]让我来引导你余下的路。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Frey: Tyrion.[p/] Your Eyes don't actually read minds.
translation: Frey: 提利昂，[p/]你的眼睛其实不是能读取意识。

original: Frey: They give you the means to reveal truths that are being concealed.
translation: Frey: 它们的力量是揭示被隐藏的事实。

original: Frey: You can pull the truth out of anyone...[p/] and [i]anything[/i].
translation: Frey: 你可以从<u>任何人</u>与<u>任何事物</u>中找出真相。

original: Tyrion: The truth?
translation: Tyrion: 真相？

original: Frey: So...[p/] Say it together with me.
translation: Frey: 所以……[p/]重复我说的话。

original: Tyrion: Marrunath![p/][s/] Dweller of Avernus!
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯！[p/][s/]阿佛纳斯的住民！

original: MBeatrice: Wait...[p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: MBeatrice: 等等……[p/][s/]你在做什么？！

original: Tyrion: By the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] I issue upon you a divine edict!
translation: Tyrion: 借荷鲁斯之眼之力，[p/][s/]我对你发出神谕！

original: Tyrion: Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with Beatrice Frega!
translation: Tyrion: 放下防备，展示你和比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的血契！

original: You...[p/][s/] did it![p/] But how...?
translation: 你……[p/][s/]成功了！[p/]但怎么……？

original: Was that really your...?
translation: 这真是你的……？

original: No.[p/] That's not important right now.
translation: 不。[p/]这件事现在不重要。

original: She gave you what you needed.[p/] The rest is up to you.
translation: 她给了你所需的关键。[p/]接下来就靠你自己了。

original: MBeatrice: What in the nine hells was [i]that[/i]?!
translation: MBeatrice: <u>这</u>是什么花招？！

original: MBeatrice: Y-[p/][s/]You![p/][s/] When did you learn to-?!
translation: MBeatrice: 你、[p/][s/]你！[p/][s/]你从哪儿学了——？！

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert...?[p/] What just happened?
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……？[p/]发生了什么？

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] I just made the witness manifest their Blood Contract!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]我刚刚让证人展示了自己的血契！

original: MBeatrice: You did what?!
translation: MBeatrice: 你干了啥？！

original: Judge: ...Blood Contract?
translation: Judge: ……血契？

original: Tyrion: You can think of it as a legally binding document.[p/] It lays out the terms of the pact between Beatrice Frega and her familiar.
translation: Tyrion: 相当于一种具有法律约束力的文件。[p/]上面会写明比亚特丽丝·弗雷加与使魔之间的契约条款。

original: Ruby: ...!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Judge: Incredible![p/][s/] Where did you learn how to do such a thing?
translation: Judge: 这么厉害！[p/][s/]你从哪儿学会这种技能的？

original: Tyrion: ...Um.
translation: Tyrion: ……呃。

original: Tyrion: The library?
translation: Tyrion: 图书馆？

original: Judge: Wow...[p/] To think that our kingdom had access to such knowledge...
translation: Judge: 哇……[p/]没想到我国藏书如此博大精深……

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I'm not buying it.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我是不信的。

original: Celeste: How did you [i]really[/i] find out how to do that?
translation: Celeste: 你<u>其实</u>是怎么学会的？

original: Tyrion: ...It's a long story.
translation: Tyrion: ……说来话长。

original: You're not sure if she'd believe you even if you told her.
translation: 就算实话实说，她也不一定会相信你。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/][s/]Anyways...[p/] The defense's argument is such:
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/][s/]总之……[p/]辩方的论点如下：

original: Tyrion: Marrunath was acting alone and the defendant is not to blame for his actions that night.
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯是独立行动，被告不应该因他当晚的行为而承担责任。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] take a look at page 7 of this Blood Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 但是，[p/]请看血契的第七页。

original: Tyrion: It specifies that Marrunath is prohibited from killing any and all humans.
translation: Tyrion: 上面明确写着马鲁纳斯被禁止杀害任何人类。

original: Tyrion: There's only one scenario where he can do so.
translation: Tyrion: 只有一种情况例外。

original: Tyrion: And that's when Beatrice Frega designates someone to be exempt from this rule!
translation: Tyrion: 就是比亚特丽丝·弗雷加指定将某人从这条规则中除外的时候！

original: MBeatrice: You...
translation: MBeatrice: 你……

original: Tyrion: Beatrice Frega![p/] You didn't [i]directly[/i] order Marrunath to kill your father.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加！[p/]你没有<u>直接</u>命令马鲁纳斯杀害自己的父亲。

original: Tyrion: But you implied it by telling Marrunath that he [i]could[/i] kill him.
translation: Tyrion: 但你通过告诉马鲁纳斯<u>可以</u>杀他暗示了这一点。

original: Tyrion: Not only [i]that[/i],[p/][s/] you did so within the twenty-four hours of the Lords' Ball!
translation: Tyrion: 不仅<u>如此</u>，[p/][s/]你还在勋爵的舞会 24 小时以内这么做了！

original: Tyrion: Your intent was clear![p/][s/] You brought Marrunath into Frega Manor with full knowledge that he could and [i]would[/i] kill William Frega!
translation: Tyrion: 你的意图十分明显！[p/][s/]你知道马鲁纳斯可以，也<u>绝对会</u>杀害威廉·弗雷加。但还是把他带进了弗雷加庄园！

original: Tyrion: ...And [i]that[/i][p/] is Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军。

original: Judge: And just when I thought the surprises were over...
translation: Judge: 我还以为今天的变故已经告一段落了……

original: Tyrion: But in the end,[p/] we arrived at the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 但最终，[p/]我们找到了真相。

original: Judge: I suppose I can't disagree with that.
translation: Judge: 这一点我不得不同意。

original: Judge: What do you have to say for yourself, Lady Frega?
translation: Judge: 弗雷加小姐，有什么要为自己辩解的吗？

original: MBeatrice: Do [i]not[/i] call me that.
translation: MBeatrice: <u>不要</u>这么叫我。

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Tyrion: ...It's almost funny that you hate your name that much.
translation: Tyrion: ……你这么痛恨自己的姓氏，旁人看来都到了有趣的地步。

original: Tyrion: Your entire plan depended on your claim to the Frega Estate.
translation: Tyrion: 你的整个计划都基于自己能获得弗雷加家族资产这一点。

original: MBeatrice: ...Do you have any idea what you've just cost me?!
translation: MBeatrice: ……你知不知道你刚刚让我付出了什么代价？！

original: MBeatrice: [i]Everything[/i] has been ruined because of you!
translation: MBeatrice: <u>一切</u>都被你给毁了！

original: Tyrion: Why should I care?[p/] You're just another noble.[p/] Trying to steal power for yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 关我什么事？[p/]你不过是又一个贵族，[p/]满心只想着为自己夺取权力。

original: MBeatrice: Don't you [i]dare[/i] lump me together with those tyrants!
translation: MBeatrice: 你<u>不准</u>把我和那些暴君相提并论！

original: MBeatrice: We wouldn't have just liberated House Frega![p/][s/] We would have liberated everyone!
translation: MBeatrice: 我们能解放的不只是弗雷加一家！[p/][s/]我们本能解放所有人！

original: MBeatrice: Miriam,[p/] Laefe,[p/] Aria,[p/] even Aster.
translation: MBeatrice: 米莉亚姆，[p/]拉菲，[p/]阿莉亚，[p/]甚至是阿斯特。

original: MBeatrice: Our system is [i]broken[/i]![p/][s/] The only way we can fix it is by burning it down from the inside!
translation: MBeatrice: 我们的体系<u>残破不堪</u>！[p/][s/]只有从内部一把火烧尽才有机会修复！

original: MBeatrice: As long as King Olivier sits on the throne,[p/][s/] this suffering will only continue!
translation: MBeatrice: 只要王座上的还是奥利维尔王，[p/][s/]人们就只会继续受苦！

original: Judge: L-[p/][s/]Lady Frega!
translation: Judge: 弗、[p/][s/]弗雷加小姐！

original: Tyrion: ...As the prosecutor,[p/] I should warn you.
translation: Tyrion: ……作为检察官，[p/]我应该警告你。

original: Tyrion: You don't want to add treason to your list of crimes.
translation: Tyrion: 这样会让你的罪名里多一条叛国罪。

original: Even though,[p/] [i]you'd[/i] like to see the King ousted as much as she does.
translation: 虽然，[p/]<u>你</u>和她一样想看国王尽早被罢黜。

original: MBeatrice: Hmph...[p/] It doesn't matter.[p/] I'm done either way.
translation: MBeatrice: 哼……[p/]不重要了。[p/]我横竖都完蛋了。

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: MBeatrice: ...Heavensborn.[p/] Look at page 46 of the Blood Contract.
translation: MBeatrice: ……天诞之物。[p/]看看血契第四十六页。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: "By accepting this pact,[p/] Beatrice Frega forever binds her soul to the Abyssal Hells."
translation: Tyrion: “接受这份契约内容的话，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的灵魂将永世被深渊地狱束缚。”

original: Tyrion: "If Beatrice Frega fails to pay her debt by claiming House Frega and all of its assets..."
translation: Tyrion: “如果比亚特丽丝·弗雷加不能获得弗雷加一族的资产，偿还债务失败……”

original: Tyrion: "Her soul,[p/] her mind,[p/] and her life will be claimed by the Empress of Discord."
translation: Tyrion: “她的灵魂，[p/]她的意识，[p/]和她的生命都会献给无序女皇”。

original: The contract goes on to name several parts of House Frega's holdings.[p/] There's very little room for ambiguity.
translation: 契约随后提及了弗雷加家持有的一些股份。[p/]没有模棱两可的余地。

original: MBeatrice: Aria was [i]almost[/i] right.[p/] She just jumped to the wrong conclusion.
translation: MBeatrice: 阿莉亚<u>几乎</u>都说对了。[p/]她只是得出了错误的结论。

original: MBeatrice: My debts were never to the Eyetaker...[p/] They were to the Abyssal Hells.
translation: MBeatrice: 我欠了债务的对象不是夺眼者……[p/]而是深渊地狱。

original: Tyrion: Why would you agree to something like this?!
translation: Tyrion: 你为什么会同意这种东西啊？！

original: MBeatrice: Because I miscalculated...
translation: MBeatrice: 因为我失算了……

original: Beatrice: In this folder are records of your [i]many[/i] plots against House Steelwind [i]and[/i] the Crown.
translation: Beatrice: 这个文件夹里的文件，记录了你针对斯蒂尔文德家<u>和</u>皇室的<u>众多</u>阴谋。

original: Beatrice: ...It would be a shame if this information fell into their hands.
translation: Beatrice: ……要是这些情报落到他们手里就不好了。

original: William: You think this feeble attempt at blackmail will frighten me?
translation: William: 你以为这种无力的恐吓能吓到我？

original: William: I've dealt with far more formidable adversaries than you.
translation: William: 我对付过比你可怕得多的敌人。

original: William: There's [i]nothing[/i] I can't solve with House Frega's resources.
translation: William: <u>没有什么</u>是不能用弗雷加家的资源解决的。

original: Beatrice: What are you talking about...?
translation: Beatrice: 你在说什么……？

original: Beatrice: Lucio Steelwind isn't the type of person you can just buy.
translation: Beatrice: 卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德不是那种能用金钱贿赂的人。

original: William: It's clear your time away has taught you nothing.
translation: William: 看来你离开家这段时间什么都没学到。

original: William: [i]Everyone[/i] can be bought.
translation: William: <u>所有人</u>都能被贿赂。

original: MBeatrice: Before I left,[p/] he controlled every aspect of my life.
translation: MBeatrice: 离开之前，[p/]他掌控了我生活的每一部分。

original: MBeatrice: I saw him as this unstoppable, tyrannical force.
translation: MBeatrice: 我把他视为难以阻挡的暴君。

original: MBeatrice: But I never even [i]considered[/i] one possibility.
translation: MBeatrice: 但我从没<u>考虑过</u>一种可能性。

original: MBeatrice: ...That William Frega was a sheltered moron.
translation: MBeatrice: ……威廉·弗雷加只是个井底之蛙。

original: Tyrion: He honestly thought he could [i]pay off[/i] Lucio Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 他真的以为自己可以<u>贿赂</u>卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion: Anyone who's met him would know that would never work.
translation: Tyrion: 实际见过他的人都知道这招不会有用。

original: MBeatrice: I could've sent this information to House Steelwind and the King.
translation: MBeatrice: 我本可以把这些情报送到斯蒂尔文德家和国王处。

original: MBeatrice: But I was running out of time.[p/] I [i]needed[/i] to inherit House Frega as soon as I could.
translation: MBeatrice: 但我没有时间了。[p/]我<u>需要</u>尽快继承弗雷加家。

original: MBeatrice: I felt trapped...[p/] I felt angry...
translation: MBeatrice: 我感到进退维谷……[p/]怒气横生……

original: MBeatrice: I just wanted something to change.
translation: MBeatrice: 我想要改变某些事。

original: Something about this feels wrong.[p/] Something deep inside you is crying out in anger.
translation: 你感觉这样哪里不对。[p/]你心底有什么在发出怒吼。

original: Tyrion: ...A Blood Contract is still a legal contract, isn't it?
translation: Tyrion: ……血契依然是法律文件，对吧？

original: MBeatrice: ...What?
translation: MBeatrice: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: If it's a contract,[p/][s/] we can dispute it!
translation: Tyrion: 如果是一份契约，[p/][s/]我们就可以对其中内容提出异议！

original: Tyrion: We can find [i]some[/i] kind of loophole to get you out of it!
translation: Tyrion: 我们可以找到<u>某种</u>漏洞，让你不受其束缚！

original: MBeatrice: What?!
translation: MBeatrice: 什么？！

original: MBeatrice: ...Trying to [i]redeem[/i] the enemy you [i]just[/i] defeated?
translation: MBeatrice: ……你想<u>救赎</u>自己<u>刚刚</u>打败的敌人？

original: MBeatrice: You really [i]are[/i] a heavensborn.
translation: MBeatrice: 你还<u>真是个</u>实打实的天诞之物。

original: MBeatrice: I'm sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] But I won't accept your help.
translation: MBeatrice: 抱歉，卡斯伯特。[p/]但我不会接受你的帮助。

original: Tyrion: What?![p/][s/] Why?!
translation: Tyrion: 啥？！[p/][s/]为什么？！

original: Tyrion: We can at least try, right?!
translation: Tyrion: 至少可以让我试试吧？！

original: Tyrion: Did you seriously come this far just so you could die?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真就绝望到宁可死去？！

original: MBeatrice: To dispute a Blood Contract is to bet your own soul.
translation: MBeatrice: 想对血契提出异议，你就要赌上自己的灵魂。

original: MBeatrice: If you fail to render it null,[p/] [i]your[/i] soul will be dragged to Hell alongside hers.
translation: MBeatrice: 如果你没能成功使之无效化，[p/]那<u>你的</u>灵魂会和她的一起为地狱所有。

original: MBeatrice: Even your divine blood won't save you from that fate.
translation: MBeatrice: 你的神圣之血也救不了你。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But, still![p/][s/] I can't just-!
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但还是！[p/][s/]我不能就——！

original: MBeatrice: You've beaten me, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: MBeatrice: 你打败了我，卡斯伯特先生。

original: MBeatrice: I don't want to drag anyone else down with me anymore.
translation: MBeatrice: 我不想再拉别人下水了。

original: MBeatrice: Not you.[p/] Not Laefe.[p/] Not Miriam.
translation: MBeatrice:  你不行，[p/]拉菲不行，[p/]米莉亚姆也不行。

original: MBeatrice: Despite everything,[p/] I still have my dignity.
translation: MBeatrice: 虽然发生了这么多，[p/]但我还有自己的尊严。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Judge: ...I believe there's no further need to prolong this trial.
translation: Judge: ……看来没有必要延长审理了。

original: Judge: Bailiff.[p/] Please escort Lady Frega and her familiar to a holding cell.
translation: Judge: 法警。[p/]请护送弗雷加小姐与她的使魔至拘留所。

original: Judge: I'll be passing my verdict shortly.
translation: Judge: 我很快就会下达判决。

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: 嘿……[p/]你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] As okay as I [i]can[/i] be.
translation: Tyrion: 还好……[p/]也<u>只有</u>还好。

original: You still feel uneasy about how things turned out.[p/] It doesn't feel quite like the victory you were hoping for.
translation: 你依然对事态的发展感到不安。[p/]这和你所期待的胜利不同。

original: You fought against the demons...[p/] And you can't help but feel like you lost.
translation: 你赢过了恶魔……[p/]但感觉却像是输了一样。

original: Ruby: ...Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特。

original: Ruby: We need to talk.
translation: Ruby: 我们得谈谈。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: ...What's done is done.[p/] But the Boss isn't going to take kindly to what you've done today.
translation: Ruby: ……覆水难收。[p/]但头目不会对你今天的所作所为善罢甘休。

original: Ruby: I know it's a long shot.[p/] But maybe if you talk to him,[p/] he'll-
translation: Ruby: 我知道可能很勉强，[p/]但如果你能和他谈谈，[p/]他会——

original: Tyrion: No.
translation: Tyrion: 不。

original: Ruby: Cuthbert![p/][s/] This is serious![p/]
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特！[p/][s/]这很严肃！[p/]

original: Ruby: He's [i]going[/i] to send people after you![p/] [i]Dangerous[/i] people.[p/] You can't just [i]ignore[/i] this!
translation: Ruby: 他<u>会</u>派人来追杀你！[p/]而且是很<u>危险</u>的人。[p/]你不能就这么<u>无视</u>这一点！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: How old were you when your [i]real[/i] mother was executed?[p/] Ten years old?
translation: Eris: 你在自己的<u>生母</u>被处决时多大？[p/]十岁？

original: Eris: Tymora was the adult in that situation,[p/] and what did she do?
translation: Eris: 泰摩拉是成年人，[p/]她当时做了什么？

original: Eris: She fed your anger and hatred for the nobility,[p/] instead of allowing you to process your grief healthily.
translation: Eris: 她没有让你正确处理自己的悲伤，[p/]反而给你灌输对贵族的愤怒与恨意。

original: Eris: Tymora took you away from your only friends and isolated you from society.
translation: Eris: 泰摩拉把你从仅有的朋友们身边带走，让你与世隔离。

original: Eris: As a result,[p/] you never formed any other relationships.
translation: Eris: 结果就是，[p/]你没能建立其他人际关系。

original: Eris: She isolated you because she wanted to use you.
translation: Eris: 她把你孤立就是为了利用你。

original: Ruby: Please just listen to me and-
translation: Ruby: 请听我说——

original: Tyrion: Shut.[p/][p/] Up.
translation: Tyrion: 住。[p/][p/]嘴。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...?
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……？

original: Tyrion: How could you do this...?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能这么做……？

original: Tyrion: How could you work with [i]criminals[/i]?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能与<u>罪犯</u>同流合污？！

original: Ruby: Cuthbert...[p/] I-
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特……[p/]我——

original: Tyrion: [i]Everything[/i] you told me![p/][s/] All those ideals about protecting the weak!
translation: Tyrion: 你告诉我的<u>所有事</u>！[p/][s/]那些要保护弱者的理想！

original: Tyrion: It was all a lie!
translation: Tyrion: 都只是谎言！

original: Tyrion: Everything Commander White said about you is true, isn't it?!
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官对你的评价都是真的，是不是？！

original: Ruby: I'm just trying to-
translation: Ruby: 我只是想——

original: Tyrion: I don't [i]want[/i] your help!
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>不想要</u>你的帮助！

original: As you yell at her,[p/] your voice echoes throughout the lobby.[p/] Several of the people nearby turn silent.
translation: 你对着她大喊，[p/]吼声响彻大厅。[p/]旁边的几个人都被吓得沉默。

original: Tyrion: I gave up [s/][i]everything[/i] for you![p/][s/] My childhood![p/][s/] My home![p/][s/] My happiness!
translation: Tyrion: 我因为你放弃了<u>一切</u>！[p/][s/]我的童年！[p/][s/]我的家！[p/][s/]我的快乐！

original: Tyrion: I left it all behind to chase the ideal that [i]you[/i] told me you were fighting for!
translation: Tyrion: 为了追逐<u>你</u>说自己在为之奋斗的理想，我放弃了一切！

original: Tyrion: But it was never real, was it?!
translation: Tyrion: 但都是假的，是不是？！

original: Tyrion: You made me throw away [i]everything[/i]![p/][s/] [i]All[/i] for a god-damned lie!
translation: Tyrion: 你让我放弃了<u>一切</u>！[p/][s/]<u>就为了</u>一个该死的谎言！

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: But I'll make it real.
translation: Tyrion: 但我会让理想成真。

original: Tyrion: ...And I'll do it without you.
translation: Tyrion: ……也不需要你的帮忙。

original: Ruby: Tyrion...[p/][s/] I-
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……[p/][s/]我——

original: As she reaches her hand out to you,[p/] you step away from her.
translation: 她向着你伸出手，[p/]但你后退一步躲开了。

original: Tyrion: You never cared about me, did you...?!
translation: Tyrion: 你根本没关心过我，是吧……？！

original: Tyrion: ...All you cared about was using the Eye of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: ……你关心的只有利用荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Ruby: That's not-!
translation: Ruby: 不是——！

original: Tyrion: Shut up![p/][s/] I don't want to hear [i]any[/i] more of your damn lies!
translation: Tyrion: 闭嘴！[p/][s/]我不想再听你撒谎连篇！

original: Tyrion: Go away![p/][s/] Get the [i]hell[/i] away from me!
translation: Tyrion: 走开！[p/][s/]给我<u>滚开</u>！

original: Tyrion: I [i]never[/i] want to see you again!
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>永远</u>不想再见到你！

original: Without a word,[p/] she walks away from you.
translation: 她一语不发走开了。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: She reaches out her hand to hold yours again.[p/] But she hesitates this time.
translation: 她想再握住你的手，[p/]但这次她迟疑了。

original: Eris: Do you honestly think Celeste will ever love you?
translation: Eris: 你真以为塞莱斯特会爱上你？

original: Eris: I'm sure you understand now.[p/] Tymora can only afford to pay her exorbitant salary because of my father.
translation: Eris: 你现在肯定明白了。[p/]泰摩拉支付给她的高额薪水其实都来自我父亲。

original: Eris: You've already burned that bridge.[p/] So where do you think the Crimson Demon will go when you can't afford her services anymore?
translation: Eris: 但你已经和她恩断义绝。[p/]绯红恶魔凭什么觉得你还能付得起她的工资？

original: Eris: Do you think she has the luxury of playing around with you for [i]free[/i]?
translation: Eris: 你真觉得她会<u>免费</u>陪你四处胡闹？

original: Eris: Or did you actually think that she [i]enjoys[/i] spending time with you?
translation: Eris: 还是你以为她很<u>喜欢</u>和你共度的时光？

original: Eris: Tyrion.[p/] You have to look at this rationally.
translation: Eris: 提利昂。[p/]理性思考一下。

original: Eris: Any support or affection that she's given you has only been to keep you as an employer.
translation: Eris: 她对你表现过的支持或亲密，都是为了让你继续雇佣她。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: No.
translation: Tyrion: 不。

original: Eris: What?
translation: Eris: 什么？

original: Celeste: I can’t believe it…[p/][s/] We actually won!
translation: Celeste: 难以置信……[p/][s/]我们真的胜诉了！

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion…[p/][s/] I…
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: Celeste.[p/] There’s no way for you to avoid checkmate next turn.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]无论你怎么下，也逃不开下一回合被将死的命运。

original: Tyrion: Just surrender…
translation: Tyrion: 别垂死挣扎了……

original: Celeste: There![p/][s/] What about that?!
translation: Celeste: 看招！[p/][s/]知道厉害了吧？！

original: Tyrion: …Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军。

original: Celeste: Damn it!
translation: Celeste: 可恶！

original: Celeste: You've been acting weird since we arrived in Aurinax.
translation: Celeste: 自从我们到欧奥耐克斯后，你就变得奇怪起来了。

original: Celeste: ...Does it have something to do with your mother?
translation: Celeste: ……是不是和你的母亲有关？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: Please.[p/] Just talk to me.
translation: Celeste: 拜托了，[p/]告诉我吧。

original: Celeste: I'm...[p/] your friend,[p/] aren't I?
translation: Celeste: 我是……[p/]你的朋友，[p/]对吧？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Your hands are trembling.[p/] Why are you so scared right now?
translation: 你的双手在颤抖。[p/]为什么现在会这么害怕？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You feel Celeste hold your trembling hand from behind you.
translation: 你感到塞莱斯特从后方握住了你颤抖的手。

original: It's the same sensation you felt back then.
translation: 和你当时的感觉一样。

original: Your anxiety fades and you take a deep breath.
translation: 焦虑渐渐褪去，你深吸了一口气。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm not going to do that, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不会这么做，泰摩拉女士。

original: As she hesitates to hold your hand,[p/] you reach out and grasp it.
translation: 她犹豫不决，[p/]于是你先一步握住了她的手。

original: She smiles as you take hold of it.[p/] She seems glad you didn't pull away this time.
translation: 她对你绽放出一个微笑，[p/]似乎很高兴你这次没有躲开。

original: ...Without thinking,[p/] you pull her into a hug.
translation: ……没有多想，[p/]你把她拉到怀里抱住。

original: Celeste: H-[p/][s/]Huh?!
translation: Celeste: 呜、[p/][s/]呜哦？！

original: Tyrion: ...Sorry.[p/] I just really need this right now.
translation: Tyrion: ……抱歉。[p/]我现在真的很需要这么做。

original: Tyrion: Should I stop?
translation: Tyrion: 我该住手？

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] It's just...
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不是……[p/]只是……

original: Celeste: People are staring at us.
translation: Celeste: 别人都看着呢。

original: Tyrion: Who cares what they think?[p/] They're nobles.
translation: Tyrion: 谁管他们怎么想？[p/]一群贵族而已。

original: Tyrion: They're going to hate us no matter what we do.
translation: Tyrion: 不管我们做什么都会讨厌我们。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You're still unsure of what you're going to do next...
translation: 你依然不确定自己下一步要做什么……

original: But perhaps you don't need to.[p/] Even if Tymora's ideal was a lie.
translation: 即使泰摩拉的理想是个谎言，[p/]你也不需要立刻决定。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Hey, Celeste.[p/] There's been something I've been wanting to tell you about.
translation: Tyrion: 欸，塞莱斯特。[p/]我一直有事想告诉你。

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh?![p/][s/] U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] What is it?
translation: Celeste: 喔、[p/][s/]喔？！[p/][s/]呃、[p/][s/]呃……[p/]什么事？

original: Tyrion: It's hard to explain really...[p/] I don't even know where to begin.
translation: Tyrion: 很难解释……[p/]我都不确定从何说起。

original: Tyrion: But it's about an ability I have.
translation: Tyrion: 但我有一种特殊能力。

original: Tyrion: I call it the Eye of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: 我称为荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Even if that ideal was a lie,[p/] you have the power to make it real.
translation: 即使理想是个谎言，[p/]你也有能使其成真的力量。

original: And even if you can't trust Tymora anymore,[p/] you have people in your life that you [i]can[/i] trust.
translation: 即使已经不再相信泰摩拉，[p/]你也有其他<u>可以</u>相信的人。

original: Eyetaker: What a [i]fine[/i] mess this is...
translation: Eyetaker: 真是<u>一团糟</u>……

original: Eyetaker: That kid has completely and [i]utterly[/i] ruined everything.
translation: Eyetaker: 这小子真是<u>彻彻底底</u>毁了一切。

original: Eyetaker: ...As much as Tymora hates it,[p/] we're going to need to put him in the ground.
translation: Eyetaker: ……虽然泰摩拉不乐意，[p/]但我们还是得把他做掉。

original: Eris: I don't think that will be necessary.
translation: Eris: 我觉得没有这个必要。

original: Eyetaker: Sorry, Love.[p/] I know you're fond of him,[p/] but I can't let an insult like this go unanswered.
translation: Eyetaker: 不好意思，宝贝。[p/]我知道你很喜欢他，[p/]但我不能被侮辱后就这么算了。

original: Eyetaker: He's going to have to pay the price.
translation: Eyetaker: 他需要付出代价。

original: Eris: I think you've misunderstood me, "father".[p/] I meant that this facade is no longer necessary.
translation: Eris: 你误会我了，“父亲”。[p/]我是说没必要维持伪装了。

original: Eyetaker: ...
translation: Eyetaker: ……

original: Eyetaker: ...!
translation: Eyetaker: ……！

original: Eyetaker: What...?[p/][s/] What the hell?!
translation: Eyetaker: 什么……？[p/][s/]搞什么鬼？！

original: Eris: Is something wrong, "father"?
translation: Eris: 有事吗，“父亲”？

original: Eyetaker: Who...[p/][s/] Who the hell are you?!
translation: Eyetaker: 你……[p/][s/]你丫是谁？！

original: Eyetaker: You look [i]nothing[/i] like my daughter![p/] So, why-?
translation: Eyetaker: 你看起来<u>一点</u>不像我的女儿！[p/]那为什么——？

original: Eris: It happened centuries ago,[p/] I believe.
translation: Eris: 大概几世纪前吧，[p/]我想。

original: Eris: Your great-ancestor hated the monarchy and needed a weapon to fight the mages of the noble house.
translation: Eris: 你的先祖痛恨君主政体，需要武器来对抗贵族的法师。

original: Eris: So he made a pact with me.
translation: Eris: 于是他和我签订了契约。

original: Eyetaker: W-[p/][s/]What are you talking about?!
translation: Eyetaker: 你、[p/][s/]你在胡说什么？！

original: Eris: But things didn't turn out like he wanted, I'm afraid.
translation: Eris: 但很不幸，事态发展没有如他所愿。

original: Eris: Poor Lord Leiran's plot was discovered,[p/] and his noble house was stripped of its rank and status.
translation: Eris: 可怜的雷兰勋爵阴谋暴露，[p/]一大家子都被剥夺了贵族地位。

original: Eris: His very name was stricken from the annals of history.
translation: Eris: 他的名字也被彻底从历史记录中抹除。

original: Eris: ...He was [i]supposed[/i] to give me Wyverngarde.[p/] But I had to settle for claiming his bloodline.
translation: Eris: ……他<u>本应</u>把维文加德献给我。[p/]但我只能退而求其次，接受他的子孙。

original: Eyetaker: "Leiran..."?[p/] H-[p/][s/]How do you know about my name?!
translation: Eyetaker: “雷兰”……？[p/]你、[p/][s/]你怎么知道我的姓氏？！

original: Eyetaker: [i]No one[/i] knew about that name![p/][s/] Not even my [i]real[/i] daughter!
translation: Eyetaker: <u>没人</u>知道这个姓氏！[p/][s/]就连我的<u>亲生</u>女儿都不知道！

original: Eris: I know it's been centuries.[p/] But I haven't forgotten, Jon.
translation: Eris: 也许已经过去几个世纪，[p/]但我从未忘记，琼恩。

original: Eris: Everyone in your bloodline belongs to me,[p/][s/] [i]including[/i] your daughter.
translation: Eris: 你的所有血亲都属于我，[p/][s/]<u>包括</u>你的女儿。

original: Eyetaker: You bastard![p/][s/] What did you do to her?!
translation: Eyetaker: 畜生！[p/][s/]你把她怎么了？！

original: Eris: What I do to all my prey.[p/] I made her suffer.
translation: Eris: 和我对其他猎物做的一样：[p/]我让她承受痛苦。

original: Eyetaker: No...
translation: Eyetaker: 不……

original: Eris: Did you know that she was crying out for you for months?
translation: Eris: 你知道她哭着喊了你几个月吗？

original: Eris: I made her watch, you know.[p/] I made her watch as I took her place.
translation: Eris: 我让她看了，[p/]我让她亲眼见证自己的位置是怎么被我夺走的。

original: Eris: All while the "father" that she so desperately called out for forgot who she was.
translation: Eris: 而她苦苦哀求的“父亲”已经忘了她是谁。

original: Eris: All while my minions slowly and painfully tore her soul apart.
translation: Eris: 我的仆从们缓慢地撕裂她的灵魂，让她痛苦不堪。

original: Eyetaker: You...[p/][s/] You monster!
translation: Eyetaker: 你……[p/][s/]你这怪物！

original: Eyetaker: You goddamned monster!
translation: Eyetaker: 你这该死的怪物！

original: Eris: I enjoyed her torment while it lasted...[p/] But even [i]that[/i] couldn't satisfy me.
translation: Eris: 我很享受折磨她的过程……[p/]但就连<u>这</u>也满足不了我。

original: Eris: What I [i]really[/i] crave is the blood of a celestial.
translation: Eris: 我<u>真正</u>想要的是天人的血。

original: Eyetaker: [i]That's[/i] what this is about?![p/][s/] That stupid kid?!
translation: Eyetaker: 就为了<u>这个</u>？！[p/][s/]这个蠢小子？！

original: Eris: But I can't have you kill my dear Tyrion just yet.
translation: Eris: 但我现在还不能让你干掉亲爱的提利昂。

original: Eris: At least not until [i]I'm[/i] done with him.
translation: Eris: 至少得等<u>我</u>玩够。

original: Eyetaker: You goddamned demon![p/] I'll kill you!
translation: Eyetaker: 天杀的，你这恶魔！[p/]我要杀了你！

original: Eris: This man is your enemy.[p/] Your life's goal is[p/] and always has been to exact revenge on him.
translation: Eris: 这个男人就是你的敌人。[p/]你人生唯一的目标就是[p/]对他复仇。

original: Eyetaker: W-[p/][s/]What the [i]hell[/i] are you talking about?!
translation: Eyetaker: 你、[p/][s/]你在说什么<u>鬼话</u>？！

original: Knight: You![p/][s/] I lost [i]everything[/i] because of you!
translation: Knight: 你！[p/][s/]我因为你失去了<u>一切</u>！

original: Knight: They kicked me out of the Inquisition because of your false testimony!
translation: Knight: 都因为你证言有误，我被裁判所开除了！

original: Eyetaker: W-[p/][s/]What...?[p/] L-[p/][s/]Let go of me!
translation: Eyetaker: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？[p/]放、[p/][s/]放开我！

original: Merchant: Y-[p/][s/]You...[p/] You killed my entire family!
translation: Merchant: 你、[p/][s/]你……[p/]你杀了我全家！

original: Merchant: I won't let you get away with this!
translation: Merchant: 我不会让你跑掉的！

original: Eyetaker: W-[p/][s/]What are you talking about?![p/][s/] I didn't do anything!
translation: Eyetaker: 你、[p/][s/]你胡说什么？！[p/][s/]我什么都没做！

original: Townsfolk: Hey...[p/] Isn't that the noble who killed all those children?!
translation: Townsfolk: 喂……[p/]那个人不就是屠杀幼儿的贵族？！

original: Townsfolk: I heard he got released by paying off the judge!
translation: Townsfolk: 我听说他通过贿赂法官而无罪释放！

original: Eyetaker: What are you all talking about?![p/][s/] Get away from me!
translation: Eyetaker: 你们都在说什么？！[p/][s/]给我滚开！

original: Townsfolk: Don't lie to us![p/][s/] We know what you did!
translation: Townsfolk: 休想骗我们！[p/][s/]我们知道你的行径！

original: Eyetaker: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/][s/] Stay away!
translation: Eyetaker: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/][s/]别过来！

original: Eyetaker: AGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGH!
translation: Eyetaker: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！</size>

original: Eris: We've finally entered the final act,[p/] my dearest Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 终于要开始最后一幕了，[p/]我亲爱的提利昂。

original: Eris: And from what I've seen,[p/] I think I know [i]exactly[/i] how I'm going to break you.
translation: Eris: 根据我的所见所闻，[p/]我已经知道<u>怎么</u>让你崩溃。

original: Eris: I hope you're just as excited as I am.
translation: Eris: 希望你也和我一样激动。

original: Ms. Tymora leads you out of the courthouse and into the city.
translation: 泰摩拉女士带你离开法庭，走进市区。

original: Every time you ask her where she's taking you,[p/] she avoids answering your question.
translation: 每次你问她要去哪里，[p/]她都只会避而不答。

original: Ruby: Alright...[p/] We're here.
translation: Ruby: 好了……[p/]我们到了。

original: You arrive at an empty alley in the frankly seedier part of the city.
translation: 你们抵达了城市偏僻区域的一条空巷。

original: As Ms. Tymora approaches one of the derelict buildings,[p/] she's met with a large burly man who's guarding the backdoor.
translation: 泰摩拉女士走近其中一座废弃的建筑，[p/]停在一个高大粗鲁，正看守着后门的男人面前。

original: The man silently acknowledges her and steps aside to let her in.
translation: 男人沉默地看了她一眼，闪身让她进入。

original: Tyrion: ...Ms. Tymora?[p/] Where are we going?
translation: Tyrion: ……泰摩拉女士？[p/]我们要去哪儿？

original: Ruby: I'm sorry about this...[p/] I'm sure you're confused.
translation: Ruby: 我很抱歉……[p/]你一定很困惑。

original: Ruby: But please trust me.[p/] I'll explain everything.
translation: Ruby: 但请相信我。[p/]我会解释清楚的。

original: Before you have a chance to ask for more information,[p/] she moves into the building.
translation: 你还没来得及提出更多问题，[p/]她就进入了建筑物。

original: The man guarding the door looks at you expectantly.
translation: 守门的男人翘首看向你。

original: The entire situation doesn't sit right with you.[p/] But you still continue to follow her.
translation: 你觉得现况哪里不对劲，[p/]但还是跟随她前行。

original: Despite your recent disagreements,[p/] you know that you can trust her.
translation: 虽然最近有过争执，[p/]但你知道自己可以相信她。

original: As you head further into the building,[p/] you find yourself in a surprisingly well-furnished room.
translation: 进到建筑物深处后，[p/]你发现自己身处装潢奢华的房间。

original: From how it looked outside,[p/] you would have never guessed that it would look like this.
translation: 只看建筑外表的话，[p/]你绝对猜不到里面会别有洞天。

original: It almost looks like a room that you'd encounter in the Frega Manor.
translation: 看起来和弗雷加庄园里会有的房间相差无几。

original: As you enter the room,[p/] you spot several mercenaries standing at various points in the room.
translation: 进入房间后，[p/]你看到屋内各处都站着雇佣兵。

original: ...And most surprisingly you see Eris standing at the end of the room.
translation: ……最令你惊讶的是，厄莉斯也站在房间另一端。

original: You give her a confused look,[p/] but she simply smiles and waves at you.
translation: 你向她投去困惑的眼神，[p/]但她只是微笑着向你招手。

original: Sitting at a desk next to her,[p/] you see a man with an eyepatch.[p/] It looks like he's been expecting you.
translation: 在她旁边的桌子上，[p/]坐着一个戴了眼罩的男人。[p/]他似乎已经等候你多时。

original: Eyetaker: Ah, Tymora.
translation: Eyetaker: 啊，泰摩拉。

original: Upon seeing you two,[p/] he cordially welcomes Ms. Tymora before turning his attention to you.
translation: 看到你们两个以后，[p/]他热情地欢迎了泰摩拉女士，然后才把注意力转到你身上。

original: Eyetaker: And [i]you[/i] must be Tyrion.[p/] Tymora has told me a lot about you.
translation: Eyetaker: <u>你</u>一定就是提利昂了。[p/]泰摩拉对我说了很多你的事。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I see...[p/] But who are you?
translation: Tyrion: 我，[p/][s/]我明白了……[p/]但你是谁？

original: Eyetaker: Hm...[p/] I've been called many names over the years.[p/] But my favorite has always been "The Eyetaker".
translation: Eyetaker: 嗯……[p/]这些年里我有过很多不同的名字。[p/]但我最喜欢的一直是“夺眼者”。

original: Tyrion: The Eyetaker...
translation: Tyrion: 夺眼者……

original: Eyetaker: From the sounds of it,[p/] you've already heard of me.
translation: Eyetaker: 听起来，[p/]你听说过我的事。

original: Tyrion: ...Ms. Tymora.[p/] What is this...?
translation: Tyrion: ……泰摩拉女士。[p/]这是……？

original: Ruby: I-
translation: Ruby: 我——

original: Eyetaker: My daughter Eris has told me all about your work prosecuting this case.
translation: Eyetaker: 我女儿厄莉斯跟我说了你作为检方办理此案的功绩。

original: She's his [i]daughter[/i]?!
translation: 她是他的<u>女儿</u>？！

original: Eyetaker: But I have to say,[p/] I'm quite impressed.
translation: Eyetaker: 我得承认，[p/]真是叹为观止。

original: Eyetaker: Getting a [i]monkey[/i] to testify?[p/][s/] I don't think [i]I[/i] could even pull off a grift like that.
translation: Eyetaker: 让一只<u>猴子</u>作证？[p/][s/]就连<u>我</u>都不敢这么招摇撞骗。

original: Eyetaker: You've pretty much blown past my expectations.[p/] Why I-
translation: Eyetaker: 你真是完全超出我的预期。[p/]我为什么——

original: Tyrion: Get to the point.
translation: Tyrion: 有话直说。

original: As soon as you interrupt him,[p/] you feel every person in the room tense up.
translation: 你一打断他，[p/]房间里的所有人就都紧张起来。

original: You don't even need the Eye to know that your interruption put them on edge.
translation: 你都无需动用荷鲁斯之眼，就能知道你的行为让他们提心吊胆。

original: Eyetaker: ...Relax, everyone.[p/] Kids will be kids.
translation: Eyetaker: ……大家都放松。[p/]小孩子脾性而已。

original: Eyetaker: I'm a father myself, you know?
translation: Eyetaker: 我也是当爸的人，你懂吧？

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Eyetaker: Anyways,[p/] I'll get straight to the point.
translation: Eyetaker: 总之，[p/]那我就直说了。

original: Eyetaker: I have a certain interest in the outcome of this trial.
translation: Eyetaker: 这次庭审的结果与我有点利益相关。

original: Tyrion: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: ……你在说什么？

original: Eyetaker: Little Lady Frega has been a client of ours for a long time.
translation: Eyetaker: 弗雷加小姐是我们的老主顾了。

original: Eyetaker: I've done quite a lot of favors for her.[p/] And the time has finally come for me to collect.
translation: Eyetaker: 我帮了她不少忙。[p/]现在终于轮到我来获益了。

original: Tyrion: Those debts that Steelwind mentioned...
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德提到的债务……

original: Eyetaker: They all belong to me.
translation: Eyetaker: 债主都是我。

original: Eyetaker: But there's no need to worry.[p/] I know she's good for it.
translation: Eyetaker: 但没必要担心。[p/]我清楚她本领过人。

original: Eyetaker: That is...[p/] [i]if[/i] she can inherit House Frega.
translation: Eyetaker: 但是……[p/]<u>前提</u>是她能继承弗雷加家。

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？

original: Eyetaker: Tymora's a good attorney.[p/] Even [i]without[/i] my help.
translation: Eyetaker: 即使<u>没有</u>我的帮助，[p/]泰摩拉也是个优秀的律师。

original: Eyetaker: If she's convicted,[p/] we could easily reduce her sentence by rubbing the right hands.
translation: Eyetaker: 即使她被定罪了，[p/]我们也可以轻松托关系减刑。

original: Eyetaker: But, you see...[p/][s/] There's that pesky Slayer Rule.
translation: Eyetaker: 但是，你看……[p/][s/]法律中有一条“杀人者规则”。

original: Eyetaker: The thing is, Cuthbert,[p/] I [i]need[/i] Beatrice Frega to be acquitted in the current trial.
translation: Eyetaker: 卡斯伯特，重点在于，[p/]我<u>需要</u>弗雷加在本次审理中被判无罪。

original: Tyrion: So [i]that's[/i] what this is about?[p/][s/] House Frega's gold?!
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加家的财产？！[p/][s/]就为了<u>这个</u>？

original: Tyrion: That's why you helped her [i]murder[/i] William Frega?!
translation: Tyrion: 你就为了这个帮她<u>杀害了</u>威廉·弗雷加？！

original: Eyetaker: Please.[p/] My goals aren't nearly so short-sighted.
translation: Eyetaker: 拜托。[p/]我才不会这么急功近利。

original: Eyetaker: I have big plans.[p/] Not just for Beatrice but for this entire kingdom.
translation: Eyetaker: 我有远大的计划。[p/]不只是为比亚特丽丝，而是整个王国。

original: Eyetaker: And I need House Frega for that.
translation: Eyetaker: 为了这个计划，我需要获得弗雷加家。

original: Tyrion: ...Just like you "needed" Justin Waye?
translation: Tyrion: ……就和你“需要”贾斯汀·维耶一样？

original: Ruby: Tyrion!
translation: Ruby: 提利昂！

original: Eyetaker: Ah, Justin.[p/] It's really a shame what happened to him.
translation: Eyetaker: 啊，贾斯汀。[p/]发生在他身上的事真是遗憾。

original: Tyrion: Don't act so innocent...[p/][s/] He would have never tried to rob Dracogen if you didn't threaten him.
translation: Tyrion: 别装无辜了……[p/][s/]要不是受你威胁，他根本不会去抢劫德拉科根。

original: Eyetaker: Is that so?
translation: Eyetaker: 是这样吗？

original: Eyetaker: Do you think I just randomly showed up on his doorstep one day,[p/] demanding gold?
translation: Eyetaker: 你觉得是我突然有一天出现在他家门前，[p/]管他要钱？

original: Eyetaker: [i]He[/i] was the one who came to [i]me[/i] for help.
translation: Eyetaker: 是<u>他</u>主动找<u>我</u>寻求帮助。

original: Eyetaker: I just told him to pay back what he owed.
translation: Eyetaker: 我只是叫他欠债还钱而已。

original: Eyetaker: If he hadn't come to me,[p/] it would have been some other criminal.
translation: Eyetaker: 即使没来找我，[p/]他也会找其他罪犯。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eyetaker: But that's beside the point.[p/] Enough about what I wanted from Justin.
translation: Eyetaker: 但这跑题了。[p/]我和贾斯汀的事已经说得够多。

original: Eyetaker: Let's talk about what I want from you.
translation: Eyetaker: 来说说我和你的事。

original: Tyrion: You want me to throw the case?
translation: Tyrion: 你想让我放弃这个案子？

original: Eyetaker: Ah, I love this kid![p/][s/] I don't have to beat around the bush with this one!
translation: Eyetaker: 哟呵，我喜欢这小子！[p/][s/]他不需要我兜圈子！

original: Eyetaker: No one will doubt you.[p/] Especially considering the amount of work you put into this already.
translation: Eyetaker: 没有人会怀疑你。[p/]你已经为这案子尽心尽力了。

original: Eyetaker: You don't [i]need[/i] to do anything.
translation: Eyetaker: 你<u>不需要</u>做任何事。

original: Eyetaker: ...Just take a dive.
translation: Eyetaker: ……只需要缴械投降。

original: Tyrion: And let someone [i]else[/i] take the fall?
translation: Tyrion: 让<u>其他人</u>承担罪责？

original: Tyrion: No matter [i]what[/i] happens,[p/] the court [i]will[/i] blame someone for this.
translation: Tyrion: 不管发生<u>什么</u>，[p/]法庭都<u>会</u>找到一个承担责任的人。

original: Eyetaker: If it makes you feel better,[p/] I can assign Tymora to defend the old man [i]and[/i] his monkey.
translation: Eyetaker: 如果这样你能好受点，[p/]我可以安排泰摩拉为那个老头<u>与</u>他的猴子辩护。

original: Eyetaker: That way everyone can come out of this unharmed.
translation: Eyetaker: 这样大家都能毫发无损。

original: Eyetaker: Everyone wins.
translation: Eyetaker: 皆大欢喜。

original: Tyrion: ...Except for the fact that a [i]murderer[/i] will be put in charge of House Frega.
translation: Tyrion: ……但<u>杀人犯</u>会接管弗雷加家。

original: Eyetaker: Please.[p/] As if that's [i]any[/i] worse than the people in charge of the other noble houses.
translation: Eyetaker: 拜托。[p/]其他贵族家的领主也没有<u>好到哪里去</u>。

original: Eyetaker: If you recall,[p/] there's [i]already[/i] a murderer in charge of House von Sanctus.
translation: Eyetaker: 好好想想，[p/]冯·桑克图斯家的领主<u>已经</u>是杀人犯了。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eyetaker: They're [i]all[/i] dirty.[p/] You've seen it, haven't you?
translation: Eyetaker: 这些人<u>都</u>很肮脏。[p/]你不也亲眼见证过？

original: Eyetaker: They rig the system.[p/] They pay, threaten, or even kill people to get their way.
translation: Eyetaker: 他们操纵着整个社会的运转。[p/]贿赂、威胁、甚至直接杀死阻碍他们的人。

original: Eyetaker: All we're doing is...[p/] leveling the playing field.
translation: Eyetaker: 我们所做的一切……[p/]只是为了让争斗环境更公平一点。

original: Ruby: Tyrion,[p/] please.[p/] Just listen to him.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂，[p/]拜托了。[p/]听他说就好。

original: Tyrion: How can you just go along with this?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能和这些家伙合作下去？！

original: Ruby: ...I told you a long time ago that there were certain parts of my job that I couldn't tell you about.
translation: Ruby: ……很早以前我就告诉过你，我的工作有些难言之隐。

original: Ruby: Well [i]this[/i] is it.[p/][s/] [i]This[/i] is what we need to do to beat them!
translation: Ruby: 而<u>这</u>就是难言之隐。[p/][s/]<u>这些</u>都是我们为了打败他们不得不做的事！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Those rumors about you.[p/] They're all true, aren't they...?
translation: Tyrion: 那些关于你的传闻。[p/]它们都是真的……？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: Forgery.[p/] Bribery.[p/] Blackmail.[p/] You're guilty of each and every one of them...
translation: Tyrion: 伪造、[p/]贿赂、[p/]勒索。[p/]传言里的罪行你都犯过……

original: Tyrion: And you used [i]him[/i] to do it![p/][s/] All so you could keep winning!
translation: Tyrion: 并且你通过<u>他</u>来完成这一切！[p/][s/]难怪你能一直在法庭上获胜了！

original: Tyrion: You...[p/] [i]blackmailed[/i] Miriam, Ms. Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]<u>胁迫</u>了米莉亚姆，泰摩拉女士！

original: Ruby: Oh, as if we should show [i]any[/i] pity for that spoiled princess!
translation: Ruby: 哦，好像我们还应该对那个被宠坏的小公主<u>表示遗憾</u>似的！

original: A dreadful thought just entered your mind.
translation: 一个可怕的想法涌上你的心头。

original: Tyrion: Steelwind...[p/] She was attacked the day that Beatrice was arrested...
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德……[p/]她在比亚特丽丝被捕的那天遭到攻击……

original: Tyrion: Was that-?!
translation: Tyrion: 那难道是——？！

original: Ruby: I-[p/][s/]I didn't [i]know[/i] that's what they were planning!
translation: Ruby: 我、[p/][s/]我当时<u>不知道</u>他们计划这么干！

original: Eyetaker: Despite my confidence in Tymora's skills,[p/] I'm afraid there was too much riding on this to leave to chance.
translation: Eyetaker: 尽管我对泰摩拉的辩护技术很有信心，[p/]但恐怕这件事太过重要，不能给对方任何机会。

original: Eyetaker: You've got to make your own luck if you want to beat the system.
translation: Eyetaker: 如果你想要打倒这个体制，你就必须自己创造“好运”。

original: Tyrion: How could you?![p/][s/] She almost died!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么能？！[p/][s/]她差点就死了！

original: Eyetaker: We never expected her to strain her injuries like that.
translation: Eyetaker: 我们也没预料到她会那样带伤上阵。

original: Eyetaker: And we definitely didn't expect [i]you[/i] to take her place.
translation: Eyetaker: 而我们也绝对预料不到<u>你</u>会接替她的位置。

original: Eyetaker: So believe me when I say,[p/] that I'm being [i]uncharacteristically[/i] reasonable right now.
translation: Eyetaker: 所以相信我这句话，[p/]我现在是<u>一反常态</u>地讲道理。

original: Tyrion: How...[p/][s/] How could you even [i]consider[/i] working with someone like him?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么……[p/][s/]你怎么能<u>考虑</u>和这样的人共事？

original: Eyetaker: Don't you think it's a little arrogant to judge her, Cuthbert?
translation: Eyetaker: 你不认为这样评判她有些傲慢了吗，卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……你什么意思？

original: Eyetaker: You talk about defending people as if you two are even close to being equals.
translation: Eyetaker: 你谈论为人辩护的时候，就好像你们处在平等的条件下一样。

original: Eyetaker: But [i]she[/i] doesn't have the luxury of looking into people's minds,[p/] now does she?
translation: Eyetaker: 但是<u>她</u>可没有能够看穿别人心思的奢侈能力，[p/]不是吗？

original: Tyrion: You...[p/][s/] You [i]told[/i] him about the Eye of Horus?!
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/][s/]你把荷鲁斯之眼的事情<u>告诉</u>了他？！

original: Ruby: I...
translation: Ruby: 我……

original: Eyetaker: The future of magic is changing, kid.
translation: Eyetaker: 魔法的未来是不断变化的，小子。

original: Eyetaker: Like I said before.[p/] I have big plans for this kingdom.[p/] And I also have big plans for [i]you[/i].
translation: Eyetaker: 就如我前面说过的，[p/]关于这个王国我有个大计划。[p/]而关于<u>你</u>我也有个大计划。

original: Tyrion: Do you think I would ever-?!
translation: Tyrion: 你还觉得我会——？！

original: Ruby: Tyrion![p/][s/] Stop!
translation: Ruby: 提利昂！[p/][s/]停下来！

original: Ruby: To be honest,[p/] I hate it as much as you do...
translation: Ruby: 说老实话，[p/]我和你同样憎恨这些事情……

original: Ruby: But whether you like it or not,[p/][s/] we [i]need[/i] their help!
translation: Ruby: 但不论你喜不喜欢，[p/][s/]我们都<u>需要</u>他们的帮助！

original: Tyrion: But this is-!
translation: Tyrion: 但这是——！

original: Ruby: Think about every client you defended![p/][s/] Think of Celeste!
translation: Ruby: 想想你辩护过的那些委托人！[p/][s/]想想塞莱斯特！

original: Ruby: If you didn't have the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] what would have happened to her?!
translation: Ruby: 如果你没有荷鲁斯之眼，[p/][s/]她身上会发生什么？！

original: Ruby: If even [i]one[/i] thing went differently,[p/][s/] Pierce would have gotten away and Celeste would have been executed!
translation: Ruby: 只要任何一个<u>环节</u>出了偏差，[p/][s/]皮尔斯就会逃脱制裁，而塞莱斯特就被处死了！

original: Ruby: You've taken chances and followed your instincts.[p/] And that's worked for you so far.
translation: Ruby: 你跟从自己的直觉，抓住机会，[p/]目前为止这都让你受益。

original: Ruby: But what if it's not enough?[p/] What if the system is too corrupt for you to fight against next time?
translation: Ruby: 但如果这还不够的话会怎么样？[p/]如果下一次整个体制都腐坏到你根本没法战胜又会怎么样？

original: Ruby: With the Eyetaker's help,[p/] you'll never have to worry about that again.
translation: Ruby: 有了夺眼者的协助，[p/]你再也不用担心这些问题。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: If [i]I[/i] had accepted his help sooner,[p/] I could have saved your mother.
translation: Ruby: 如果<u>我</u>能更早接受他的帮助，[p/]我就可以救下你的母亲。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eyetaker: So what's it going to be, kid?
translation: Eyetaker: 所以你现在要怎么选，小子？

original: Eyetaker: You already know about what happened to that Steelwind brat.[p/]
translation: Eyetaker: 你已经知道斯蒂尔文德家的小孩落了个什么下场。[p/]

original: Eyetaker: So I don't need to tell [i]you[/i] what'll happen if you don't play ball.
translation: Eyetaker: 应该不用对<u>你</u>重申不愿意合作的后果吧。

original: Ruby: W-[p/][s/]Wait!
translation: Ruby: 等、[p/][s/]等一下！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: No.
translation: Tyrion: 我拒绝。

original: Eyetaker: ...What?
translation: Eyetaker: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...Maybe you're right.[p/] Maybe I [i]can't[/i] always win against the nobility unless I play dirty like they do.
translation: Tyrion: ……或许你说得对。[p/]除非我和他们一样肮脏，不然我可能<u>做不到</u>每次都战胜那帮贵族。

original: Tyrion: But [i]this[/i]?[p/][s/] [i]This[/i] is wrong!
translation: Tyrion: 但<u>这种做法</u>？[p/][s/]<u>这</u>完全是错误的！

original: Ruby: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion!
translation: Ruby: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂！

original: Tyrion: I'm [i]not[/i] going to compromise my principles.[p/] Not even for you, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>不会</u>放弃自己的原则。[p/]即使是为了你也不行，泰摩拉女士。

original: Eyetaker: ...I'm sorry to hear you say that, kid.[p/] I really am.
translation: Eyetaker: ……很遗憾听到你这么说啊，小子。[p/]我真的很遗憾。

original: With one motion of his hand,[p/] every mercenary in the room draws their weapons.
translation: 他做了个手势，[p/]房间里的所有佣兵都拿出了武器。

original: Ruby: P-[p/][s/]Please,[p/] you don't have to do this!
translation: Ruby: 拜、[p/][s/]拜托，[p/]你没必要这么做！

original: Whatever conviction you had before is slowly fading.
translation: 你之前所确信的一切都在慢慢消失。

original: You should have never entered this place...[p/] You [i]knew[/i] something was off.
translation: 你根本不该进入这个房间……[p/]你<u>知道</u>出大问题了。

original: There are about a dozen mercenaries here...[p/] And there's even [i]more[/i] guarding the way out.
translation: 这里有十来个佣兵……[p/]而把守出口的人手甚至<u>更多</u>。

original: You're nowhere near as physically strong as Celeste...[p/] But maybe you can make a break for it if you get lucky.
translation: 你远不如塞莱斯特强壮……[p/]但幸运的话你或许能逃出去。

original: Celeste: No.
translation: Celeste: 这可不行。

original: Tyrion: C-[p/][s/]Celeste?!
translation: Tyrion: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特？！

original: Eyetaker: What the-?![p/][s/] How did you get in here?!
translation: Eyetaker: 什么——？！[p/][s/]你怎么进来的？！

original: Celeste: My whole [i]job[/i] is keeping this guy safe.
translation: Celeste: 我的<u>工作</u>就是确保这个家伙的安全。

original: Celeste: Do you honestly think I'd just let you take him to an undisclosed location?
translation: Celeste: 你真的觉得我会就这么让你把他带到一个秘密场所？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Eyetaker: Hmph...[p/][s/] It doesn't matter.[p/][s/] As if one girl will make a difference.
translation: Eyetaker: 哼嗯……[p/][s/]也没关系。[p/][s/]好像多一个女孩子能有什么区别一样。

original: Eyetaker: Well?[p/] What are you all waiting for?
translation: Eyetaker: 好吧？[p/]你们在等什么呢？

original: Mercenaries: ...Is that really her?
translation: Mercenaries: ……真的是她？

original: Upon seeing Celeste,[p/] the mercenaries cautiously step back.[p/] No one wants to make the first move.
translation: 看到塞莱斯特，[p/]佣兵们谨慎地后退一步。[p/]没有人想第一个动手。

original: Mercenaries: This monstrous aura...[p/] It [i]has[/i] to be her.
translation: Mercenaries: 这种怪物一样的气场……[p/]<u>一定</u>是她。

original: Eyetaker: What the hell are you doing?![p/] You have her surrounded!
translation: Eyetaker: 你们磨叽什么玩意儿？[p/]你们都把她包围了！

original: Despite his command,[p/] no one takes a step forward.
translation: 虽然他下了命令，[p/]但没人敢上前一步。

original: Ruby: L-[p/][s/]Look...[p/] Let's all just sit down and talk about this rationally.
translation: Ruby: 这、[p/][s/]这样……[p/]我们都坐下来，理性地谈一谈这个问题。

original: Eris: Perhaps a different approach is warranted here, Father.
translation: Eris: 或许得采用不同的方法，爸爸。

original: Eyetaker: ...What?
translation: Eyetaker: ……什么？

original: Eris: Could I have the opportunity to speak with Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Eris: 能让我和卡斯伯特先生谈一谈吗？

original: Eris: I believe [i]I[/i] can make him see things our way.
translation: Eris: 我相信<u>自己</u>能让他站在我们的角度看待问题。

original: Eyetaker: I'm sorry, sweetie. But I can't just[p/]
translation: Eyetaker: 我很抱歉，宝贝。但我不能[p/]

original: Eyetaker: ...
translation: Eyetaker: ……

original: Eyetaker: Well...[p/] You've never been wrong before.
translation: Eyetaker: 那好吧……[p/]你之前也从来没犯过错。

original: Eyetaker: I'll leave them to you, love.
translation: Eyetaker: 那我把他们交给你了，亲爱的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Eris: Shall we go, you two?
translation: Eris: 两位，我们能开始了吗？

original: Celeste silently watches Eris with her sword drawn.[p/] But unlike the mercenaries,[p/] Eris seems unmoved.
translation: 塞莱斯特执剑在手，静静地看着厄莉斯。[p/]但与其他佣兵不同，[p/]厄莉斯看起来毫不动摇。

original: She merely walks past her and out the exit.[p/] You and Celeste exchange glances and follow after her.
translation: 她仅是从塞莱斯特身边走出了房间。[p/]你和塞莱斯特交换了下眼神，然后跟在她后面。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] That was close.
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]真是好险。

original: Celeste: I don't think I could have fought that whole room while protecting you.
translation: Celeste: 我不认为自己能在保护你的同时收拾那间屋子的所有人。

original: ...Does that mean she [i]could[/i] have fought them if she were alone?
translation: ……意思是她一个人的话<u>就能</u>打过他们所有人？

original: Eris: You two are really courageous to a fault, aren't you?
translation: Eris:  你们俩还真是勇气可嘉呀，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Eris.[p/] I appreciate you vouching for us,[p/] but I'm not changing my mind about this.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯。[p/]我感谢你为我们担保，[p/]但我不会因此改变主意。

original: Eris: Oh, I'm well aware of that.[p/] Why do you think I intervened?
translation: Eris: 噢，这我很清楚。[p/]不然我为什么会干预？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh.[p/] Well...[p/] thank you.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，[p/]那么……[p/]谢谢你。

original: Celeste: Is this really okay?[p/] Won't your dad be mad?
translation: Celeste: 这样真的好吗？[p/]你父亲不会很生气吗？

original: Eris: I should be asking [i]Tyrion[/i] that same question.
translation: Eris: 这个问题或许该问<u>提利昂</u>。

original: Eris: You've seen your adoptive mother's true colors and rejected them.[p/] How are the two of you going to move forward?
translation: Eris: 你见识了自己养母的本来面目，对此拒不接纳。[p/]你们俩接下来如何前进呢？

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]She's not my-
translation: Tyrion: 她、[p/][s/]她才不是我的——

original: Eris: Isn't she, though?[p/] She lost any right to deny it the moment she took it upon herself to raise you.
translation: Eris: 原来她不是吗？[p/]她决定抚养你的时候就已经失去了否认的权利。

original: Tyrion: She only did that because I asked her to...[p/] It wasn't her choice.
translation: Tyrion: 她只是因为我请求她才这么做的……[p/]这并不是她的选择。

original: Eris: Oh, but it was.
translation: Eris: 噢，但那就是呀。

original: Eris: How old were you when your [i]real[/i] mother was executed?[p/] Ten years old?
translation: Eris: 你在自己的<u>生母</u>被处决时多大？[p/]十岁？

original: Celeste: Eris!
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯！

original: Eris: Back then you barely [i]knew[/i] Tymora.[p/] It would be a stretch to even call her a family friend.
translation: Eris: 你那时候还几乎<u>不认识</u>泰摩拉吧。[p/]甚至把她称作家人的朋友都牵强了一点。

original: Eris: She was the adult in that situation,[p/] and what did she do?
translation: Eris: 泰摩拉是成年人，[p/]她当时做了什么？

original: Eris: She fed your anger and hatred for the nobility,[p/] instead of allowing you to process your grief healthily.
translation: Eris: 她没有让你正确处理自己的悲伤，[p/]反而给你灌输对贵族的愤怒与恨意。

original: Eris: Tymora took you away from your only friends and isolated you from society.
translation: Eris: 泰摩拉把你从仅有的朋友们身边带走，让你与世隔离。

original: Eris: She even homeschooled you, didn't she?
translation: Eris: 她甚至都没让你上学，而是让你在家学习，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: T-[p/][s/]That's-!
translation: Tyrion: 那、[p/][s/]那是——！

original: Eris: As a result,[p/] you never formed any other relationships.
translation: Eris: 结果就是，[p/]你没能建立其他人际关系。

original: Eris: You made your first close friend at the age of twenty...[p/] And she was your [i]client[/i].
translation: Eris: 你二十岁才交到第一个密友……[p/]她还是你的<u>委托人</u>。

original: Eris: Don't you think that's a bit sad?
translation: Eris: 你不觉得这有点悲伤吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Eris: She isolated you because she wanted to use you.
translation: Eris: 她把你孤立就是为了利用你。

original: Tyrion: ...That's not true![p/][s/] That's not why she-!
translation: Tyrion: ……这不是真的！[p/][s/]这不是她这么做的原因——！

original: Eris: From what I've seen today,[p/] you clearly have no idea who [i]Tymora[/i] is.
translation: Eris: 就我今天所见，[p/]你显然对<u>泰摩拉</u>是什么人没有概念。

original: Eris: Even with the Eye of Horus,[p/] you're clearly a terrible judge of character.
translation: Eris: 即使有荷鲁斯之眼，[p/]你识人的本事依然糟糕。

original: Celeste: Eris![p/][s/] You're going way too far!
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯！[p/][s/]你说得太过火了！

original: Eris: To save you from more heartache,[p/] let me give you one last piece of advice.
translation: Eris: 为了不让你更加心痛，[p/]我给你最后一个建议。

original: Eris leans in really close to you and begins to whisper into your ear.
translation: 厄莉斯把身体靠得很近，开始向你耳语。

original: Eris: Do you honestly think Celeste will ever love you?
translation: Eris: 你真以为塞莱斯特会爱上你？

original: Tyrion: ...W-[p/][s/]What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什、[p/][s/]什么意思？

original: Eris: I'm sure you understand now.[p/] Tymora can only afford to pay her exorbitant salary because of my father.
translation: Eris: 你现在肯定明白了。[p/]泰摩拉支付给她的高额薪水其实都来自我父亲。

original: Eris: You've already burned that bridge.[p/] So where do you think the Crimson Demon will go when you can't afford her services anymore?
translation: Eris: 但你已经和她恩断义绝。[p/]绯红恶魔凭什么觉得你还能付得起她的工资？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] She's not-
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不是的……[p/]她才不——

original: Eris: With Flinhart dead,[p/] she has to worry about her mother.
translation: Eris: 弗林哈特死后，[p/]她还得担心自己的养母。

original: Eris: Do you think she has the luxury of playing around with you for [i]free[/i]?
translation: Eris: 你真觉得她会<u>免费</u>陪你四处胡闹？

original: Eris: Or did you actually think that she [i]enjoys[/i] spending time with you?
translation: Eris: 还是你以为她很<u>喜欢</u>和你共度的时光？

original: Tyrion: I-
translation: Tyrion: 我——

original: Eris: Tyrion.[p/] You have to look at this rationally.
translation: Eris: 提利昂。[p/]理性思考一下。

original: Eris: Any support or affection that she's given you has only been to keep you as an employer.
translation: Eris: 她对你表现过的支持或亲密，都是为了让你继续雇佣她。

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]You seem to know a lot about these things.
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你似乎很擅长这些事情。

original: Celeste: I had to do a lot of networking when I was a mercenary.
translation: Celeste: 毕竟我做雇佣兵时不得不进行大量的社交活动。

original: Celeste: Do you know how many times I had to charm a merchant into hiring me?
translation: Celeste: 有不少次我都得施展魅力才能让商人雇用我，你知道吗？

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Why...[p/] are you doing this?
translation: Tyrion: 为、[p/][s/]为什么……[p/]你要这么做？

original: Eris: Because I want to finally break you.
translation: Eris: 因为我想让你彻底心碎啊。

original: Eris: I'm just trying to keep you from getting hurt.
translation: Eris: 我只是试着让你不受多余的伤。

original: Eris: It may seem cruel.[p/] But you have to be realistic about these things.
translation: Eris: 看起来可能很残酷。[p/]但对于这些事情你得现实点。

original: Eris: ...You trusted Tymora and she betrayed you.
translation: Eris: ……你信任过泰摩拉，而她背叛了你。

original: Eris: Try not to make the same mistake twice.
translation: Eris: 不要再犯同样的错误了。

original: Celeste didn't hear anything she said.[p/] But she seems to notice how it's affecting you.
translation: 她说的东西塞莱斯特什么都没有听到，[p/]但她似乎注意到了你的变化。

original: Celeste: Eris![p/][s/] That's enough!
translation: Celeste: 厄莉斯！[p/][s/]够了！

original: Eris: Ah.[p/] My apologies.
translation: Eris: 啊。[p/]对不起哦。

original: Eris: I've been told that I've been too blunt sometimes.
translation: Eris: 我经常被人说太直率了。

original: Eris: But I do hope you'll think about what I said.
translation: Eris: 但我希望你会好好想想我说的话。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: ...Anyways,[p/] the trial should be starting soon.
translation: Eris: ……总之，[p/]庭审应该很快要开始了。

original: Eris: We should make our way back to the courthouse.
translation: Eris: 我们该动身返回法庭了。

original: Eris: I'm genuinely curious to see how this trial ends.
translation: Eris: 我真的很好奇这次审理会怎么结束。

original: Celeste: H-[p/][s/]Hey, Tyrion?[p/] Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: 喂、[p/][s/]喂，提利昂？[p/]你还好吗？

original: Celeste: What did she say to you?
translation: Celeste: 她刚对你说了什么？

original: She reaches for your hand but you instinctively yank it away from hers.
translation: 她想握住你的手，但被你下意识甩开了。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？

original: Tyrion: ...S-[p/][s/]Sorry.[p/] I didn't mean to-
translation: Tyrion: ……抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。[p/]我不是这个意思——

original: Tyrion: I'm okay, really.
translation: Tyrion: 我没事，真的。

original: Celeste: Um...[p/] Okay... [mind="Is he mad at me?"/]
translation: Celeste: 唔……[p/]那好吧……[mind="他在对我生气吗？"/]

original: ...You can think about everything else later.
translation: ……你可以晚些再思考这些事情。

original: But for now,[p/] you know what you need to do.
translation: 但是现在，[p/]你知道自己该干什么。

original: You need to convict Beatrice Frega.
translation: 你要让比亚特丽丝·弗雷加认罪。

original: Tyrion: The display case is completely shattered...
translation: Tyrion: 展柜已经彻底变成碎片了……

original: Tyrion: The thief was able to do this despite there being several abjuration spells protecting it.
translation: Tyrion: 窃贼对多重防护术保护的展柜依然能造成如此大的伤害。

original: Tyrion: The display case holding the Earrings of Vitality is completely untouched.
translation: Tyrion: 存有活力耳环的展柜安然无恙。

original: Tyrion: Whoever stole the artifacts ignored it.
translation: Tyrion: 窃贼无视了这个。

original: Tyrion: The display case that held the Armbands of Intellect is empty.
translation: Tyrion: 存有智慧臂章的展柜是空的。

original: Tyrion: According to Harold,[p/] the Armbands were stolen discreetly...
translation: Tyrion: 根据哈罗德所言，[p/]臂章是被神不知鬼不觉偷走的……

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some sort of scientist.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来是某个科学家的画像。

original: Harold: That man is Dr. Luke Kuepfer.[p/] He was an alchemist and inventor from one of the branch families.
translation: Harold: 那是 Luke Kuepfer 博士。[p/]他是出身于弗雷加一族分家的炼金术师和发明家。

original: Harold: He is well-known for his studies into imbuing intelligence into automatons.
translation: Harold: 他因对人工智能机器人的研究而著名。

original: Tyrion: Intelligent automatons...[p/] Would that make them similar to Arcane Constructs?
translation: Tyrion: 智能机器人……[p/]会和奥术构造体很相似吗？

original: Harold: Yes, actually.[p/] I wouldn't be surprised if Lord von Sanctus used Dr. Kuepfer's research to create those Constructs.
translation: Harold: 没错，正是如此。[p/]冯·桑克图斯勋爵制造那些构造体时，使用了 Kuepfer 博士的研究成果也不足为奇。

original: So in essence,[p/] von Sanctus is taking credit for someone else's work.
translation: 所以从本质上来讲，[p/]冯·桑克图斯是在抢别人功劳。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly[p/], his name is Dr. Luke Kuepfer.[p/] He was an alchemist and inventor from one of the branch families.
translation: Tyrion: 据说[p/]，他名叫 Luke Kuepfer。[p/]他是出身于分家的炼金术师和发明家。

original: Tyrion: He was well-known for his studies into imbuing intelligence into automatons.
translation: Tyrion: 他因对人工智能机器人的研究而著名。

original: Celeste: Intelligent automatons...[p/] Like Arcane Constructs?
translation: Celeste: 智能机器人……[p/]像奥术构造体那样的？

original: Tyrion: Supposedly Lord von Sanctus used Dr. Kuepfer's research to create those Constructs.
translation: Tyrion: 据说冯·桑克图斯勋爵利用了 Kuepfer 博士的科研成果，才制作出那些构造体。

original: So in essence,[p/] von Sanctus is taking credit for someone else's work.
translation: 所以从本质上来讲，[p/]冯·桑克图斯是在抢别人功劳。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a researcher.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅研究员的画像。

original: Harold: That is Professor Matt Ferland.[p/] He was a professor of some renown.
translation: Harold: 那是 Matt Ferland 教授。[p/]他是个小有名声的教授。

original: Harold: He was a researcher of Combinatorial Magic Theory.
translation: Harold: 他钻研组合魔法理论。

original: Tyrion: What's that?
translation: Tyrion: 那是什么？

original: Harold: It's the study of how different types of magic interact with each other.
translation: Harold: 是种研究不同种类的魔法互相交融的理论。

original: Harold: He famously ran an experiment on what would happen if two [b]Anti-magic Fields[/b] overlapped each other.
translation: Harold: 他以进行双[b]抗魔力场[/b]重合实验而闻名。

original: Tyrion: ...That's actually pretty interesting.[p/] What were the results of the experiment?
translation: Tyrion: ……那确实挺有意思的。[p/]实验结果如何？

original: Harold: Well, they had mages enter the space where the two fields overlapped.
translation: Harold: 嗯，他们令一名法师进入了两个力场重合的空间。

original: Harold: It turns out that those mages [i]were[/i] able to use their magic in that space.
translation: Harold: 结果是那些法师<u>可以</u>在重合范围内使用魔法。

original: Tyrion: Wait,[p/] how would that be possible?[p/] They would have had two [b]Anti-magic Fields[/b] affecting them.
translation: Tyrion: 等下，[p/]这怎么可能？[p/]他们应该被两个[b]抗魔力场[/b]所影响啊。

original: Harold: When the two fields overlapped they canceled each other out.[p/] I've heard that it's akin to multiplying two negative numbers together.
translation: Harold: 我听说两个力场重叠时会获得负负得正的效果。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly, his name is Professor Matt Ferland.[p/] He was a professor of Combinatorial Magic Theory.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，他名为 Matt Ferland。[p/]是组合魔法理论方面的教授。

original: Celeste: What is that?
translation: Celeste: 那是什么东西？

original: Tyrion: I have no idea.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不懂。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]evocation[/b] magic on the shattered glass.
translation: Celeste: 碎玻璃上有[b]塑能术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: [b]Evocation[/b] is the school of magic that creates and unleashes raw energy.
translation: Tyrion: [b]塑能术[/b]是种创造和释放能量的魔法。

original: Tyrion: It's the most primal of the seven schools of magic.
translation: Tyrion: 是七种魔法中最原始的一类。

original: Tyrion: Someone must have used a powerful spell to blast the display case apart.
translation: Tyrion: 一定是什么人用强大的法术把展柜炸成了碎片。

original: Celeste: I can't believe a [i]museum[/i] owns such a powerful magic item.
translation: Celeste: 真不敢信<u>博物馆</u>藏有如此强大的魔法物品。

original: Celeste: I would have expected the noble houses to take them for themselves.
translation: Celeste: 我本以为贵族会把这些据为己有的。

original: Harold: Well,[p/] the nobility of today don't have much use for items such as these.
translation: Harold: 嗯，[p/]现在的贵族不太用得到到这些东西了。

original: Harold: The power of a lord is based on politics rather than magical strength.
translation: Harold: 一位勋爵的实力由政治能力而非法力决定。

original: Harold: And a noble wouldn't want to wield the sword of a demon,[p/] even [i]if[/i] the legends are just stories.
