original: Celeste: ...You nobles are absolutely awful. [mind="I should probably consider myself lucky..."/]
translation: Celeste: ……你们这些贵族简直是糟透了。[mind="某种程度上来说，我运气不错……"/]

original: Lloyd: Think what you will.[p/] I wouldn't expect a commoner to understand.
translation: Lloyd: 随你怎么想。[p/]我本就不觉得平民能理解。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Lloyd: That's the problem with your generation.[p/] You have no sense of duty or obligation.
translation: Lloyd: 这就是你们这代人的问题。[p/]没有丝毫的责任与义务感。

original: Lloyd: Laefe has already expressed resistance to this marriage.[p/] Even though she was well aware of the details.
translation: Lloyd: 拉菲在了解这一切之后，还是对这场婚约表现的很抵触。

original: Lloyd: Now I worry she'll hide behind her sister to end the engagement altogether.
translation: Lloyd: 现在我担心她会躲在她姐姐身后彻底拒绝婚约。

original: Laefe never mentioned [i]any[/i] of this.[p/] And as much as you hate to think it,[p/] William's death [i]would[/i] get her out of this arranged marriage.
translation: 拉菲<u>从没</u>提过这件事。[p/]尽管你不愿这么想，但威廉的死<u>必定能</u>让她逃离这场包办婚姻。

original: You should talk to her about this.
translation: 你应该找她聊聊这件事。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] I really hoped that I'd seen the last of you in Aurinax.
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]我真的希望欧奥耐克斯之后不要再见到你们。

original: Tyrion: And [i]I[/i] really hope you're not involved in what happened to William Frega.
translation: Tyrion: <u>我</u>也由衷希望你与威廉·弗雷加案无关。

original: Lloyd: Please.[p/] As if I'd even humor such preposterous accusations.
translation: Lloyd: 拜托，[p/]别把这么可笑的事说得煞有介事。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] As usual,[p/] the Steelwind brat is sticking her nose where it doesn't belong.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]斯蒂尔文德家的小鬼还是一如既往喜欢到处打听。

original: Tyrion: I take it you're not a fan of House Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 我可以理解成你不太喜欢斯蒂尔文德家族吗？

original: Lloyd: Fan?[p/] Hardly.[p/] Those brutes have no place in our civilized kingdom.
translation: Lloyd: 喜欢？[p/]绝对不可能。这些野蛮人就不应存在于我们文明的国度中。

original: Tyrion: And yet,[p/] I can't help but feel like you'd never say that to her face.
translation: Tyrion: 但是呢，[p/]我有种你绝对不敢当她面说这话的感觉。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] You [i]and[/i] that woman...
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]你<u>和</u>那个女人……

original: Lloyd: You two do nothing but weave chaos into the nobility.
translation: Lloyd: 你们两个只会给贵族添麻烦。

original: Tyrion: With how you aristocrats abuse your power,[p/] I'll take that as a compliment.
translation: Tyrion: 鉴于你们这些贵族滥用权力猖獗，[p/]我就当你是在夸我了。

original: Lloyd: William Frega...[p/] Even in death,[p/] he still remains a thorn in my side.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉·弗雷加……[p/]即使他已经死了，[p/]也还在给我添麻烦。

original: Lloyd: At least now,[p/] he won't meddle in my affairs.
translation: Lloyd: 但至少现在，[p/]他再也不会妨碍我了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about the suspect in this case?
translation: Tyrion: 关于本案的被告你有什么要说的吗？

original: Lloyd: What?[p/] She's [i]your[/i] client.[p/] Surely, you would know her better than I do.
translation: Lloyd: 啥？[p/]她是<u>你的</u>委托人。[p/]你肯定比我要了解的多。

original: Tyrion: ...Humour me.
translation: Tyrion: ……麻烦配合一下。

original: Lloyd: Well, I'm sure you're aware that she fled the Frega estate five years ago.
translation: Lloyd: 好吧，你肯定已经知道她在五年前离开了弗雷加庄园。

original: Lloyd: In doing so,[p/] she dealt a blow to House Frega's reputation [i]and[/i] directly insulted the Crown Prince by breaking her engagement to him.
translation: Lloyd: 她的不辞而别影响重大，[p/]不仅让弗雷加家的声誉急转之下，<u>而且</u>还解除了与王储殿下的婚约，这与侮辱王室无异。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]Beatrice[/i] was engaged to Aster?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>比亚特丽丝</u>曾与阿斯特有过婚约？！

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] It was quite the scandal at the time.
translation: Lloyd: 没错。[p/]这事在当时可是桩相当大的丑闻。

original: Lloyd: And Lucio wasted no time in forcing his daughter into taking Beatrice's place.
translation: Lloyd: 之后卢西奥毫不犹豫地让自己的女儿取而代之。

original: Celeste: Oh...[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why those three were so awkward last night?
translation: Celeste: 哦……[p/]想必<u>这</u>就是他们三个当晚如此尴尬的原因吧？

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] this situation is just an absolute mess. [mind="And that woman's return will complicate things."/]
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]现在的状况简直就是一团糟。 [mind="而且那女人的归来只会把这一切搅得更复杂。"/]

original: Beatrice's return "complicates things"?[p/] What did he mean by that?
translation: 比亚特丽丝的归来“会把一切搅得更复杂”？[p/]那是什么意思？

original: Lloyd: Laefe...[p/] I'm sure she'll use William's death as yet [i]another[/i] excuse to further avoid her obligations.
translation: Lloyd: 拉菲……[p/]她肯定会用威廉的死作为<u>另一个</u>逃避义务的借口。

original: Celeste: She just lost her father![p/][s/] What is [i]wrong[/i] with you?!
translation: Celeste: 她刚刚失去了自己的父亲！[p/][s/]你这人有什么<u>毛病</u>？！

original: Lloyd: William Frega may be dead,[p/] but his daughters must carry out their roles.[p/] Lest their House's reputation suffers.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉·弗雷加虽然死了，[p/]但他的女儿们必须履行自身的职责。[p/]不然有损家族荣誉。

original: Tyrion: Is that all you care about?[p/] The reputation of the noble houses?[p/] What about justice for William Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 你只在乎这种事吗？[p/]贵族的声望？[p/]那谁给威廉·弗雷加讨回公道？

original: Lloyd: Justice?[p/] Justice is an illusion for you commoners to cling onto.[p/] But for us,[p/] "justice" is simply a favourable outcome.
translation: Lloyd: 正义？[p/]正义只是你们这些平民紧抓不放的幻象。[p/]对于我们而言，[p/]“正义”只是对某方有利的结果罢了。

original: Lloyd: The Frega family has always been influential.[p/] But with William's death,[p/] their power has diminished.
translation: Lloyd: 弗雷加家族一直声势显赫。[p/]但威廉的死削弱了他们的力量。

original: Lloyd: And with Laefe's reluctance to fulfill her duties,[p/] the Frega name will continue to suffer.
translation: Lloyd: 如果拉菲迟迟不愿履行自己的职责，[p/]弗雷加之名只会愈加受损。

original: Celeste: You're absolutely despicable!
translation: Celeste: 你真是卑鄙！

original: Lloyd: Ah...[p/] Aster do Wyverngarde, the Crown Prince himself.
translation: Lloyd: 啊……[p/]阿斯特·维文加德，王储殿下本人。

original: Lloyd: I can't say I care much for his childish ideals of justice.
translation: Lloyd: 我不太喜欢他有关正义的幼稚理想。

original: Tyrion: Those "childish ideals" are true justice.
translation: Tyrion: 那些“幼稚理想”才是真正的正义。

original: Tyrion: It's not something the likes of [i]you[/i] can recognize.
translation: Tyrion: 不是<u>你</u>这种人能理解的。

original: Lloyd: Harold Haroldson...?
translation: Lloyd: 哈罗德·哈罗德森……？

original: Lloyd: I couldn't care less about that quack's personal affairs.[p/] He can find financial aid elsewhere.
translation: Lloyd: 我才不在乎那江湖骗子的破事。[p/]他可以去其他地方找经济援助。

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] it's just one mess after another with you.
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]遇上你之后就是一个接着一个的麻烦。

original: Tyrion: "Mess"?[p/] I would think that [i]you'd[/i] have much to gain from William Frega's death.
translation: Tyrion: “麻烦”？[p/]威廉·弗雷加的死不是会让<u>你</u>受益良多吗？

original: Lloyd: On a surface level,[p/] you might be right.[p/] But it's far more complicated than that.
translation: Lloyd: 从表面上来说，[p/]你可能是对的。[p/]但实际要比这复杂的多。

original: Lloyd: House Frega controls the banking houses.[p/] They are the main pillar of support for Wyverngarde's economy.
translation: Lloyd: 弗雷加家族控制银行机构。[p/]他们是维文加德经济的主要支柱。

original: Lloyd: William's death could have unimaginable economic consequences,[p/] [i]regardless[/i] of who inherits his house.
translation: Lloyd: <u>无论</u>谁继承他的遗产，[p/]威廉的死都会造成不可估量的经济影响。

original: Lloyd: I wouldn't be stupid enough to be involved in something like this.
translation: Lloyd: 我不会蠢到去做这种事。

original: Tyrion: ...That remains to be seen.
translation: Tyrion: ……这还有待证明。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Think what you will.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]随你怎么想。

original: Lloyd: There are others who would benefit from William Frega's death.
translation: Lloyd: 还有其他人会因威廉·弗雷加的死而获利。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Beatrice's rebellious nature is only a result of William's terrible parenting.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]比亚特丽丝的叛逆本性都要怪威廉糟糕的教育。

original: Lloyd: You'd never catch my Jaiden acting like that.
translation: Lloyd: 我儿子杰登可绝对不会这样。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯，你对这个有什么看法？

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] I doubt I can say anything meaningful.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]我不知道我能说什么。

original: Lloyd: Ask someone else.
translation: Lloyd: 去问问别人吧。

original: You explore the manor further and find one of its many sitting rooms.
translation: 你继续探索庄园，来到了众多会客室中的一个。

original: ...And there,[p/] you happen to spot a [i]very[/i] familiar face.
translation: ……你在这里发现了一张<u>非常</u>熟悉的面孔。

original: He's sipping on a glass of wine.[p/] And his expression turns disdainful the moment you enter the room.
translation: 他正在小酌一杯。[p/]一看见你进门，他的表情便变得满是鄙夷。

original: Lloyd: Oh...[p/] wonderful.[p/] As if my day couldn't have gotten [i]any[/i] worse.
translation: Lloyd: 哦……[p/]太棒了。[p/]真是不能<u>再</u>糟了。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus.[p/] What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯。[p/]<u>你</u>在这儿做什么？

original: Lloyd: The head of a noble house has just been murdered.[p/] I can't very well return to Aurinax when my affairs are in such disarray.
translation: Lloyd: 贵族家族的首脑之一刚刚遭到谋杀。[p/]我没法在如此混乱的情况下回到欧奥耐克斯。

original: Lloyd: Anyways,[p/] forget what [i]I'm[/i] doing here.[p/] What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Lloyd: 总之，[p/]别管我在这儿做什么。[p/]<u>你</u>在这儿乱晃什么呢？

original: Tyrion: Oh,[p/] I just wanted to have a friendly chat with one of my [i]favorite[/i] noblemen.
translation: Tyrion: 哦，[p/]我只是想和我“<u>最喜欢</u>”的贵族之一友好交谈。

original: Tyrion: I hear that you've been keeping busy since we last met.[p/] It must be difficult losing your empire to House Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说上次见面之后你就一直忙个不停。[p/]把商业帝国拱手让给弗雷加家族一定很不好受吧。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] We [i]do[/i] need his help.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我们<u>确实</u>需要他的帮助。

original: Lloyd: Is that so?[p/] And what makes you think I'd [i]ever[/i] help the likes of you?
translation: Lloyd: 是吗？[p/]我为什么要帮助你们这样的人呢？

original: Tyrion: Because it would take suspicion off of you.[p/] And let's face it,[p/] with your reputation,[p/] you could use all the help you can get.
translation: Tyrion: 因为这能撇清你的嫌疑。[p/]面对现实吧，[p/]以你现在的名声，[p/]你需要尽可能多的帮助。

original: Lloyd: How dare you![p/][s/] I'll have you know that I am still a respected member of the nobility!
translation: Lloyd: 你怎么敢！[p/][s/]你给我听好，我仍是备受尊敬的贵族之一！

original: Tyrion: "Respected"?[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why everyone is talking about your hand in Justin Waye's death?
translation: Tyrion: “备受尊敬”？[p/]你是指人人都在讨论你害死贾斯汀·维耶的事吗？

original: Tyrion: Because the way I see it,[p/] being involved in [i]another[/i] scandal would destroy what little remains of your reputation.
translation: Tyrion: 因为在我看来，[p/]牵扯进<u>另一个</u>丑闻只会毁掉你仅剩不多的名誉。

original: Tyrion: But it makes no difference to me.[p/] And to be perfectly honest,[p/] I'd like nothing more than to drag you onto the stand and embarrass you a [i]second[/i] time.
translation: Tyrion: 但这对我来说没什么区别。[p/]而且说实话，[p/]我不介意<u>再</u>把你拖到证人席上羞辱一次。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: You can practically hear him grinding his teeth together.
translation: 你几乎能听到他咬牙切齿的声音。

original: Lloyd: ...Very well.
translation: Lloyd: ……非常好。

original: Lloyd: If it means I won't have to endure your presence any longer,[p/] I'll oblige and answer your questions.
translation: Lloyd: 如果这样做能让我不必继续忍受你的存在，[p/]那我就答应回答你的问题。

original: Anyways,[p/] von Sanctus gave you a decent list of suspects.
translation: 总之，[p/]冯·桑克图斯让你有了更充实的嫌疑犯名单。

original: You've probably learned everything you can from him for now.
translation: 你目前已经了解到一切他知道的事了。

original: It'd be best to MOVE and follow up on these leads.
translation: 最好<u>移动</u>到别处调查其他线索。

original: Tyrion: It's as if every room in this house needs a chandelier...
translation: Tyrion: 这个庄园里的每个房间好像都需要一个吊灯……

original: Tyrion: What a waste of the kingdom's gold...
translation: Tyrion: 真是浪费……

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some adventurers in a tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 酒馆里冒险者的画像。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] one of Frega's ancestors was part of a band of adventurers.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，[p/]其中一位冒险者是弗雷加家族的祖先。

original: But you can't help but feel that there [i]should[/i] be someone in the top left corner.
translation: 但你总觉得左上角<u>应该</u>有人。

original: Tyrion: It's a shelf filled with books.
translation: Tyrion: 摆满书的架子。

original: Celeste: [i]Fake[/i] books.[p/] They're completely blank.
translation: Celeste: <u>假书</u>。[p/]都是空白的。

original: Tyrion: It's a door that leads to the Coat Room.
translation: Tyrion: 通往衣帽间的门。

original: Tyrion: It's a chair made from mahogany.
translation: Tyrion: 一张由桃花心木制成的椅子。

original: Tyrion: Every part of this house just exudes wealth...
translation: Tyrion: 这房子的每一处都散发着财富的气息……

original: And that wealth was probably siphoned right out of the commonfolk...
translation: 从平民百姓身上榨取的财富……

original: Tyrion: There's a window with a view of the outside.
translation: Tyrion: 可以看到外面的窗户。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: ...If looks could kill.
translation: ……如果眼神能杀人的话。

original: Lucio: McCoy...[p/] One might misinterpret that look of yours as murderous intent.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊……[p/]你的眼神会让别人误以为你要杀人。

original: Celeste: Aw...[p/] Guess you [i]do[/i] have some battle instincts, after all.
translation: Celeste: 唔……[p/]看来你<u>确实</u>拥有一些战斗的直觉。

original: Celeste: I honestly wasn't sure.[p/] Since you so [i]obviously[/i] have a silver spoon stuck up your-.
translation: Celeste: 我一开始还不确定。[p/]毕竟你<u>明显</u>生下来就高贵得很——

original: Tyrion: C-[p/][s/]Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特……

original: Lucio: Such lack of respect and discipline...
translation: Lucio: 如此缺乏尊重和纪律……

original: Lucio: If you were one of my soldiers,[p/] I'd have you hanged.
translation: Lucio: 如果你是我麾下的士兵，[p/]我会对你处以绞刑。

original: Celeste: If I was one of your soldiers,[p/] I'd hang myself.
translation: Celeste: 如果让我当你的士兵，[p/]我就自己先上吊。

original: Tyrion: Ooooookay.[p/] Let's all try to stay civil here.
translation: Tyrion: 好——啦。[p/]我们都试着文明一点吧。

original: Tyrion: Lord Steelwind.[p/] You were here at the Lords' Ball when the murder occurred.[p/] Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵。[p/]凶杀案发生时你也在舞会里，[p/]我说得对吗？

original: Lucio: ...I was.
translation: Lucio: ……我确实在。

original: Tyrion: Do you mind if I ask you some questions about what you saw that night?
translation: Tyrion: 介意我就你当晚所见问几个问题吗？

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]If that's okay with you.
translation: Tyrion: 如、[p/][s/]如果你觉得没问题的话。

original: Lucio: I suppose I must oblige...[p/] Considering that my daughter has so unceremoniously thrust her responsibilities onto you.
translation: Lucio: 我认为我有这个义务……[p/]考虑到是我女儿粗暴地把责任推给了你。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry about what happened to your daughter.[p/] I'm sure that you're very worried.
translation: Tyrion: 我对你女儿的遭遇感到遗憾。[p/]你肯定也很担忧。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] It's her own fault for exerting herself, despite her injuries.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]虽然是受了伤，但工作过度也是她自己的问题。

original: Lucio: Even the bravest warrior knows when to stay off the battlefield.
translation: Lucio: 即使最勇猛的战士也该明白何时要远离战场。

original: Celeste: How can you say that?![p/][s/] Your daughter was trying to do the right thing!
translation: Celeste: 你怎么能这么说？！[p/][s/]你的女儿是在尝试做正确的事情！

original: Lucio: By prosecuting the heiress of House Frega?
translation: Lucio: 通过起诉弗雷加一族的继承人吗？

original: Lucio: She had very little evidence to substantiate a conviction.
translation: Lucio: 她几乎没有证据能坐实罪名。

original: Lucio: If she wanted to strike a blow on a rival house,[p/] she should have been certain that her enemy would fall.
translation: Lucio: 如果她想给敌对家族一记重击，[p/]就必须确保这一击足以击垮她的敌人。

original: Lucio: But now...[p/] If Beatrice Frega is found innocent,[p/] any hopes of an alliance between House Frega and House Steelwind will be completely annihilated.
translation: Lucio: 但现在……[p/]如果比亚特丽丝·弗雷加被证实无罪，[p/]弗雷加与斯蒂尔文德两个家族结盟的任何希望都会被彻底消灭。

original: It's clear that he and the prosecutor have vastly different priorities.
translation: 很显然他和检察官的优先级截然不同。

original: Tyrion: Where were you throughout the night, Lord Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 当天晚上你在哪里呢，斯蒂尔文德勋爵？

original: Lucio: I so loathe gatherings like that.[p/] They're a complete waste of time.
translation: Lucio: 我很厌恶这种聚会。[p/]它们完全是浪费时间。

original: Lucio: I was in this room.[p/] But then I received word that Lord Frega's lost heiress had made an unexpected appearance.
translation: Lucio: 我当时就在这个房间。[p/]但我得到消息，弗雷加勋爵那位失踪的继承人出人意料地现身了。

original: Lucio: She was supposedly speaking with the Crown Prince.[p/] So I made my way to the Ballroom.
translation: Lucio: 据说她正与王储殿下交谈。[p/]所以我前往舞厅。

original: Tyrion: Did you speak with them at any point?
translation: Tyrion: 你有和他们交谈吗？

original: Lucio: No.[p/] I kept my distance and stayed near the Kingsguard. [mind="I needed to make sure she wouldn't try anything."/]
translation: Lucio: 没有。[p/]我与他们保持了距离，待在国王卫队附近。[mind="我需要确保她不会搞什么小动作。"/]

original: Tyrion: ...Was this because you were wary of Beatrice Frega?
translation: Tyrion: ……是因为你在对比亚特丽丝·弗雷加保持警惕吗？

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: ...Yes.[p/] I was.
translation: Lucio: ……是的，[p/]我在。

original: Lucio: The Crown Prince has always been a bleeding heart.[p/] And the Fregas are trained to sharpen their tongue from birth.
translation: Lucio: 王储殿下一直都是个滥好人。[p/]而弗雷加的人被锻炼得巧舌如簧。

original: Lucio: I needed to make sure that she wouldn't try to interfere with his engagement.
translation: Lucio: 我需要保证她不会尝试干预殿下的婚约。

original: Tyrion: You were worried that she was going to try to take Aster back.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说你担心她要把阿斯特抢回去。

original: Lucio: I was...[p/] But it was clear that wasn't her intention.
translation: Lucio: 确实……[p/]但显然这并不是她的目的。

original: Tyrion: But you [i]did[/i] overhear their conversation?[p/] What were they talking about?
translation: Tyrion: 但你<u>还是</u>监听了他们的对话吧？[p/]他们说了什么？

original: Lucio: Their conversation was completely inane.[p/] It was all just small talk.
translation: Lucio: 他们的对话内容完全没有意义。[p/]只是闲聊罢了。

original: Lucio: Lady Frega spent most of her time playing with Prince Alaric.
translation: Lucio: 弗雷加小姐大部分时间都在和阿拉里克王子玩耍。

original: Right...[p/] Aster's younger brother was there too.
translation: 是的……[p/]阿斯特的弟弟当时也在场。

original: You know that Beatrice had [i]some[/i] role in the murder,[p/] even if she wasn't directly responsible.
translation: 即使她不负有直接责任，[p/]比亚特丽丝在凶杀案中也担任了<u>某个角色</u>。

original: Did she have some unknown goal by speaking with Aster and his brother?
translation: 她与阿斯特及其弟弟的交谈是不是有什么不为人知的目的？

original: Tyrion: You went to the Ballroom when you heard that Beatrice had returned.
translation: Tyrion: 你听说比亚特丽丝回归后去了舞厅。

original: Tyrion: Was this before or after the lockdown?
translation: Tyrion: 那是在封锁发生之前还是之后？

original: Lucio: It was before the lockdown.
translation: Lucio: 在封锁之前。

original: That sounds about right.[p/] This means that she was accounted for before the theft was reported.
translation: 听起来没问题。[p/]意味着她在盗窃案被报告之前就已经被目击了。

original: Tyrion: And did you see her leave at any point?
translation: Tyrion: 那你有看到她离开吗？

original: Lucio: No.[p/] She spoke with the two princes for quite a while.
translation: Lucio: 没有。[p/]她和两位王子说了好一会儿话。

original: Lucio: She didn't leave their side until she was arrested for Lord Frega's murder.
translation: Lucio: 直到因涉嫌谋杀弗雷加勋爵被逮捕前，她都没有离开他们身边。

original: What...?[p/] That means she was accounted for the [i]entire[/i] night.
translation: 什么……？[p/]也就是说她<u>整晚</u>的行动都有记录。

original: But her thoughts said she was an accomplice in William's death.
translation: 但她的内心想法说她是威廉之死的同谋。

original: Was she there to distract the Kingsguard?
translation: 她的职责就是在那里干扰国王卫队吗？

original: Tyrion: I didn't expect someone of your status to recognize me.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想到你这么高地位的人能认得出我。

original: Lucio: I know [i]of[/i] you.[p/] And the infamous Ruby Tymora.
translation: Lucio: 我<u>认识</u>你。[p/]也认识那个臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉。

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……

original: Lucio: I also know that my daughter has failed to defeat you once.
translation: Lucio: 我也知道我女儿没能击败过你。

original: Lucio: I await the day when she tears you down from your throne.
translation: Lucio: 我等着她把你从不败宝座上拽下来的那一天。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Okay...
translation: Tyrion: 行、[p/][s/]行吧……

original: ...Doesn't he disapprove of her becoming a prosecutor?
translation: ……他不是不支持自己女儿当检察官吗？

original: He almost sounds like an encouraging parent.
translation: 这听起来简直像一个鼓励孩子的家长嘛。

original: Lucio: Ms. McCoy:[p/] the Crimson Demon.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊女士，[p/]或者说绯红恶魔。

original: Celeste: How do people keep learning about that name?!
translation: Celeste: 大家都怎么知道这个称呼的？！

original: Lucio: Please.[p/] House Steelwind secures the borders of Wyverngarde.
translation: Lucio: 拜托。[p/]斯蒂尔文德家负责维文加德的边境安全。

original: Lucio: Don't think I'm unaware of your illegal travels to the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: Lucio: 别以为我没注意到你非法前往东方古国。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] You want to arrest me?[p/] Let's see how that goes.
translation: Celeste: 好吧。[p/]你要逮捕我？[p/]那走着瞧。

original: Tyrion: ...Can you stop antagonizing him?
translation: Tyrion: ……你能别惹他生气了吗？

original: Tyrion: I've heard you don't approve of Aria becoming a prosecutor.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说你并不支持阿莉亚担任检察官。

original: Lucio: Of course, I don't.
translation: Lucio: 我当然不支持。

original: Lucio: A member of House Steelwind shouldn't debase themselves by doing the work of a civil servant.
translation: Lucio: 斯蒂尔文德家的人不应该自降身份来做这种文官工作。

original: Tyrion: But she clearly has her own motivations for doing so.
translation: Tyrion: 但她显然有自己的动力。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] Is [i]that[/i] how you see it?
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]你是<u>这么</u>认为的吗？

original: Lucio: She's merely following the misguided path of the Crown Prince. [mind="I regret letting those two meet."/]
translation: Lucio: 她仅仅是跟随王储殿下误入歧途。[mind="我后悔让他们相遇。"/]

original: Lucio: Beatrice Frega is a remarkable mage.[p/] It's truly a shame that [i]this[/i] is how it turned out.
translation: Lucio: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加是一个优秀的法师。[p/]事情变成<u>这样</u>真是很遗憾。

original: Tyrion: I'm...[p/] surprised to hear you say that.[p/] I assumed most in the nobility hated her.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]还挺惊讶你会这么说的。[p/]我以为绝大多数贵族都恨她。

original: Lucio: If you're correct,[p/] then most of the nobility are imbeciles.
translation: Lucio: 如果像你说的这样，[p/]那绝大多数贵族都是白痴。

original: Lucio: At the age of thirteen,[p/] she surpassed her father's magical talents.
translation: Lucio: 十三岁的时候，[p/]她的魔法才能就已经超过了她父亲。

original: Lucio: If she had been allowed to develop,[p/] she could have revolutionized the study of [b]conjuration[/b] magic.
translation: Lucio: 如果能够继续深造，[p/]她会在整个[b]召唤术[/b]领域的研究中引发变革。

original: Lucio: She would have been a great asset to our kingdom.
translation: Lucio: 她本可以成为我们王国的重要财产。

original: Ever the pragmatic one, isn't he?
translation: 他还真是务实，不是吗？

original: Lucio: William Frega...[p/] A fool to the very end.
translation: Lucio: 威廉·弗雷加……[p/]到最后还是一个蠢蛋。

original: Tyrion: From what I've heard,[p/] you two weren't on the best of terms.
translation: Tyrion: 就我听说的，[p/]你们俩关系并不好。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] That moron believed that every problem in our kingdom could be solved with gold.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]那个白痴确信王国里的一切问题都可以用钱来解决。

original: Lucio: He failed to see the dangers posed to our kingdom.
translation: Lucio: 他看不到王国面临的危险。

original: Lucio: What this kingdom needs is a sharp weapon and an iron fist to wield it.
translation: Lucio: 王国需要的是重兵利刃与挥舞它们的铁拳。

original: Tyrion: What are your thoughts on Crown Prince Aster?
translation: Tyrion: 你对阿斯特王储殿下有什么看法？

original: Lucio: He has misguided ideals of justice.[p/] But I suppose he's still young.
translation: Lucio: 他对正义抱持着错误的理想。[p/]但我想是因为他还太年轻。

original: Lucio: But I do worry for our future under his rule. [mind="The king's health is worsening..."/]
translation: Lucio: 但我担忧他统治下我们的未来。[mind="国王的身体状况日渐糟糕……"/]

original: Wait...[p/][s/] What?!
You've never heard [i]anything[/i] about the king being ill.
translation: 你从没听说过<u>任何</u>关于国王身体抱恙的消息。

original: You consider asking Lord Steelwind about it...[p/]
translation: 这件事你想问问斯蒂尔文德勋爵……[p/]

original: ...But he might just violently demand to know [i]how[/i] you came across that tidbit.
translation: ……但他可能会强烈要求你解释<u>如何</u>知道这个消息的。

original: Tyrion: I've been told that House Steelwind controls Wyverngarde's military.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说斯蒂尔文德家控制维文加德的军队。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] We don't [i]control[/i] the military.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]我们<u>控制</u>的不只是军队。

original: Lucio: We control the very foundation that maintains order in our kingdom.
translation: Lucio: 我们控制着维系王国秩序的基础。

original: Lucio: Those fools in the palace have no idea what it takes to lead a nation.
translation: Lucio: 宫廷里的傻瓜们根本没有怎么领导国家的概念。

original: Lucio: These recent commonfolk uprisings are evidence of that fact.
translation: Lucio: 最近这些平民起义就是证据。

original: Lucio: Lord Haroldson...[p/] I can't believe it took this long for William to deal with his defiance.
translation: Lucio: 哈罗德森勋爵……[p/]难以相信威廉花了这么长时间来处理他的反抗。

original: Lucio: But if it were up to me,[p/] I'd have the old fool executed for treason.
translation: Lucio: 如果是我来处理，[p/]我早就以叛国罪处死那个老糊涂了。

original: ...He must only see nails with the gigantic hammer of his.
translation: ……他真是只会用武力解决问题啊。

original: Lucio: What a mess this is.
translation: Lucio: 真是一团乱麻。

original: Lucio: Aria's actions have completely sabotaged our political relations with House Frega.
translation: Lucio: 阿莉亚的行为完全破坏了我们和弗雷加一族的政治关系。

original: Lucio: Beatrice Frega would have been a powerful weapon for me to use.
translation: Lucio: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加本可以是为我所用的一个强力武器。

original: It almost sounds like he respects Beatrice.[p/] How powerful of a mage is she?
translation: 听起来好像他挺尊重比亚特丽丝的。[p/]她到底是个多强大的法师？

original: Lucio: Ms. McCoy.[p/] That sword of yours is of Eastern make, isn't it?
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊女士。[p/]你那把剑是在东方打造的，不是吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Lucio: I [i]do[/i] wonder how someone of [i]your[/i] status earned the favor of an Ixian regent.
translation: Lucio: 我<u>很好奇</u>，像<u>你</u>这样地位的人怎么能获得伊克斯摄政王之一的青睐。

original: Tyrion: Wait, what?
translation: Tyrion: 等等，什么东西？

original: Celeste: ...I'll tell you that story later.
translation: Celeste: ……我晚点讲给你听。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Lord Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个怎么看，斯蒂尔文德勋爵？

original: Lucio: ...Completely inane.[p/] What else do you expect me to say?
translation: Lucio: ……毫无意义。[p/]不然你还想让我说什么呢？

original: As you move around the manor,[p/] you peek into the Sitting Room to see if von Sanctus is still there.
translation: 在庄园四处走动时，[p/]你偷看了一下会客室，查看冯·桑克图斯还在不在里面。

original: You don't see [i]him[/i] there.[p/] But you spot another individual.
translation: 你没在这里看到<u>他</u>。[p/]但你看到了另一个人。

original: He's calmly reading some sort of book.[p/] But you can feel a menacing aura emanating from him.
translation: 他静静地读着一本书。[p/]但你感觉到他身上散发出一种危险的气息。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: This aura...[p/]
translation: Lucio: 这种气息……[p/]

original: Lucio: You must be daft if you think I wouldn't notice your presence.
translation: Lucio: 如果以为我没有注意到你们的存在，那你们一定很蠢。

original: W-[p/][s/]What?[p/] Did he notice you?[p/] You barely entered the room.
translation: 什、[p/][s/]什么？[p/]他注意到你了？[p/]你都没有进入房间。

original: Before you have a chance to respond,[p/] the man pulls out his great-axe and rushes towards you.
translation: 在你有机会应答之前，[p/]那个男人拔出他的巨斧冲向你。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait, I-!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等等，我——！

original: You bring up your arms to block his blow.[p/] But in hindsight,[p/] that probably won't do much against an axe that large.
translation: 你举起双臂想挡住他这一击，[p/]但事后来看，[p/]对那么大一把斧子大概没什么效果。

original: Celeste: [b]Protegus[/b].
translation: Celeste: [b]Protegus[/b].

original: You open your eyes.[p/] Celeste is now standing between you and the axe-wielding maniac.
translation: 你睁开双眼。[p/]现在塞莱斯特站在你和那个挥舞斧头的疯子中间。

original: You're not sure what happened,[p/] but it looks like she knocked him several feet backward.
translation: 你不确定发生了什么，[p/]但看起来她把对面击退了好几步。

original: Lucio: ...?!
translation: Lucio: ……？！

original: Lucio: Oh, it's you two.
translation: Lucio: 噢，是你们俩。

original: Celeste: What the hell was that?![p/][s/] You could have killed him!
translation: Celeste: 这是在搞什么鬼？！[p/][s/]你差点杀了他！

original: Lucio: He shouldn't have snuck up on me like that.[p/] I almost cleaved him in two.
translation: Lucio: 他不应该那样偷偷靠近我。[p/]我差点把他劈成两半。

original: Celeste: [i]Tyrion[/i] didn't do anything wrong![p/][s/] Who the hell do you think you are?!
translation: Celeste: <u>提利昂</u>又没做错什么！[p/][s/]你以为你是谁啊？！

original: Lucio: [i]I[/i] am Lord Lucio Steelwind:[p/] Grand General of the Wyverngarde military forces.
translation: Lucio: <u>我</u>是卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德勋爵，[p/]维文加德王国军的大将军。

original: So [i]this[/i] is Prosecutor Steelwind's father.
translation: 所以<u>这位</u>就是斯蒂尔文德检察官的父亲。

original: They [i]do[/i] share the same intimidating stare.
translation: 他们<u>确实</u>都有令人生畏的眼神。

original: ...Although,[p/] he's not the most menacing person in the room right now.
translation: ……尽管，[p/]他现在不是房间里最危险的那个人。

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] it's fine.[p/] I'm not hurt.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]没关系。[p/]我没受伤。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: She looks more than irate right now.[p/] But she begrudgingly sheathes her sword.
translation: 她看起来非常生气。[p/]但她还是不情愿地收起了剑。

original: Anyways,[p/] Lord Steelwind was one of the people with a motive to murder William Frega.
translation: 总之，[p/]斯蒂尔文德勋爵也有动机谋杀威廉·弗雷加。

original: And as a fellow head of a Pillar House,[p/] he might have some information about William and his affairs.
translation: 作为支柱家族之一的族长，[p/]他可能知道关于威廉及其事务的信息。

original: Tyrion: Thank you for answering our questions, Lord Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 感谢你回答我们的问题，斯蒂尔文德勋爵。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] I'm merely repaying my daughter's debt to you.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]我只是在还女儿欠你的人情。

original: He was surprisingly pretty cooperative.[p/] But that doesn't lift any suspicion off of him just yet.
translation: 他令人惊讶地配合调查。[p/]但仅仅如此并不能减轻他身上的嫌疑。

original: You'll need to find more evidence if you want to know for sure.
translation: 如果要确定的话，你还需要找出更多证据。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we should probably MOVE somewhere else.[p/] Let's go, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到其他地方了。[p/]塞莱斯特，我们走吧。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: McCoy.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……怎么了？

original: Lucio: ...Your spell casting is undisciplined.[p/] But your battle stance and reflexes are...[p/] commendable.
translation: Lucio: ……你施法的方式毫无章法。[p/]但你的战斗姿态和反应能力……[p/]值得赞赏。

original: Lucio: You have my respect as a warrior.
translation: Lucio: 我作为一名战士尊重你。

original: Celeste: ...As if that means anything coming from you.
translation: Celeste: ……好像你这么说有什么意义一样。

original: Lucio: ...Hmph.[p/] What an undisciplined and defiant brat.
translation: Lucio: ……哼。[p/]真是个没规矩又叛逆的小家伙。

original: For the first time since the Lords' Ball,[p/] you're finally able to get some sleep.
translation: 自勋爵的舞会以来，[p/]你第一次有时间睡个觉。

original: You woke this morning refreshed...[p/] But also a little anxious about the results of the will reading.
translation: 你早上神清气爽地醒来……[p/]但同时对遗嘱的内容感到一点不安。

original: You arrive back at Frega Manor and see that Beatrice,[p/] Laefe,[p/] Miriam,[p/] [i]and[/i] von Sanctus have all gathered.
translation: 你返回弗雷加庄园，看到比亚特丽丝、[p/]拉菲、[p/]米莉亚姆，[p/]<u>以及</u>冯·桑克图斯都聚在一起。

original: :...Along with Ms. Tymora:[p/] who is accompanying Beatrice as her attorney.
translation: ……泰摩拉女士也在场，[p/]作为比亚特丽丝的辩护人陪着她。

original: You're not really sure what to say to her after everything you've done...
translation: 你不太确定在你做了这些事情后该和她说些什么……

original: The air still feels too awkward to approach her and talk about it.
translation: 气氛依旧尴尬，你没法走过去和她交谈。

original: Executor: Thank you all for coming here today.
translation: Executor: 感谢各位今天来到这里。

original: Executor: As William Frega's close associate,[p/] I must express my deepest condolences for your loss.
translation: Executor: 作为威廉·弗雷加的密切合作人，[p/]我向痛失至亲好友的各位致以最深切的哀悼。

original: Executor: I think I speak for all of Wyverngarde when I say-
translation: Executor: 我代表维文加德全国表示——

original: Miriam: ...Enough.[p/] Just get on with it.
translation: Miriam: ……够了。[p/]进入正题吧。

original: Executor: *Ahem*[p/] Very well, then.
translation: Executor: *清嗓子* [p/]很好，那么。

original: Executor: To get straight to the point,[p/] Lord Frega's will was magically sealed when it was given to me.
translation: Executor: 直截了当地说，[p/]弗雷加勋爵的遗嘱交给我的时候是用魔法封装的。

original: Executor: He asked me:[p/] his executor,[p/] not to submit it to the courts for probate until [i]after[/i] his death.
translation: Executor: 他要求我，[p/]作为他的遗嘱执行人，[p/]直到他<u>死亡之前</u>都不能呈交法庭公证。

original: Executor: Although I imagine none of us expected such a time to come so suddenly.
translation: Executor: 虽然我想没有人预料到这一时刻如此突然地来临。

original: Executor: Anyways,[p/] Lord Frega's assets included sole ownership of several banking houses throughout Wyverngarde,[p/] ten million gold in various investments...
translation: Executor: 总而言之，[p/]弗雷加勋爵名下的财产包含全维文加德几处银行的完全产权，[p/]用于各方面投资的一千万金币……

original: Celeste: Ten million...?
translation: Celeste: 一千万……？

original: Ten-million gold...[p/] You can't even begin to imagine what [i]anyone[/i] could do with even a fraction of that wealth.
translation: 一千万金币……[p/]你都没法想象<u>任何人</u>仅仅用这笔钱的一小部分能做多少事情。

original: Executor: And lastly,[p/] sole control and ownership of the Frega Noble House.
translation: Executor: 最后，[p/]弗雷加一族的唯一控制与所有权。

original: The executor takes out a large envelope and uses a runestone to dispel the magical seal on it.
translation: 执行人拿出一个大信封，并用一块符石解除了上面的魔法密封。

original: Executor: "I,[p/] William Frega,[p/] being of sound mind and body,[p/] do hereby declare this to be my Last Will and Testament."
translation: Executor: “我，[p/]威廉·弗雷加，[p/]身体与心智健全，[p/]在此声明本人最后的遗嘱。”

original: Executor: "I hereby give,[p/] devise,[p/] and bequeath all of my assets and property,[p/] both real and personal,[p/] to Jaiden von Sanctus..."
translation: Executor: “本人于此，[p/]将我名下所有的资产和财物，[p/]包括不动产与个人财产，[p/]遗赠给杰登·冯·桑克图斯……”

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Executor: "...provided that he enters into a legal and binding engagement with my daughter,[p/] Laefe Frega:[p/] within six months of the date of my death."
translation: Executor: “……前提是此人已与本人的女儿，[p/]拉菲·弗雷加，[p/]在本人死亡当日起六个月内缔结了具有法律约束力的婚约。”

original: Lloyd: ...What?![p/][s/] That's-!
translation: Lloyd: ……什么？！[p/][s/]这——！

original: Liafal: ...!
translation: Liafal: ……！

original: William must have added that addendum to prevent von Sanctus from trying to steal his empire.
translation: 威廉肯定是为了防止冯·桑克图斯窃取他身后的商业帝国才添加了这个条件。

original: But a "legal and binding engagement" is predicated on Laefe accepting it.
translation: 但“具有法律约束力的婚约”一条必须要拉菲本人同意。

original: She clearly doesn't want to go through with it.[p/] So if she simply waited six months,[p/] von Sanctus [i]wouldn't[/i] have any claim to the estate.
translation: 她显然不想这么做。[p/]所以只要她等上六个月，[p/]冯·桑克图斯就<u>无法</u>拥有她们家的任何资产。

original: Executor: "In the event that Jaiden von Sanctus does [i]not[/i] enter into such an engagement within the specified time frame,[p/] my assets and property shall be distributed as such."
translation: Executor: “杰登·冯·桑克图斯没有在特定时间内完成上述婚约签订的情况下，[p/]我的资产与财物将进行如下分割：”

original: Executor: "All of House Frega will be divided equally among my children,[p/] as per the laws of our kingdom."
translation: Executor: “根据王国法律，[p/]弗雷加一族的所有权将由我的后代均分继承。”

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: You were right.[p/] William Frega never disinherited Beatrice.[p/] This would make Miriam's testimony false.
translation: 你是对的。[p/]威廉·弗雷加从未撤销比亚特丽丝的继承权。[p/]这证明米莉亚姆的证词是虚假的。

original: And since Beatrice [i]would[/i] receive a portion of William's inheritance,[p/] she had a motive to commit the murder.
translation: 既然比亚特丽丝<u>可以</u>收到威廉的一部分遗产，[p/]她就有实行谋杀的动机了。

original: You glance at Miriam.[p/] It's hard to read her expression.[p/] But something appears to be on her mind.
translation: 你看了米莉亚姆一眼。[p/]很难读懂她的表情，[p/]但她的想法揭露了什么。

original: Without a word,[p/] she walks out of the room,[p/] ignoring both Beatrice and Laefe.
translation: 她一言不发，[p/]独自走出了房间，[p/]也无视了比亚特丽丝和拉菲。

original: ...Laefe,[p/] on the other hand,[p/] seems to be in good spirits.
translation: ……另一方面，[p/]拉菲看起来心情不错。

original: Liafal: Isn't this great, Beatrice?!
translation: Liafal: 这不是很棒吗，比亚特丽丝？！

original: Liafal: You can lead House Frega now![p/][s/] Just as it should have been!
translation: Liafal: 你现在可以领导整个弗雷加一族了！[p/][s/]本该如此！

original: Executor: Actually, about that.[p/] In light of recent events,[p/] I believe I should clarify one thing.
translation: Executor: 事实上，关于那一点。[p/]鉴于最近发生的种种，[p/]我认为我该澄清一件事情。

original: Executor: As per the "Slayer Rule",[p/] if Beatrice Frega is found guilty in the current court case,[p/] her inheritance will be revoked and divided between you and your sister.
translation: Executor: 根据“杀人者规则”，[p/]如果比亚特丽丝·弗雷加在本次案件中被定罪，[p/]她的继承份额将重新均分给你和你的妹妹。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I see... [mind="I shouldn't feel so happy for myself..."/]
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我明白了……[mind="我不该为自己这么高兴的……"/]

original: Lloyd: That can't be all, can it?!
translation: Lloyd: 不应该就这么完了吧，对吧？

original: Lloyd: [i]Surely[/i] William added a note of Laefe's obligation to marry my son!
translation: Lloyd: 威廉<u>肯定</u>追加了拉菲应与我儿子结婚的这项义务吧！

original: Executor: I'm not sure what you're trying to imply.
translation: Executor: 我不知道您在暗示什么。

original: Executor: Laefe Frega is an adult with legal autonomy.[p/] She is free to make whatever decision she wishes about who she legally marries.
translation: Executor: 拉菲·弗雷加是一位拥有法律上自主权的成年人。[p/]她拥有自由决定合法成婚对象的权利。

original: Executor: Now if you'll excuse me...
translation: Executor: 恕我失陪……

original: Lloyd: Wait![p/][s/] We're not finished yet!
translation: Lloyd: 等等！[p/][s/]我们还没完呢！

original: Lloyd: Come back here!
translation: Lloyd: 给我回来！

original: Beatrice: I'd love to catch up with you, Laefe.[p/] But I was only allowed out of my cell to attend the reading.
translation: Beatrice: 我很想和你叙旧，拉菲。[p/]但我只被允许在宣读遗嘱的时候离开牢房。

original: You notice an Inquisition Knight outside the door.[p/] He seems to be watching Beatrice intently.
translation: 你注意到了门外的裁判所骑士。[p/]他似乎在专心地监视比亚特丽丝。

original: Beatrice: But don't worry.[p/] I'm sure once this misunderstanding is resolved,[p/] we can talk all we want about our family's future.
translation: Beatrice: 不过不用担心。[p/]我确定这场误会解除后，[p/]我们就能好好谈谈家族的未来了。

original: Liafal: Of course!
translation: Liafal: 当然了！

original: A group of knights lead Beatrice out of the manor.[p/] And Laefe follows after them.
translation: 一队骑士把比亚特丽丝带出了庄园。[p/]拉菲跟在他们身后。

original: ...Leaving you and Celeste alone with Ms. Tymora.
translation: ……只留下你、塞莱斯特和泰摩拉女士站在原地。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] About what I did-
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]呃……[p/]关于我的作为——

original: Ruby: *sigh*[p/] Look...[p/] I'm not angry, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: *叹气* [p/]听好……[p/]我没有生气，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Ruby: It was an...[p/] extremely unforeseen situation.[p/] And Steelwind clearly put you on the spot.
translation: Ruby: 这只是个……[p/]极其难以预料的情况。[p/]而且显然是斯蒂尔文德置你于这个处境。

original: Ruby: You felt pressured to do something and you made a rash decision.
translation: Ruby: 你只是受到压力，做了一个急切的决定。

original: Ruby: But I'm sure the court will understand if you withdraw.
translation: Ruby: 但我相信如果你退出的话，法庭那边会理解的。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] What?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]什么？

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] You're [i]not[/i] a prosecutor.[p/] You know that, right?
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特。[p/]你<u>不是</u>检察官。[p/]你知道的吧？

original: Ruby: Didn't you become an attorney to [i]defend[/i] persecuted mages?
translation: Ruby: 你不是为了向被起诉的法师们<u>提供辩护</u>才成为辩护律师的吗？

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But Beatrice [i]is[/i] guilty.[p/] I [i]saw[/i] it!
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但是比亚特丽丝<u>是</u>有罪的。[p/]我<u>看到</u>了！

original: Ruby: I'm not going to argue about this again.
translation: Ruby: 我不想再就这个问题与你争吵。

original: Ruby: You are [i]going[/i] to withdraw.[p/] This is not up for discussion.
translation: Ruby: 你<u>会</u>弃权。[p/]这没有讨论的余地。

original: You've always regarded and respected Ms. Tymora.[p/] And you suppose that's always made you deeply scared of disappointing her.
translation: 你一直重视且尊敬泰摩拉女士。[p/]你也一直害怕让她失望。

original: Perhaps she's right...[p/] She knows more about what's going on than you do.[p/] And she's still your mentor.
translation: 或许她说得对……[p/]她更了解发生的事情，[p/]也仍然是你的导师。

original: You [i]want[/i] to believe that.[p/] You really do.
translation: 你<u>想要</u>如此相信。[p/]你真的很想。

original: But deep down,[p/] you know that this is wrong.
translation: 但内心深处，[p/]你知道这是错误的。

original: Ms. Tymora may believe in Beatrice's innocence.[p/] But you can't just abandon this case and let her escape justice.
translation: 泰摩拉女士或许相信比亚特丽丝是清白的，[p/]但你不能这么放弃这个案件，让她逃离正义的制裁。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Your hands are trembling.[p/] Why are you so scared right now?
translation: 你的双手在颤抖。[p/]为什么现在会这么害怕？

original: You know what you have to say but the words won't leave your mouth.
translation: 你知道你得说些什么，但就是说不出来。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: From behind you,[p/] you feel Celeste hold your trembling hand.
translation: 你感到塞莱斯特从后方握住了你颤抖的手。

original: It's warm and comforting...[p/] It's that same sensation you felt back then.
translation: 十分温暖和舒适……[p/]和当时的感觉一样。

original: Somehow you can feel it through her hand.[p/] It's as if she's silently telling you that you know what you have to do.
translation: 不知怎么，你能从她的手感觉到，[p/]她在无声地告诉你，你知道该怎么做。

original: Your anxiety fades and you take a deep breath.
translation: 焦虑渐渐褪去，你深吸了一口气。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm not going to do that, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不会这么做，泰摩拉女士。

original: Ruby: ...What?
translation: Ruby: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You said it yourself.[p/] Our court system needs a defense attorney and a prosecutor of equal power to keep things fair.
translation: Tyrion: 你曾说过。[p/]我们的司法体系需要一名辩护律师和一名检察官来保持公平。

original: Ruby: T-[p/][s/]That's not what I-!
translation: Ruby: 我、[p/][s/]我不是这个意——！

original: Tyrion: I'm not going to withdraw.[p/] If you believe in Beatrice's innocence,[p/] and if you truly believe you're on the right side...
translation: Tyrion: 我不会撤回指控。[p/]如果你坚信比亚特丽丝是无罪的，[p/]也坚信自己的行为才是正确的话……

original: Tyrion: ...Then prove it by beating me.
translation: Tyrion: ……那就在法庭上击败我，证明给我看。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ...Fine.[p/] Do what you want.[p/] But you're only going to make things harder for everyone.
translation: Ruby: ……行。[p/]你想干嘛就干嘛吧。[p/]但你这样做只会让所有人都难办。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?!
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？！

original: As soon as Ms. Tymora steps out of the room,[p/] your body drops to the floor.
translation: 泰摩拉女士一走出门，[p/]你便瘫在了地上。

original: Whatever bravery you felt before got replaced with an extreme amount of fatigue.
translation: 刚刚有多勇敢，现在就有多疲惫。

original: Tyrion: Scaled Lord...[p/] That's the first time I've ever spoken to her like that.
translation: Tyrion: 鳞甲领主啊……[p/]那可是我第一次这样对她说话。

original: Celeste: But you still did it.[p/] You stood your ground.
translation: Celeste: 但你还是做到了。[p/]你站定立场没有动摇。

original: Celeste: ...Figuratively,[p/] I mean...[p/] Right now, you're kind of just sitting on the floor.
translation: Celeste: ……比喻义的站定，[p/]嗯……因为……[p/]你现在坐在地板上。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I need to take a moment.[p/] Can we go back to the ballroom?
translation: Tyrion: 还好……[p/]我只是需要一点时间。[p/]我们回去舞厅吧？

original: Orym: We didn't want to cause panic after the Sword was stolen.[p/] So we activated the manor's silent security system.[p/] It put an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] over the entire manor.
translation: Orym: 噬法之剑被偷后，我们不想引起恐慌。[p/]所以启动了庄园的无声安全系统。[p/]在整个庄园上方设置了一个[b]抗魔力场[/b]。

original: Orym: We did a search of the house.[p/] And we found the stolen sword in the defendant's bedroom...[p/] That's how we knew it was her.
translation: Orym: 我们搜查了房子。[p/]并在被告的卧室里找到了被盗的剑……[p/]我们才知道是她干的。

original: Orym: It didn't look like she was going to run,[p/] and Crown Prince Aster told us to stand down.[p/] So we just kept a close eye on her.
translation: Orym: 她看起来并不打算逃跑，[p/]而且阿斯特王储殿下让我们解除戒备。[p/]所以我们只是密切监视着她。

original: Orym: William Frega was in a bad mood that night.[p/] So he had already locked himself inside his study.
translation: Orym: 威廉·弗雷加那天晚上心情不好。[p/]所以就把自己锁在书房里了。

original: Orym: But an hour later,[p/] we entered the Study and found him lying dead in a pool of blood.
translation: Orym: 但一个小时后，[p/]我们进入书房，发现他躺在血泊中死了。

original: Orym: The lock was still engaged,[p/] and no one teleported in.[p/] The perp must've temporarily disabled the lock using something like the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Orym: 锁仍然处于锁定状态，[p/]也没有人传送进来。[p/]因此罪犯一定是用噬法之剑暂时解除了锁。

original: Orym: We have testimonies that say the defendant was seriously in debt.[p/] She must have murdered the victim to get a part of his inheritance.
translation: Orym: 我们有证词表明被告负债累累。[p/]她一定是为了得到受害者部分遗产而谋杀了他。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Miriam: One day,[p/] we all woke up and discovered that Beatrice had fled from our home.
translation: Miriam: 一天，[p/]大家醒来后发现比亚特丽丝离家出走了。

original: Miriam: She left a note for us.[p/] And in it,[p/] she renounced her name and denounced my father.
translation: Miriam: 她留下了一张字条。[p/]上面写着，[p/]她放弃了自己的姓氏并且告发了父亲。

original: Miriam: My father later called me and my sister into his study.[p/] He told us that he'd completely disowned Beatrice and removed any claim she had to the Frega estate.
translation: Miriam: 父亲晚些时候把我和姐姐叫到了他的书房。[p/]他告诉我们，他已经和比亚特丽丝完全断绝了关系，并且取消了她对弗雷加名下财产的任何继承权。

original: Miriam: It was probably a threat to us in case [i]we[/i] ever chose to go down the same path she did.[p/] He wanted to make an example out of her.
translation: Miriam: 那大概是对<u>我们</u>的威胁，以防我们再走上和她一样的道路。[p/]他这是杀鸡儆猴。

original: Miriam: This all happened five years ago.
translation: Miriam: 这一切都是五年前的事情了。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Liafal: You see,[p/] Miriam was quite young when my father called us into his study five years ago.[p/] She didn't understand what he was [i]really[/i] doing.
translation: Liafal: 是这样，[p/]五年前父亲喊我们去书房时，米莉亚姆还很小。[p/]她并不明白父亲当时<u>实际</u>在做什么。

original: Liafal: My father would often lie to us.[p/] It was one of the many ways that he kept us in line.
translation: Liafal: 父亲经常会对我们说谎。[p/]这是他让我们遵规守纪的方法之一。

original: Liafal: The encounter that Miriam described was just another one of his lies.
translation: Liafal: 米莉亚姆描述的事件也只是他撒的谎之一。

original: Liafal: Despite their disagreements,[p/] my father would never disinherit Beatrice without a good reason.[p/] He always held onto the possibility that she would become desperate enough to return home.
translation: Liafal: 虽然会意见相左，[p/]但我的父亲不会毫无理由就剥夺比亚特丽丝的继承权。[p/]他一直抱有姐姐最终会因别无手段而回家的希望。

original: Liafal: The truth is that none of us knew what my father was planning for House Frega's future.
translation: Liafal: 真相是，我们都不知道父亲对弗雷加家的未来有什么考量。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Harold: I was keeping an eye on my gallery's exhibits when I realized that my familiar hadn't returned.
translation: Harold: 意识到使魔还没回来的时候，我正在看守画廊里的展品。

original: Harold: I called him telepathically.[p/] But he didn't respond.
translation: Harold: 我通过心灵感应叫他。[p/]但他没有回应。

original: Harold: I became worried,[p/] so I went around the manor to search for him.
translation: Harold: 我开始担心了，[p/]就在庄园里四处找他。

original: Harold: About an hour later,[p/] I returned to the gallery and discovered that the exhibit that held the Sword of Spell Eating was completely destroyed.
translation: Harold: 大概一小时之后，[p/]我回到画廊，发现噬法之剑的展示柜被摧毁了。

original: Harold: The artifact was missing.[p/] So I reported the crime to the knights at the Ball and they activated a discreet lockdown.
translation: Harold: 遗物不翼而飞。[p/]我就报告给了负责守卫舞会的骑士，他们激活了封锁系统。

original: Harold: Luckily,[p/] we found the Sword [i]and[/i] my familiar later that night.
translation: Harold: 幸运的是，[p/]我们当天晚些时候就找到了宝剑<u>和</u>我的使魔。

original: Harold: As you probably know,[p/] the Kingsguard found the Sword of Spell Eating in the defendant's room.
translation: Harold: 如你所知，[p/]国王卫队在被告的房间里发现了噬法之剑。

original: Harold: Eugene finally responded to my telepathic messages.[p/] I met up with him in the gallery room before they finally found the artifact.
translation: Harold: 尤金总算答复了我的心灵感应。[p/]我在他们找到那个遗物之前与尤金在画廊汇合了。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Eugene: Eugene explore house! Eugene look for new place to play!
translation: Eugene: 尤金探索房子！尤金找新的玩耍地方！

original: Eugene: Eugene also look for spiders! Spiders yum yum!
translation: Eugene: 尤金还找蜘蛛！蜘蛛好恰好恰！

original: Eugene: You think Eugene steal Armbands of Intellect?
translation: Eugene: 你觉得尤金偷了智慧臂章？

original: Eugene: Eugene never steal from Harold! Harold friend!
translation: Eugene: 尤金从不偷哈罗德东西！哈罗德朋友！

original: Eugene: Eugene always Harold's friend! Apes strong together!
translation: Eugene: 尤金和哈罗德永远朋友！猿类团结！

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Eugene: I'll admit that I took the Armbands and replaced them with a replica.[p/] But I was [i]not[/i] the crook who stole the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Eugene: 我承认自己用赝品调换了臂章，[p/]但我<u>不是</u>那个偷走噬法之剑的坏蛋。

original: Eugene: The thefts were completely different from one another.[p/] The display case for the Sword was completely shattered.
translation: Eugene: 两起盗窃截然不同。[p/]放有噬法之剑的展柜被彻底破坏了。

original: Eugene: I spotted the Sword when I was exploring the manor.[p/] It was lying in the middle of a hallway.
translation: Eugene: 我探索庄园时发现了噬法之剑，[p/]剑就放在走廊中央。

original: Eugene: I spotted the Sword when I was heading back from the Rooftop Garden to the Gallery.[p/] It was lying in the middle of a hallway.
translation: Eugene: 我从屋顶花园返回画廊途中发现了噬法之剑，[p/]剑就放在走廊中央。

original: Eugene: I wondered why such an important artifact would be lying there.[p/] So I took a closer look to inspect it.
translation: Eugene: 我当时好奇这件重要的遗物为什么会在这里。[p/]就近距离观察了一下。

original: Eugene: That's when I heard Harold call out to me telepathically.[p/] The Sword must have protected me and Harold from the [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: Eugene: 我也就是在这时听到了哈罗德的心灵感应。[p/]一定是噬法之剑让我和哈罗德不受[b]抗魔力场[/b]影响。

original: Eugene: I wanted to take the Sword and return it.[p/] But a wild dog chased me away from the scene.
translation: Eugene: 我想把噬法之剑放回原处。[p/]但有条野狗把我驱离了现场。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Eugene: I discreetly made my way to that hallway through another air vent.[p/] I exited the air vent in that hallway and tried to leap to the other side.
translation: Eugene: 我悄悄通过另一条通风管道抵达了走廊。[p/]我从通风管道里钻出来，试图跳到走廊另一侧。

original: Eugene: I'm not sure if it was my waning intelligence or my desperation.[p/] But I collided with something that I didn't see.
translation: Eugene: 我不确定是因为智力衰退还是太过急迫。[p/]但我撞上了什么之前没有看到的东西。

original: Eugene: I fell to the ground and found the Sword of Spell Eating laying next to me.
translation: Eugene: 我摔到了地上，发现旁边就是噬法之剑。

original: Eugene: I wanted to retrieve the Sword.[p/] But that wild dog forced me to retreat.[p/] After that,[p/] I continued to make my way to the study.
translation: Eugene: 我想把剑拿回来。[p/]但那条野狗迫使我撤退。[p/]这之后，[p/]我继续朝着书房进发。

original: Eugene: ...And that's when I found William Frega.[p/] He was dead on the floor and lying in a pool of blood.
translation: Eugene: ……也就是在这时，我发现了威廉·弗雷加。[p/]他倒在血泊中，已经死去。

original: Eugene: And as if I were blessed by the Scaled Lord himself,[p/] I found the will that he was drafting.[p/] So I destroyed it.
translation: Eugene: 仿佛是受到鳞甲领主保佑，[p/]我也找到了他正在起草的遗嘱。[p/]于是我毁掉了遗嘱。

Player: Objection
Alaric: You think Lady Frega cast magic right in front of me?[p/] Don't be a serf!
translation: Alaric: 你觉得弗雷加小姐在我面前用过魔法？[p/]真是凰诞！

original: Alaric: She was under the careful watch of the Kingsguard,[p/] my brother,[p/] [i]and[/i] Lord Steelwind!
translation: Alaric: 她当时被国王卫队，[p/]我的哥哥，[p/]<u>还有</u>斯蒂尔文德勋爵看着！

original: Alaric: We conversed for the whole night and I didn't see her cast [i]any[/i] magic.
translation: Alaric: 我们昨晚一直在交谈，我根本没看见她施展<u>任何</u>魔法。

original: Alaric: She told me and my brother how "the occult are a fascinating phenomena".[p/] I didn't see her cast [i]any[/i] magic.
translation: Alaric: 她告诉我和哥哥，“玄学是一门非常极度引人入胜的学问”。[p/]我没看见她施展<u>任何</u>魔法。

original: Alaric: She's been through so much over the last few years...[p/] All because of her horrid father...
translation: Alaric: 她过去几年经历了很多事……[p/]都怪她那个可恶的父亲……

original: Alaric: She'd never do something like this![p/][s/] You [i]and[/i] Lady Steelwind are just jealous!
translation: Alaric: 她绝对不会做这种事！[p/][s/]你<u>和</u>斯蒂尔文德小姐只是嫉妒她！

Marrunath: I provided sight to my keeper while she spoke with the princes.
translation: Marrunath: 我的管理人与王子交谈时，我会为她提供视觉。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]I'll admit that she [i]did[/i] cast [b]Invisibility[/b] on me during their conversation.[p/] She needed to keep me hidden after all.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我也承认对话期间，她<u>确实</u>对我用了[b]隐形术[/b]。[p/]毕竟她得把我的存在隐藏起来。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]But I never left the room where my master was.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]但我从没离开过主人所在的房间。

original: Marrunath: ...[p/][p/]Nor did I steal the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Marrunath: ……[p/][p/]我也没有偷噬法之剑。

original: Marrunath: You have nothing on me, heavensborn![p/][s/] ...[p/][p/]You don't even have proof that I entered William Frega's Study!
translation: Marrunath: 你没有能证明我有罪的证据，天诞之物！[p/][s/]……[p/][p/]你甚至都没有我进过威廉·弗雷加的书房的证据！
